String.Source: Huh, just like that. My own shadow, gone. Never asked for this. Don't need it. I sneak the old fashioned way.
String.Dest: 哈，就像那样，我的阴影斗篷不见了。我从未索取过斗篷，也从来不需要。我只遵循古老的传统去偷盗。

String.Source: A Dwarven city. Big deal.
String.Dest: 一座矮人城市，呵呵，真了不起。

String.Source: Ugh. I don't like being this high up. My fingers get numb and my head gets dizzy.
String.Dest: 呃。我不想把它弄得更高了。我的手指已经麻木而我的头也在发晕。

String.Source: Another ruin. Gold, traps, and bones.
String.Dest: 另一个遗迹。黄金丶陷阱及骸骨等着我们。

String.Source: This cave is cold and sticky. That means frostbite spiders. And a lot of them.
String.Dest: 这个洞穴又冷又黏。这代表着寒霜蜘蛛，很多的寒霜蜘蛛。

String.Source: Bloody nirnroots, something big's coming out of the water. Don't look at me, you probably stepped on something.
String.Dest: 血红的耐恩根，好大的一棵从水里冒出来。别看着我，瞧你踩到了什么东西。

String.Source: The shadows here...something big and cavernous is up ahead.
String.Dest: 这里有片投影……前面有块巨大而多孔的东西存在。

String.Source: Ugh. I know pressure plates are my thing, but I think I broke my brain trying to solve the first puzzle. Excuse me if I sit this one out.
String.Dest: 呃。我知道压力板是我的事儿，但我在想破脑袋的试着解决第一个难题。如果我袖手旁观的话就抱歉啦。

String.Source: I'm ready. I feel like I can take on an army of shadows.
String.Dest: 我准备好了。我感觉自己可以在阴影中与一支军队较量。

String.Source: Plenty of danger, but fight or flee, we can use their own shadows to our advantage.
String.Dest: 有很多危险，但无论或战或逃，我们都能用他们自己的阴影变成我们的优势。

String.Source: Hey. There's some weird shadows up ahead. Like a section of wall where it just breaks off. A hundred septims says it's a passageway.
String.Dest: 嘿。前面有些奇怪的影子。像一段被打破了的墙。我赌一百金币，这铁定是个通道。

String.Source: Looks like there's bandits up and down this passageway. Although some of them are hanging from the ceiling.
String.Dest: 看起来这个走廊一定来过土匪，尽他们有的是被悬挂在天花板上。

String.Source: Bone chimes. Almost too easy to sidle past them. Of course, if you're a bad sneak, you can always dive into the water.
String.Dest: 骨制编钟。从它们中间溜过去易如反掌。当然，如果你对自己的潜行术没自信，倒是可以一直猫在水底下。

String.Source: Dwarven ruins. I wish they'd do like their owners and just go away.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹。我希望他们像他们的主人一样赶快人间蒸发。

String.Source: Now that's what I call a behemoth. That treasure's shadow is bigger than I am. Oh, and the talking wall behind it is impressive too.
String.Dest: 这就是我所说的比蒙巨兽.。它裤子的阴影都比我大。对了，还有它后面会说话的墙也让我印象深刻。

String.Source: Trapping starlight? Of all the useless things to build. Tell me when the Dwarves invent a gold tree. Then I'll be impressed.
String.Dest: 收集星光？竟然会用这种无用的东西来创建吗。什么时候矮人造了一棵黄金之树就告诉我吧，我一定会印象深刻的。

String.Source: This place smells like bandits, dirt, and...cats. And not the kind that land on their feet.
String.Dest: 这地方闻起来有股强盗味儿，土腥味儿，还有……猫骚味儿。没有一种方法能从那气味中幸免于难。

String.Source: This is the part where we walk down the hall, slit some throats, and say good morning to the corpse at the end. Right before we say good night.
String.Dest: 我们就这样走下大厅，撕开一些人的喉咙，最后对着那些尸体说早安。就在我们说晚安之前。

String.Source: Draugr ahead. We should draw them toward us somehow, and let them run through this gauntlet first. Maybe their bones will get the blades stuck.
String.Dest: 前面有尸鬼。我们应该想辙把他们引过来，让他们先通过这波猛烈攻击。也许他们的骨头会被刀片卡住。

String.Source: Bright lights and tons of noise. Those Falmer think they can hide in the shadows. But not from me.
String.Dest: 明亮的光线和很多的噪声。那些雪精灵以为他们能隐藏在阴影中。但却瞒不过我。

String.Source: A single guard, and by the looks of it, an idiot. Still, might be hard to get behind the blood-drinker with that fire lengthening our shadows.
String.Dest: 只有一个守卫，而且从面相上来看就是个白痴。然而，火光这么亮，要偷偷接近饮血者的身后也许还是有难度的。

String.Source: More vampires ahead. They probably already know we're here, what with the smell of wet dog everywhere.
String.Dest: 前面有更多的吸血鬼。他们可能已经知道我们在这里，多亏了落水狗的臭味那么浓。

String.Source: Some kind of ruin. How long do you think they've stood here? Twenty years? Thirty?
String.Dest: 一些古遗迹，你认为它们在这默默矗立了多久？二十年，还是三十年？

String.Source: I'm getting bad vibes from this place. It ain't natural for a forest like this to be so far north.
String.Dest: 从这里我有种不详的预感，这么靠北的地方有一片森林很不正常。

String.Source: There's too many waterfalls in here. I can't even hear myself think. Not that I was thinking about anything, but still.
String.Dest: 这儿瀑布真太多了。我都没法集中精力思考了。倒也不是我真在想啥子东西，但反正就是特闹腾。

String.Source: I don't know what you did, but I might just punch you in the face for it.
String.Dest: 我不知道你做过什么，但是我就是想揍你那张脸。

String.Source: This cavern is so huge they had to build stairs so the stupid thralls can get around. Lords don't have that problem. Must be nice to turn into a bat.
String.Dest: 这个洞穴大到他们不得不制作台阶好让那些愚蠢的奴隶能过来。大君就没有这个问题了。变成蝙蝠一定很爽。

String.Source: By Nocturnal, another Dwarven city. I can already taste the metal.
String.Dest: 我的诺克图娜尔啊，又一座矮人遗迹。我已经尝到金属的味道了。

String.Source: This fight is stupid.
String.Dest: 真是打得毫无意义。

String.Source: Spiders. We can try and use the grass for cover, but heck, so can they.
String.Dest: 有蜘蛛。我们可以试着用草丛隐蔽自己。但真见鬼啊，它们也可以这么干。

String.Source: These bandits may be good at slaying mammoths, but that might work in our favor. They won't see us coming.
String.Dest: 这些强盗可能很擅长猎杀猛犸象，但这或许对我们有利。他们注意不到我们来了。

String.Source: Look. One of them old Nord castles or something, I don't know.
String.Dest: 看啊。这是古诺德城堡还是别的什么来着。

String.Source: Get your weapon out. Whatever's behind this door, it's poison.
String.Dest: 拔出武器准备好。这扇门后必定是有毒之物。

String.Source: So you can heal people. Whatever. I don't need your pity.
String.Dest: 这么说你会治疗。随便吧。我不需要你的怜悯。

String.Source: Watch your step. I'm sure the view's nice for you, but all I sense is a short ledge and a long way down.
String.Dest: 注意脚下。我敢肯定这视角对你来说相当不错，但我的感觉是就一截短短的山脊和很长的下坡路。

String.Source: The ground is marked with a stag's head. That means hagravens. Get ready for a fight.
String.Dest: 地面绘有雄鹿的头像. 这是乌鸦鬼婆的地盘. 准备战斗.

String.Source: This is a cozy little hideout. Although if I were a Nightingale I think I would prefer sleeping in the Flagon. That river is noisy.
String.Dest: 真是一个舒服的小窝。尽管如果我是夜莺的话，我会更倾向于在大酒壶里休息。只是那条河有些吵。

String.Source: Shadows. The trees have one too many shadows. Something's wrong about that light too. It's downright perverse. Keep your guard.
String.Dest: 影子，那些树的影子也太浓了。光源好像也有问题。这显然不正常。保持警惕。

String.Source: This pass is cold, and I don't mean the temperature. I guess that's why they call it Brittleshin. Your knees freeze off.
String.Dest: 这条路太冷了。要我说，不是天气的原因。布莱特辛应该就是这样，能把人的膝盖都冻掉。

String.Source: Looks like a surprise party in there, and all of Golldir's ancestors showed up. Get ready for a brawl.
String.Dest: 看起来这儿正在举行一个令人称奇的聚会呢，好像高迪尔那十八辈子祖宗都从地里冒出来了一样。准备好大吵一架吧。

String.Source: Archer up top. Looks like three more bandits to the right. Might be hard to stealth them. More lights than usual. It's almost like a tavern.
String.Dest: 上面有弓箭手，看起来右边有至少三个强盗。看来要偷偷做掉他们非常困难。（这儿）比平时更亮，感觉像是一个酒馆似的。

String.Source: There are more guards in this museum than they have watching the front gate. All for this junk. Damn machine scraps are too heavy to steal.
String.Dest: 这里有比博物馆前门更多的守卫.都为了这破烂.垃圾机器残骸重的难偷得走.

String.Source: Fresh kill. Looks like someone's already raided this cave. Someone strong.
String.Dest: 尸体还很新鲜。看来已经有什么人搜查过这个洞穴里。某个强大的人。

String.Source: Old ruins. Who knows what kind.
String.Dest: 古老的遗迹。谁知道里面什么样。

String.Source: Hold up. Bandit camp, straight ahead. Place like this must be hard to see at night, but that's what I'm here for.
String.Dest: 一直往前就是强盗营地了。那地方在晚上很难被发现，但这就是我在这儿的原因。

String.Source: This is the leader's keep. Might want to go in quiet. I doubt that fool's wife is still alive, but you never know. She sees us, she might scream.
String.Dest: 这是领导者的塔楼，迈特想悄悄溜进去。我怀疑那个蠢货的老婆还活着，但是你是不会知道的。她看到我们的话，没准会叫出来的。

String.Source: Three sentries. That's it? Give us a real challenge.
String.Dest: 三个哨兵。就这么简单？给我们点真正的挑战。

String.Source: You don't have to lie. Skyrim is a better place without Krog
String.Dest: 没有必要撒谎. 没有Krog天际省会是个更好地方

String.Source: You don't have to lie. Skyrim is a better place without Krog
String.Dest: 没有必要撒谎. 没有Krog天际省会是个更好地方

String.Source: Gambling is a sin and you should remove yourself from this den of iniquity.
String.Dest: 赌博是罪恶，你应该把自己从这个罪孽泥潭中解救出来。

String.Source: It was self-defense. Besides, the guards don't care about some nameless Orc.
String.Dest: 这是自卫。此外,保安不关心一些无名的兽人。

String.Source: Who is the kin you speak of?
String.Dest: 你提到的那个亲戚是谁？

String.Source: Who is the kin you speak of?
String.Dest: 你提到的那个亲戚是谁？

String.Source: Who is the kin you speak of?
String.Dest: 你提到的那个亲戚是谁？

String.Source: It's not like you to let a bite from a crazy Orc stop you from stealing.
String.Dest: 被一个发疯的兽人咬了一口就不再偷窃了？这不像你。

String.Source: It's not like you to let a bite from a crazy Orc stop you from stealing.
String.Dest: 被一个发疯的兽人咬了一口就不再偷窃了？这不像你。

String.Source: It's not like you to let a bite from a crazy Orc stop you from stealing.
String.Dest: 被一个发疯的兽人咬了一口就不再偷窃了？这不像你。

String.Source: Why don't I just give you all my money and save us the hassle.
String.Dest: 要不我把我的钱都给你，咱就不用争吵了。

String.Source: Sure, if you want all your winnings to end up with me.
String.Dest: 当然，如果你想让你全部的胜利在我这里得到终结。.

String.Source: We need to come up with a better story than that.
String.Dest: 我们需要拿出一个比这更好的故事。

String.Source: We need to come up with a better story than that.
String.Dest: 我们需要拿出一个比这更好的故事。

String.Source: It looks like you're doing quite well on your own.
String.Dest: 看起来你自己干的非常好。

String.Source: If he ever tried to hurt you, I'd rip out his tonsils.
String.Dest: 如果他曾试图伤害你，我会扯断他的嗓子。

String.Source: If he ever tried to hurt you, I'd rip out his tonsils.
String.Dest: 如果他曾试图伤害你，我会扯断他的嗓子。

String.Source: If he ever tried to hurt you, I'd rip out his tonsils.
String.Dest: 如果他曾试图伤害你，我会扯断他的嗓子。

String.Source: Why do you care? It's just one less oaf in the world.
String.Dest: 你在乎吗？只是一个无关紧要的糊涂虫而已。

String.Source: You should have just beat him unconscious and walked away.
String.Dest: 你就应该把他一下打晕转身就走。

String.Source: You should have just beat him unconscious and walked away.
String.Dest: 你就应该把他一下打晕转身就走。

String.Source: What do you mean? You don't exactly have green skin.
String.Dest: 你说啥？你的皮肤又不是全都是绿的。

String.Source: What do you mean? You don't exactly have green skin.
String.Dest: 你说啥？你的皮肤又不是全都是绿的。

String.Source: What do you mean? You don't exactly have green skin.
String.Dest: 你说啥？你的皮肤又不是全都是绿的。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 哈啰。

String.Source: Alright. Let's go meet this Orc.
String.Dest: 好吧，咱们去会会这个兽人。

String.Source: Alright. Let's go meet this Orc.
String.Dest: 好吧，咱们去会会这个兽人。

String.Source: This is what happens when you ignore the Gods to hang out with worthless thugs.
String.Dest: 這就是當你常與惡棍為伍而忽略了神後會發生的事。

String.Source: This is what happens when you ignore the Gods to hang out with worthless thugs.
String.Dest: 這就是當你常與惡棍為伍而忽略了神後會發生的事。

String.Source: Maybe some other time.
String.Dest: 也许改天吧。

String.Source: Why would the guard listen to a crazy person?
String.Dest: 守卫为什么会听信一个疯子的话呢？

String.Source: Why would the guard listen to a crazy person?
String.Dest: 守卫为什么会听信一个疯子的话呢？

String.Source: Why would the guard listen to a crazy person?
String.Dest: 守卫为什么会听信一个疯子的话呢？

String.Source: This Orc literally bit your hand?
String.Dest: 这个兽人真的咬你的手了吗？

String.Source: This Orc literally bit your hand?
String.Dest: 这个兽人真的咬你的手了吗？

String.Source: This Orc literally bit your hand?
String.Dest: 这个兽人真的咬你的手了吗？

String.Source: Cave up ahead. Keep your steps light.
String.Dest: 山洞就在前面，注意你的脚步声。

String.Source: Which is good, because this is a family squabble, and we ought to keep it in house.
String.Dest: 这样就很好，因为是家丑就不要外扬了。

String.Source: Stick and move! Stick and move!
String.Dest: 坚持住，动起来！坚持住，动起来！

String.Source: You mean Krog? I couldn't care less about him. But his brother and I got history. He's the one who's kin.
String.Dest: 你是说克罗格？鬼才关心他呢。但是他的兄弟和我颇有渊源。他只是一个亲戚而已。

String.Source: Fight! Fight!
String.Dest: 上啊！上啊！

String.Source: Hey, there's my favorite accomplice! Want to join us? We're almost finished with this round.
String.Dest: 嘿，那是我最牛的同伙！想加入吗？我们这一轮就快搞定啦！

String.Source: They said I stole some noble's amulet. It's because I was working the street for the past week, doing the whole blind beggar bit.
String.Dest: 他们说我偷了个大人物的项链。因为上周我在街上干活，就是那种装瞎子要饭的生意。

String.Source: Yeah, and nearly broke every bone in my hand. But if you ask him, I had it coming.
String.Dest: 是啊，我手掌上几乎每一根骨头都碎了。但如果你问他的话，这都是我自找的。

String.Source: Except he has a name, and it's Krog, brother of Lurgok. And Lurgok, believe it or not, is kin.
String.Dest: 要不是他也姓克罗格，我还真看不出他和路卡是兄弟呢。和路卡！不管你信不信，他们是亲兄弟。

String.Source: I guess I still haven't brought you over to the dark side. Eh, but you'll come around. I'm a persistent girl.
String.Dest: 我想我还没有把你带入黑暗的一面。嗯,但是你迟早会来到我的身边的。我是一个执着的女孩儿。

String.Source: Confident, huh. Fair warning, I'm not going to go easy on you, even if you're family.
String.Dest: 你很自信嘛，呵呵。给你个小警告，我不会轻易放过你，还有你的家人。

String.Source: Kick that stupid snowberry!
String.Dest: 踢掉这愚蠢的雪莓！

String.Source: Still, he did me a favor, and I owe him. Not that he knows it. We're all just meat to him.
String.Dest: 不过,他帮了我一个忙,我欠他的。他自己也知道。We're all just meat to him.

String.Source: Lurgok's no priest, but he's not dangerous either, at least if you keep your distance. Of course, step in his space, and you're meat.
String.Dest: 路卡可不是素食者，如果你和他保持点距离他并不危险。当然，如果你离他太近，他会把你当成一块肉。

String.Source: Except I quit that play the day before. You know why? Because Lurgok bit my hand when I reached for his purse.
String.Dest: 除了我一天前不干了。你知道为什么吗？因为路卡在我拿他钱包的时候咬了我的手！

String.Source: But it's not Krog I'm concerned about. It's his brother. After all, he's kin.
String.Dest: 可我关心的不是克罗格 。是他兄弟。反正，是他的亲戚。

String.Source: These Dwarven cities are filled with treasure. Makes me wish I was a brute, so I could actually carry some of it out.
String.Dest: 这些矮人城市充满了宝藏。我多希望自己是一个残忍的家伙啊，这样就可以把一些宝藏带出来了。

String.Source: I know this Orc, you see. He's my kin by choice, but Krog is his brother by blood.
String.Dest: 我知道这个兽人，你瞧。他是我拜把子的兄弟，而克罗格则是他血缘上的兄弟。

String.Source: Lurgok's a tribal sort, and likes to stay at the Strongholds. Krog said he stopped over at Largashbur in the mountains to the west. Let's go there.
String.Dest: 路卡是个喜欢守着要塞的部落。克罗格说他在西边山脉的拉加施布尔等着呢。咱们往那儿走吧。

String.Source: Look. A cave. Plenty of gold inside. At least, there better be.
String.Dest: 看，一个洞穴。里面都是金子。至少比这里好。

String.Source: Stay low! Dodge and stick! Keep those hands up!
String.Dest: 低下身子！躲开然后给他一拳！把你拳头举起来啊！

String.Source: He's family the way you're family. Lurgok vouched for me one time, when the guard captain over in Falkreath tried to pin a theft on me.
String.Dest: 他和你们一样，都是一家人。之前佛克瑞斯的守卫长想诬陷我偷东西，是勒高克把我保下来的。

String.Source: Watch their feet, not their eyes!
String.Dest: 看他们的脚！别看眼睛！

String.Source: Ha, good one. I'm a worthless thug, and you still hang out with me. But with relatives, some you choose and some you don't.
String.Dest: 哈，真好笑。我是个一无是处的恶棍，而你却还跟我呆在一起。但说到你的亲戚，你选择和他们中的一些在一起，却不跟另一些为伍。

String.Source: I love it when you talk crazy. But you'd like him. He's just as nuts.
String.Dest: 你不羁的语气让我着迷，但是你会对他感兴趣的。他就像坚果一样硬。

String.Source: Me being family isn't going to make it any easier.
String.Dest: 我的家人要做到它并不容易。

String.Source: Hey. I stole this for you. So you don't owe me anything.
String.Dest: 嘿。我偷这个是给你的。所以不要认为你欠我什么。

String.Source: Yeah, the air smells fresher already. Well, at least until his corpse rots.
String.Dest: 行吧，空气都清新不少了。当然喽，至少在他的尸体腐烂之前。

String.Source: But I didn't take her amulet. Never had a chance. You know why? Because Lurgok bit my hand when I reached for his purse.
String.Dest: 但我没有偷她的护符。压根儿没有机会。知道为什么吗？因为当我伸手去偷他钱包时路卡打了我的手。

String.Source: A cave. Dimly lit and full of treasure, I hope.
String.Dest: 一个洞穴。昏暗而充满宝藏，但愿如此。

String.Source: A cave. What will we find, trouble or treasure? Better be more of the second thing.
String.Dest: 一个山洞。我们能找到什么，麻烦还是宝藏？希望后者能多些。

String.Source: No, I haven't, even though I've been trying to let you win the small pots. That's just how bad you are.
String.Dest: (笑)不，我没有做过，虽然我想方设法让你赢得这些小盆子。你太♂坏了。

String.Source: An oath-relative, same as you. Saved my skin when some fat sload of a guard captain was too lazy to do his job.
String.Dest: 一个oath-relative，就跟你一样。当某个肥胖的蛞蝓人守卫队长懒得干自己该干的活儿的时候，他救了我一命。

String.Source: Oh skeevers, he's not getting up, is he. Maybe we can make it look like an accident, like he tripped and fell on my knife.
String.Dest: 哦skeevers，他死翘翘了，对吧。也许我们能伪造个意外现场，比如他脚滑摔在了我的匕首上啥的。

String.Source: It's not that I was scared, it's that he broke every bone in my hand. Couldn't hold a spoon, let alone pick a pocket.
String.Dest: 不是我害怕，是他打折了我手上的每一根骨头，勺子都握不住，更别说偷窃了。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: I mean sure, he keeps to himself. But you step one foot inside his space, and he's cooking your toes for supper.
String.Dest: 我的意思是，的确他很沉默寡言。但你若胆敢踏入他的空间一步，他就会用你的脚趾头做顿晚餐。

String.Source: Twelve septims on my partner!
String.Dest: 12个金币押我的搭档胜！

String.Source: (Laughs) Then it wouldn't be stealing. It'd be charity. Just saying that word makes my tooth ache.
String.Dest: （大笑）那就不是偷窃而是做在慈善了——单提到这词我都牙疼。

String.Source: Get behind that fool! That always works!
String.Dest: 绕到那个蠢货的后面去！那招很有效的！

String.Source: Yes! I knew I could count on you! You're the Dragonborn, so you got authority and muscle.
String.Dest: 是啊！我就知道我可以依靠你！你是龙裔，所以你有权力和力量。

String.Source: They say Dwarven ruins are haunted. At least that would make them interesting.
String.Dest: 他们说矮人废墟闹鬼。至少这会让它们变得有趣。

String.Source: Oh come on, get up you stupid ogre! Don't tell me you died that easy!
String.Dest: 噢，得了，快爬起来吧你个愚蠢的怪物！别告诉我你这么容易就挂了！

String.Source: I don't know, do we? Guards around here got there hands full, and they'd be more than happy not to make this a murder case.
String.Dest: 我不知道，对吧？这些守卫已经有够忙的了，少犯一起血案的话他们肯定会更开心的。

String.Source: Ah, just dumb luck. This is my first time playing Iron Hearts, believe it or not. Krog over here is the real expert.
String.Dest: 啊，只不过是运气好. 这是我第一次玩Iron Hearts, 信不信由你. 那边克罗格才是专家.

String.Source: But sure, Lurgok's insane. But he keeps to himself. Of course, you get in his space, and you're just another kind of meat.
String.Dest: 但是是的，鲁卡疯了，但是他不和人来往。当然，你要是进了他的地盘，你就不过另一块肉而已。

String.Source: Can't say I agree, seeing as Krog was about to kill us. Can't say I disagree either, seeing as his brother is going to kill me when he finds out.
String.Dest: 我说不上同意，看上去克罗格要干掉我们一样。我也说不上不同意，看上去他兄弟找到我们之后就会宰了我一样。

String.Source: Some noble had her amulet picked off her neck, and of course it had to be the blind beggar girl.
String.Dest: 有的贵族从她脖子上抢来的这条项链，理所当然的，她成了一个瞎乞丐。

String.Source: I like how you can see the Giants' camp from here. I bet these bandits peppered them arrows every night. At least I would.
String.Dest: 我的法子跟你发现巨人营地的办法一样。那些强盗们每天晚上都要派人巡逻吧，要是我的话就会这么做。

String.Source: Damn you. That's asking too much. This place is light on purses and heavy on smell.
String.Dest: 该死，真是太过分了。这个地方的臭味儿可比钱包的分量重多了！

String.Source: That's a long jump. My advice? Don't.
String.Dest: 这是一次长跳。我的建议？不要这么做。

String.Source: So instead of locking the treasure chest like a normal person, they've got this locked door, which probably has a lever behind it.
String.Dest: 他們選擇把門鎖上並且放下門桿，而不是像平常人那樣把珍貴的寶箱鎖上。

String.Source: That's magic for you. And for some reason, it's stealing that's against the law.
String.Dest: 这是给你的魔法。因为某些原因 ，偷窃是违法的。

String.Source: Well, that and I don't want your men standing behind me looking at my cards.
String.Dest: 唔，我可不想让你的人站在我身后偷看我的底牌。

String.Source: Swirling shadows, Draugr...looks like some kind of freak show up ahead.
String.Dest: 正在旋转的阴影，尸鬼……看起来就像在前面突然出现了什么极为怪异的东西一样。

String.Source: Hey, this corpse has skulls on his belt. I wonder what he did to piss his friends off. Although I can't say I blame them. He just looks annoying.
String.Dest: >嘿，这具尸体的脑瓜系在他的皮带上。我不知道他做了什么让他的朋友生气了。虽然我不能责怪他的朋友。毕竟他看上去太惹人厌了。

String.Source: You know, the Jarl of Riften should really put up a gate here. Block off all the cold coming in from the west.
String.Dest: 你知道吗， 裂谷城的领主真的应该在这儿设个门，用以抵挡所有来自西方的寒气。

String.Source: Still, I shadowed them for a while, even tried chatting up this stuttering brute, but there was nothing but leather in those purses.
String.Dest: 然而，我跟踪了他们一段时间，甚至试着跟那个结结巴巴的畜生搭讪。但那钱包里除了皮革什么都没有。

String.Source: I can't see, idiot. But I'm not blind. When you move, your shadow moves. I can tell by the way it's angled that you're up against the wall.
String.Dest: 我看不见，白痴。但我不是瞎子。当你人动的时候，你的影子也跟着动了。顺便一提，影子的角度使我知道了你正靠在墙上。

String.Source: In any case, I didn't spring you just to let you run around eating people.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，我没有为了让你出去到处吃人而【spring】你。

String.Source: But you keep your arms crossed to make your boss think otherwise. Which is even dumber, seeing as having you rested is good for the both of you.
String.Dest: 但你就那么交叉着手臂让你的老板想歪了。再加上你休息的话对你俩都有好处……这件事看起来就更蠢了。

String.Source: We need to find you a home, somewhere you can only eat people we don't like.
String.Dest: 我们得给你找一个家，一个你可以只去吃我们不喜欢的人的地方。

String.Source: Alright, but don't say I didn't give you a chance to win your money back.
String.Dest: 好吧，但是不要说我没有给你把你的钱赢回来的机会。

String.Source: If someone came charging in, Krog would be dead before you managed to get your fingers out of your armpits.
String.Dest: 如果有人冲进来， 克罗格来不及手抽出胳肢窝就死了。

String.Source: And I go, "Which coin purse?"
String.Dest: 然后我说，“哪个钱袋？”

String.Source: Normally I'd be ecstatic about a chest that big, but it's probably just filled with more spiders.
String.Dest: 正常情况下我看到这么大的箱子一定会狂喜不已，不过这次可能是因为这箱子里塞着的更多是蜘蛛。

String.Source: Why does that not surprise me.
String.Dest: 为什么我一点儿都不奇怪。

String.Source: I got a bad feeling something lives down here. Something dangerous. Maybe in the water, as if those candles are a distraction. Don't trust your eyes.
String.Dest: 我感觉有什么东西住在这下面。某种危险的东西。也许是在水里,那些蜡烛看上去好像是用来迷惑你的。不要相信你的眼睛。

String.Source: [Picks lock]
String.Dest: [撬锁]

String.Source: Yeah, well, I can't be blamed for that. Although your lover might find a way.
String.Dest: 是的，我不应该责备这个。尽管你的另一半可能找到另一个方法。

String.Source: Then he looks at me all angry and says "I only have one! And you stole it!"
String.Dest: 然后他看着我愤愤的说:“我只有一个!而你偷了它!”

String.Source: This is the part where I steal the pickaxe from your sack. Because I'll die of old age by the time you finish mining this place.
String.Dest: 这就是我要从你口袋里把镐偷出来的原因。因为当你在这地方挖掘完成的时候，我差不多就要老死了。

String.Source: Hold up. There's three levers in this room, and only one is lit up brighter than King Olaf. What did I tell you? The eyes tell lies.
String.Dest: 且慢。这间房里有3个控制杆，而只有一个被照得比独眼奥拉夫国王还要亮。我跟你说过，眼见并不为实。

String.Source: He was about your height, but he had short strides and a bad knee, maybe from fighting, but probably from age.
String.Dest: 他跟你差不多高，但是步幅小一点，而且膝盖不太好，有可能是战斗导致的，也有可能是年纪大了。

String.Source: So the shopkeeper grabs me by the wrist and screams "You were the one in the market! The blind girl who stole my coin purse!"
String.Dest: 所以那个店主抓住我的手腕尖叫：“当时在市场的就是你！你这个偷了我钱包的瞎丫头！”

String.Source: Pulling the lever opens a gate in a separate room that guards a chest. But there's still only one lock! By Nocturnal, I think my head just exploded.
String.Dest: 在一个有宝藏的密室里，拉下杠杆之后打开了一扇门。但是还有一把锁！诺克图娜尔在上，我头都炸了。

String.Source: They're going to execute me! I'm innocent! You have to help me!
String.Dest: 他们要处死我！我是无辜的！救救我！

String.Source: (Sigh) You and your best friend Malacath. Well too bad, your family comes first.
String.Dest: （叹气）你和你最好的朋友Malacath。太糟糕了，你的家庭是最重要的。

String.Source: But I did notice the leader never put down his axe, even when he went to sleep.
String.Dest: 但是我也注意到了那个首领永远不曾放下他的斧头，甚至在他睡觉的时候。

String.Source: So I gave his hands something else to hold, and took home my fee in the morning.
String.Dest: 所以我把别的东西塞到他手里，然后清晨带着“出场费”回家了。

String.Source: By Nocturnal, we just got in here, and I already smell corpse. (Snickers) Worst adventurer ever.
String.Dest: 我的亲诺克图纳尔啊，我们才刚进来，就问得到尸体的气味了。（窃笑）史上最烂的冒险者。

String.Source: Archers! Might want to do our best to stay close to the wall before it starts raining arrows.
String.Dest: 弓箭手！我们是想着尽可能地靠近那堵墙呢，但箭如雨下，我们根本靠近不了啊。

String.Source: So when do you think this wizard brings out the silver bowls? For the living guests, or the famous dead ones?
String.Dest: 那你觉得这个法师是在什么时候把那只银碗拿出来的呢？是准备招待活生生的客人呢，还是准备招待那些死去的名人呢？

String.Source: You don't have to apologize to me. Cook me for dinner, and most of what you'll be eating is the stuff in your coin purse.
String.Dest: 你不用向我道歉。把我做成晚餐，然后你and most of what you'll be eating is the stuff in your coin purse.

String.Source: The thief wants to know what in Oblivion this is all about. The job was taken care of weeks ago.
String.Dest: 那个窃贼想知道这他妈到底怎么回事。工作早在数周之前就已被料理。

String.Source: What if we took you to Ivarstead? High Hrothgar is probably the most sacred rock of them all.
String.Dest: 要是我们把你带去伊瓦斯泰德呢？霍斯加高峰可能是天下所有岩石中最令人肃然起敬的一块了。

String.Source: Whatever. I'm only responsible for two things. Stealing your item, and making sure your man pays me. All the other stuff is your job.
String.Dest: 随便你。我只对两件事负责，一是偷到你要的东西，二是确保你的人会付我钱。剩下的事那可就都是你的工作了。

String.Source: Help me! Please! I've done nothing wrong! You can't do this!
String.Dest: 帮帮我！求你了！我没做错什么！你不能这样做！

String.Source: He kept his coin purse on his right hip. By the way it sagged it probably was about a week away from splitting.
String.Dest: 他把钱包放在自己的右臀上。顺便一提，大概是一周不花钱所以钱包沉甸甸的……

String.Source: But yeah, I haven't the slightest clue what he looks like.
String.Dest: 呃，是啊，我一点也不知道他长什么样儿。

String.Source: It always seems like there's no way to go but straight. That's why adventurers are stupid. They forget you can still go back.
String.Dest: 除了前面的路以外好像无路可走。这就是为什么说冒险者都很蠢。他们忘了他们可以回头。

String.Source: Alright, fine, you stubborn Orc. Stay here. But don't say I didn't give you a chance to win your life back.
String.Dest: 好吧。好极了。你个顽固的兽人。你就呆在这儿吧。但别说我没给过你保住小命的机会。

String.Source: You can go back to polishing your Lord Malacath's spear when we're safe at the tavern.
String.Dest: 等我们安全到达旅馆的时候，你可以回去摩亮你家玛拉凯斯大人的长矛。

String.Source: But that's the easy stuff. I can tell by the way your back is bent that you're as worn out as Krog's shoes.
String.Dest: 这很简单。我可以顺便告诉你，你只要把背弯下来，就会和克罗格的鞋一样累。

String.Source: So I say, "Is that what you tell your wife?"
String.Dest: 所以我才说，“这就是你告诉你老婆的？”

String.Source: This is the back road everyone talks about. You use it to slip into Solitude, or if need be, slip out.
String.Dest: 这就是大家说的小路了。你用这条路溜进独孤城，或者说如果需要的话用它溜出来。

String.Source: Nope. It turns out they just threatened people to get what they wanted.
String.Dest: 不。原来他们只是威胁人们来得到他们想要的东西。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我想跟你交易一些东西。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下.

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 不错，你看看。

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: Go ahead.
String.Dest: Go ahead.

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟我走。

String.Source: This looks like some kind of arena. I like the way these bandits do things. Got an argument? Settle it in the pit.
String.Dest: 这看起来像某种竞技场。我喜欢这些强盗的做事方法。有矛盾？在角斗场解决。

String.Source: Alright. Let's keep to the shadows.
String.Dest: 好吧。让我们继续隐于阴影之中。

String.Source: This place is a death trap. How much do you think Danica will give us for that knife? Anything short of a 1000, I'll have to make up the difference.
String.Dest: 這地方是個死亡陷阱。你認為Danica會為了那把小刀給我們多少？除了那1000金幣，我還必須自己補上不足的部分。

String.Source: How the heck did this noisy old farmer sneak past those bandits? There's just no way.
String.Dest: 真他妈见鬼，怎么才能让这个吵闹的老农民从那群强盗旁边溜过去？我可没辙了。

String.Source: Alright, let's trade.
String.Dest: 那好，我们交换点东西。

String.Source: You gotta to watch yourself in these Forsworn camps. A witch might come out of nowhere and put a hex on you. Really, it happened to a friend of mine.
String.Dest: 你在弃誓者营地里可千万小心。说不定哪里就会冒出个鬼婆给你下咒。真的，我有个朋友就遇见了。

String.Source: You know, I got an idea. What if we agree to help both Saadia and the Alik'r? Then we rob them both of the reward money.
String.Dest: 你知道，我有个计画。不如他们俩我们都帮，然后我们把他们的奖励通通洗劫而尽。

String.Source: Huzzah, the tree's back. And now it's so skinny we can't even use it for firewood. Nope, wasn't a waste of time at all, saving that tree.
String.Dest: 万岁，这棵树又活过来了。现在它是那么的瘦弱，甚至不能用来当木材。但没关系，救这棵树，这不是浪费时间。

String.Source: Wait, so you're not mad?
String.Dest: 等等，这么说你没生气【没疯】？

String.Source: Is this hag going to stop wheezing, or am I going to have to make her stop?
String.Dest: 那老东西能别喘来喘去的么，或者我去帮她停下来？

String.Source: Sure, best we keep it light.
String.Dest: 当然，我们最好让它亮着。

String.Source: I think these bandits were targeting the mill. I'm not even going to pretend to know why.
String.Dest: 我想这些强盗对那个磨坊有所企图。但实际上我不清楚其中的原因。

String.Source: I think these bandits were targeting the mill. I'm not even going to pretend to know why.
String.Dest: 我想这些强盗对那个磨坊有所企图。但实际上我不清楚其中的原因。

String.Source: That's a shame. But you'll be back. If not for me, for the profit.
String.Dest: 这是个耻辱。但你会回来的。如果不是为了我的话，就是为了利润。

String.Source: So this bandit chief was stashing some of the loot away for himself, huh. Stealing from family's about as low as it gets.
String.Dest: 所以这个强盗头子给自己藏起了些战利品。哼，就像从家里偷东西那么低级。

String.Source: {Departs}
String.Dest: {离开 }

String.Source: Smoke some incense and talk to a Daedric Prince, huh. Sure, I'm game. Strange place for a party though.
String.Dest: 把香点上，再和魔神说话，嗯。当然，我可不怕什么，尽管在这聚会有点奇怪。

String.Source: Can't do it, sorry.
String.Dest: 不行，抱歉。

String.Source: Planting stuff just seems so backwards. We should just steal everything and punish them that way.
String.Dest: 种植原材料看起来如此的落后，我们应该透光所有的东西然后用这种方式惩罚他们。

String.Source: No point holding on to a bad marriage. Fjola reminds me of myself, except for that clunky steel armor.
String.Dest: 没有理由挽留失败的婚姻。菲欧拉让我想起了自己，除了他那身笨重的盔甲。

String.Source: I thought you'd never ask.
String.Dest: 我还以为你不会开口了呢。

String.Source: Zzzzz...
String.Dest: Zzzzz……

String.Source: Ugh, that hay pile is covered in feathers. It's like a bed full of skin flakes.
String.Dest: 呸，那个干草堆上都是羽毛。它看起来像一张洒满皮屑的的床。

String.Source: Ogre's blood, Lurgok, did you really leave your leftovers all over their sacred rocks?
String.Dest: 巨魔之血， 路卡，你真的把你那剩菜剩饭全倒在他们那些神圣的石头上了？

String.Source: These mercs aren't really loyal to the Silver-Bloods. Pay them off and they'll leave. It's not like we can't just steal it back.
String.Dest: 这些雇佣兵并不会真正效命于银血家族。付点钱就能把他们打发走。不像我们，不能直接偷回来。

String.Source: What do you need to take?
String.Dest: 你需要多长时间?

String.Source: You know how they say teach a man to fish? Somebody should have taught this kid to pick a lock. Would've saved us all a lot of trouble.
String.Dest: 你知道为嘛他们老说要授人以渔吗？应该有人教教这孩子开锁。这样就能给我们大家省去很多麻烦了。.

String.Source: Everything in the cave is running downstream. These bandits could hear us, smell us, you name it. That is, if they were actually paying attention.
String.Dest: 这山洞中的一切都会顺流而下。这些强盗可以听到我们的声音，闻到我们的气味儿，不管是什么都能传达到。如果他们真的留心的话。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: Weird. There's Falmer arrows on the ground, but they usually take hostages. No stolen goods, just an old fashioned butchering. I don't get it.
String.Dest: 离奇的是。这里有些雪精灵之箭落在地上。不过雪精灵它们通常都是搞绑架的。也没有啥货物被偷，只有一场血腥的杀戮，我有些难以明了。

String.Source: Come on, let's go talk to the chief. They said it was blood or gold, so it might as well be the one you can steal.
String.Dest: 来吧，咱们去跟首领谈谈。他们说要么是鲜血要么是金子，所以是金子的话说不定你能偷得着。

String.Source: You got orders?
String.Dest: 你接到活了？

String.Source: These fingers are your fingers.
String.Dest: 这些手指就是你的手指。

String.Source: So they call this place Widow's Watch, huh. I was almost a widow, but I couldn't live with the title. It just makes you sound old.
String.Dest: 所以他们把这地儿叫做寡妇望。嗯，我差不多是个寡妇了，但我不能顶着这大名过日子，这听起来显得太老了。

String.Source: Well, then prepare to get angry. Because like it or not, I'm springing you out of this dung hole.
String.Dest: 好了，那么留着你的脾气。因为不管你喜不喜欢，我要把你弹出这个粪坑。

String.Source: This Redguard is an idiot. The person who gets to the treasure first has nothing to do with who comes out with it. Let's let them take the lead.
String.Dest: 那个红卫人是个蠢货。谁先摸到财宝跟谁能带走财宝是两回事。让他走前面吧。

String.Source: These hives got bugs, beasts, and bodies, but not a lot of boon. But hey, maybe we'll get lucky and find a rich alchemist to buy all these eggs.
String.Dest: 这些巢穴里有虫子，野兽，死尸，就是没什么油水。不过嘛，也许运气好的话我们能找到有钱的炼金师愿意买这些蛋呢。

String.Source: Yeah...about that. You might be seeing him sooner than you think.
String.Dest: 是啊......关于这一点。你可能会很快看到他，比你想象中快得多。

String.Source: I would if I could, but I can't.
String.Dest: 如果我可以的话，我会的；但真的是心有余而力不足。

String.Source: By Nocturnal, we just got in here, and I already smell corpse. (Snickers) Worst adventurer ever.
String.Dest: 我的亲诺克图纳尔啊，我们才刚进来，就问得到尸体的气味了。（窃笑）史上最烂的冒险者。

String.Source: I'm glad the bandit tried to rob us. It saved us some awkwardness. Because there's no way I was sharing any loot with him.
String.Dest: 这些强盗能打劫我们真是太好了。这省掉了我们不少尴尬。我可不想和让他们来和我们分赃。

String.Source: Go ahead.
String.Dest: 继续。

String.Source: I say we hawk this beacon for everything it's worth. It's not like this Meridia can do anything about it, or else she wouldn't ask us to fetch it.
String.Dest: 我得说我们寻得这个灯塔的一切都是值得的。似乎美瑞蒂亚对此无能为力，否则她不会要我们帮忙取回它。

String.Source: Wow, is this some kind of arena? I like the way these bandits do things. Got an argument? Settle it in the pit, and let the rest of us gamble on it.
String.Dest: 哇哦，这是某种竞技场吗？我喜欢这些强盗的行事方法。想吵一架吗？那就在竞技场里解决，让剩下的人能借此赌上一把。

String.Source: Wait, what's the map say? "Golden Rock?" Well, where's the gold? All these shadows belong to Giants. And cheese.
String.Dest: 等等，地图上怎么说的？“金石？”我说，金子在哪里？所有这些东西都是巨人的。哦，还有奶酪。

String.Source: It doesn't matter if you can see the trap. You're still blind to the answer. Notice that pull chain above the helmet? That's what opens the gate.
String.Dest: 你看不看得到陷阱都没关系。你对回答依旧熟视无睹。看到头盔上的拉链了吗？打开口子的是它。

String.Source: Great. Give it to me.
String.Dest: 太好了。把它给我。

String.Source: Oh, so now it's okay to break into Mercer's house. Unbelievable.
String.Dest: 哦，现在可以闯进墨瑟家里了。不可思议。

String.Source: Whoever bought Goldenglow had it in for both Maven and the Guild. Which means all of Skyrim is a suspect. Hell, I'm a suspect.
String.Dest: 不知道是谁帮玛雯和公会控制了Goldenglow。这说明天际省人人都有嫌疑。妈的，我也有嫌疑。

String.Source: Damn. He's opening it. I would've killed for a chance to pick that lock.
String.Dest: 该死！让他抢先了。我早就想开那个锁想疯了。

String.Source: So that's the Nightingale Armor, huh. A lot of things come to mind when I look at you three. But "stealth" isn't one of them.
String.Dest: 看起来那就是夜莺套装嗯？一看见你们仨我的脑子里就冒出好多事。不过“潜行”不是其中之一。

String.Source: Not all of these pressure plates are rigged. You just got to figure out the pattern.
String.Dest: 不是所有紧身甲都是这样装配的。你要弄清楚结构。

String.Source: You alright? Sounds like Mercer put the knife in you. Too bad. He was just my type, and now we're going to have to cut his balls off.
String.Dest: 你还好吗？听起来像是墨瑟捅了你一刀。真糟糕。虽然他以前是我的菜，但现在我们得去把他的balls切掉。

String.Source: These priestesses have it right. I need another marriage like I need a kick in the teeth.
String.Dest: 那些女祭司拥有了它，对吧。我真需要一段新的婚姻，就好像我需要一记当头棒喝。

String.Source: I still can't get over the fact that she just gave you the horn. What's her play?
String.Dest: 我还是想不通，她仅仅是把角给你了？她可真够逗的。

String.Source: I'd trust Gulum-Ei about as far as I can throw him. For all we know Karliah is his mother. Of course, that wouldn't keep him from selling her out.
String.Dest: 我可以相信Gulum-Ei那么一点点。虽然大家知道Karliah是他妈妈，他毫无疑问是不介意坑妈的。

String.Source: It's faint, but I smell skooma on that cat. Not that you needed me to tell you.
String.Dest: 虽然很微弱，但我还是在那只猫身上闻到了斯库玛的味道。并不是说你需要我来告诉你。

String.Source: What is this, some sort of ancient fungus museum? I'm not impressed.
String.Dest: 这是啥，大约可以说是远古真菌博物馆？我看没什么了不起。

String.Source: Wow. So, that was Potema. She's famous right? I mean, I know who she is. I just want to make sure you do.
String.Dest: 哇哦，那就是Potema.。她很出名是吧？我是说，我知道她是谁，只是确认一下你也知道。

String.Source: Let me get this straight. The skeleton key Mercer stole can open any door? Hmph. What's the fun in that?
String.Dest: 让我把事情搞清楚。墨瑟偷的这把骷髅钥匙可以打开任何一扇门？哼，这有什么意思？

String.Source: There you are. You alright? Brynjolf here didn't slow you down too much, did he? I'm kidding Brynjolf, lighten up you big oaf.
String.Dest: 你在这儿啊。你还好吗？布林乔夫没耽误你太多时间对吧？【我作弄了一下布林乔夫，好让你这个呆子开心一点】。

String.Source: The Jarl doesn't give a rat's ass about what's happening in Wolfskull. That's why we shouldn't feel bad for rich people. They deserve what they get.
String.Dest: 那些贵族才不会关心狼头骨洞穴那里发生了什么。这就是为什么我对那些富人产生不了丁点儿的好感。他们那是自作自受。

String.Source: Spectres. This place makes my skin crawl.
String.Dest: 有幽灵啊。这地方让我直起鸡皮疙瘩。

String.Source: Whoever stole that horn wants to meet you? That means they've already fenced it. Otherwise we'd just take it back.
String.Dest: 那个偷了号角的人想要见你？那说明他们已经把号角给出手了吧，否则我们能借此机会把它拿回来。

String.Source: Keep that thing tucked away, will you? It messes with everything. I think I have another headache.
String.Dest: 把那东西藏起来成吗？它把一切都弄乱了。我又有个头痛的事儿了。

String.Source: Is this like the vampire way of marking their territory? Because I smell blood everywhere. On the walls, on the floor...hot, sweet, and sticky.
String.Dest: 这就像是吸血鬼标记领地的方式吗？因为到处都是血腥味儿。墙上，地上……热，甜，黏。

String.Source: I could've told you this place was a waste of time. That is, if my tongue wasn't frozen solid.
String.Dest: 我铁定得告诉你在这里就是浪费时间。铁定的，如果我的舌头没被冻成冰块儿的话。

String.Source: Whatever Mercer's up to, it's bigger than any heist we've pulled up to this point. And our cut is that much more if we don't tell Brynjolf.
String.Dest: 无论墨瑟暗中做了什么，这都比我们迄今为止经历的任何一次抢劫要严重得多。 如果我们再不告诉布林乔夫，我们的损失就要更多了。

String.Source: I don't know much about art, but I know what I like. And I like this wall.
String.Dest: 我不太懂艺术，但我知道我喜欢什么，我喜欢这个。

String.Source: I don't understand why we can't just break into the Thalmor Embassy. I mean, all this bootlicking and playing dress up...it's just wrong.
String.Dest: 我不明白为什么我们不直接硬闯梭莫大使馆。我是说，所有这些拍他们马屁，盛装打扮的行为……它们全都是错的。

String.Source: I don't even want to reach into some of these pockets. These slaves probably keep all sorts of weird mementos.
String.Dest: 我甚至不想掏其中一些人的口袋。这些奴隶可能还留着各种各样稀奇古怪的纪念品呢。

String.Source: Paarthu-what? You mean to tell me there's an even grayer beard, who lives up on an even higher mountain? This is just insane.
String.Dest: 帕图——啥？你是想告诉我还有个更灰的胡子在一座更高的山上过活？这简直是疯了。

String.Source: So they've got you running collection? What, did Dirge break a nail?
String.Dest: 所以他们让你管理那些收藏品？等等，难道挽歌受伤了？

String.Source: So this mystery backer was trying to split up the guild and Maven Black-Briar? We ought to be giving him a medal.
String.Dest: 那么这个神秘的支持者是想要离间工会和黑荆棘玛雯？我们该给他发个奖章。

String.Source: The Greybeards put an awful lot of faith in Klimmek. What if he decides he's sick of climbing? I'm sick of it already, and we haven't even started.
String.Dest: 灰胡子对科林麦抱有的希望太高了不是吗？要是他厌倦爬山了怎么办？你瞧瞧我，我还没开爬呢就已经烦透了。

String.Source: This is a cold place to live. If I were these bandits, I wouldn't chop firewood. I'd set flame to that entire ship. But only after looting it.
String.Dest: 这地方可真冷。如果我是那些强盗的话，我才不会去砍柴禾，我会把整艘船都烧了！当然是在洗劫完那艘船之后。

String.Source: What a stupid place to hide your treasure. I feel dumber having just been in this cave.
String.Dest: 你是有多傻才会把财宝藏在这个地方。一进这个洞我都不知道要说什么了。

String.Source: I smell grapes. And ugh...how old is that cheese?
String.Dest: 我都闻到一股酸葡萄味儿了……呃，那块儿奶酪你搁了多久了？

String.Source: I hate men like Savos, sitting around reading books all day. Someone should tell Arch-Mage Mirabelle that he's sleeping in her bed.
String.Dest: 我真是烦死萨沃斯那样的人了，整天窝在椅子里啃书本.真该有个人去和米拉贝勒大师说这货正躺在她的床上.

String.Source: Bandit blood. Always a little weirdness in the smell, on account of all the crap they're putting in their mouths.
String.Dest: 强盗的血。里面总有股怪味儿，好像闻得出他们整天吃的都是些什么垃圾。

String.Source: You should take Vex's advice. Breaking and entering is sort of her thing. That and being a bitch. Both good reasons to do as she says.
String.Dest: 你应该听取Vex的意见。破门而入是她做的出来的事。不管是这一点还是考虑到她是个婊子。这两个都是照她说的做的好理由。

String.Source: That was by far the weirdest bar fight I've ever been a part of. But not the bloodiest.
String.Dest: 这是迄今为止我参与过的最奇怪的酒吧打架。但不是最血腥的。

String.Source: I know what you're thinking, but you can't replace me with some magic key. And you're going to have to return it anyway.
String.Dest: 我知道你是在想什么，但是你不能用我去换那所谓的魔法匙。还有，很快你便不得不把它还回去。

String.Source: For a second I thought the shadows on the floor moved. This whole place is shaky, and seeing bones everywhere doesn't help.
String.Dest: 有那么一瞬间我以为地板上的影子在动，整个空间都在摇晃，【就算看见四处散落的骨头也没用。】

String.Source: So, what'd you find in that Embassy? And I'm not talking about information.
String.Dest: 那么，你去那大使馆要找的是什么？我说的可不是指情报。

String.Source: I wonder if there's gems and things in the wall. Like Alduin's eye is some priceless ruby. Damn, now I'm actually excited to touch it.
String.Dest: 我想知道这墙上挂的东西是不是宝石之类的东西。比如说不定奥杜因的眼睛就是某种无价的红宝石做的。该死，我现在都忍不住想去摸摸它了。

String.Source: This is a good place to hide. Lots of deep shadows. Still, it's a stupid place to live. Are we saving this old fool from the Thalmor, or himself?
String.Dest: 这是个躲藏的好地方。很多深重的阴影。可是这也不是个生活的好地方。你是要从梭默手中救出那个老傻瓜呢？还是任他自生自灭呢？

String.Source: Alright, who let the crazy person out of his cage?
String.Dest: 好吧，是谁把那疯子从笼子里放出来的？

String.Source: Ugh. The air around here is disgusting. It's like mushrooms trying to bed each other. I'll just be back here sneezing.
String.Dest: 呃啊，这里的空气令人作呕。闻起来就像叠的密密麻麻的蘑菇。我待会一定会打喷嚏的。

String.Source: Well, I'm glad that's over with. Being around old people makes me want to slit my wrists.
String.Dest: 呼，终于结束了。身边被一群老大爷围着搞得我都想割腕自杀了。

String.Source: I don't know what you did in that Twilight whats-it-called, but everything's different. Like the shadows are darker, and I can see more clearly.
String.Dest: 我不知道你在黄昏什么什么的地方干了啥，但一切都不同了。就算阴影愈发晦暗，我也能看清一切。

String.Source: Ugh! The vault smells like the inside of Delvin's boot. No wonder nobody ever went inside.
String.Dest: 呸，难怪没人进来，这地下室闻起来就像是戴文鞋子里的味道

String.Source: I like how it took you seconds to master what these old milkbeards have been studying their whole lives. What a bunch of losers.
String.Dest: 我就喜欢看你用几秒钟就学会那群老奶油胡子学了一辈子的东西。一群废物。

String.Source: So is this High Hrothgar? Doesn't look like a monastery to me, and I haven't seen one person with a beard. Shouldn't they be waiting for us?
String.Dest: 这就是高吼峰? 在我看来不像是个修道院, 我也没有看到有人留胡子. 他们不是应该在等我们吗?

String.Source: No wonder me and the Thieves Guild never saw eye to blind. You mess with Nocturnal, I slit your throat.
String.Dest: 难怪我和盗贼工会互翻白眼。你敢惹诺克图娜尔，我便割开你的喉咙。

String.Source: Rats...bugs...seriously, who wants to drink Honningbrew after smelling this armpit of a meadery?
String.Dest: 扯淡……太疯狂了……老实说，谁会愿意在闻完的酒庄里的那些肮脏的角落之后再喝蜜酒？

String.Source: There's a lot of weirdos living in the Ratway. A lot of rats too, but that goes about saying.
String.Dest: 鼠道里住着很多奇怪的人。也有很多老鼠，不过那完全不是一码事。

String.Source: Stupid old man. Even I can see all of this is trash.
String.Dest: 老蠢猪。我甚至能看见所有的这些垃圾。

String.Source: Just solve the damn puzzle Esbern. Save the speech.
String.Dest: 解决那个烦人的伊斯本。挽救这次演讲。

String.Source: So let me get this straight. We get to keep everything...and she gets a piece of paper? Deal's a deal, you stupid wench.
String.Dest: 让我捋一捋这件事。我们没什么损失……而她只得到了一片纸？生意而已，你个蠢女人。

String.Source: Something smells rotten in this inn. Although it's not like there's anywhere else to live. The buildings have more holes than a sailor's smile.
String.Dest: 这旅馆里有股什么东西腐烂的味道。虽然并不像是有人住的样子。这屋子上的破洞比水手笑脸上的坑还要多。

String.Source: Fetch this, deliver that. Companion work sounds a lot like courier work to me.
String.Dest: 拿着这个，传递那个。团队合作对于我来说更像是快递工作。

String.Source: Can't pick a pocket? Smash a skull. I mean, you do realize everyone here is someone who couldn't cut it as a thief? Now you're one of them.
String.Dest: 钱包都摸不到？动动脑子吧。我的意思是，你发现在座的都是笨手笨脚的蠢贼了么？现在你也成他们的一员了。

String.Source: I hate Draugr. All dried and shriveled up. Things without blood are just unnatural.
String.Dest: 我讨厌尸鬼。它们全都萎缩而干枯。无血的东西是违背自然的。

String.Source: This level reeks of blood. Smells like some trolls were having themselves a festival. No way a skeleton leaves that kind of mess.
String.Dest: 这一层的空气全是血腥味。闻着好像有多少巨魔在这里开宴会一样。这样的事恐怕连骨头都很难剩下。

String.Source: All those Companions and they couldn't save the old man? This family only cares about themselves.
String.Dest: 整个战友团那么多人居然保不住那位老人的命？这个团队都是些自私的家伙。

String.Source: Wow, its like they built the floor out of pressure plates. Now this is more like it!
String.Dest: 哇，那就像建造空中阁楼。现在更像了！

String.Source: Dream eaters? This Mara priest is crazy. We should keep him around for comic relief.
String.Dest: 食梦者？这个玛拉牧师可真疯了。我们应该让他留在这里当做有趣的调剂品。

String.Source: Not bad for an amateur. You've caught Brynjolf's eye. Good. With my hair cut short and Nocturnal's luck, he'll keep it fixed on you, and not me.
String.Dest: 对于外行来说你做的不错。Brynjolf已经开始关注你了。很好。我头发剪短了，还有Nocturna的运气在你这边他会继续关注你的，而不是我。

String.Source: Wait a minute. There's four levers but only three symbols. Agh, these puzzles make my head hurt.
String.Dest: 等一下先。这儿有四个控制杆可是只有3个标记。嗄，这些迷题真让我头疼。

String.Source: Lessons are boring. Magic is boring. Not enough blood.
String.Dest: 【课程挺无聊的。魔法也挺无聊的，它们都没有足够的流血事件。】

String.Source: Wow. Look at all those coffins, jammed in there sideways. Kind of crowded though. Our cemetery's going to be just us family.
String.Dest: 喔。看看那些棺材，挤挤攘攘地放在一边。看起来真拥挤。我们的墓地只会安葬家人。

String.Source: All this trouble for a bunch of books no one understands. I don't get mages. Even their thieves are sniveling cowards.
String.Dest: 没人能理解这些书所带来的所有问题。我不清楚法师们怎么想。但就连他们的贼都会鄙视懦夫。

String.Source: Don't look at me for help, oath-sister. You don't keep me around for my mind. No one's that stupid.
String.Dest: 别找我帮忙，誓约姐妹。我可不会留在你身边。没人会做那种蠢事的。

String.Source: Alright, this guy we're helping...Stalleo? Now that has to be a made-up name.
String.Dest: 好吧，我们所帮助的那个人叫...斯塔莱奥吗？现在看来这是个假名字啊。

String.Source: Look at this crazy skull collection. I love it. I mean, why not? Mounting bear heads is just as weird. That chest's rigged, by the way.
String.Dest: 看看这个疯狂的头骨收藏吧！我爱它。我是说，为什么不爱呢？那个熊头装饰有够奇怪的吧。顺便一提，它就是那箱子开启的机关。

String.Source: The townsfolk here actually think you stopped their nightmares. People are idiots.
String.Dest: 这里的居民竟然以为是你停止了他们的噩梦。这帮人都是白痴。

String.Source: I bet you forty septims this talking light ball changed his name after the fact. There's no way anyone takes him seriously if his name's Sven.
String.Dest: 我跟你赌40个金币，这个说话的光球事后改了他的名字。如果他的名字是胡德，就没人会把他当回事儿。

String.Source: See, this is what I'm talking about. This guy is the leader, the richest one here. And what do I find in his pockets? An apple. A sodding apple.
String.Dest: 看，这就是我想说的。这家伙是个领导者，这旮沓地儿最富的那个人。而我在他口袋里翻到了什么？一个苹果。他妈的就一个苹果。

String.Source: Alright, so we helped the old man. Big deal. I want some boon. Let's raid Ysgramor coffin before the Aela the Spear-Chin complains.
String.Dest: 好的，那我们就帮这个老人的忙吧。这很重要。我想做些好事。那咱就在枪锋艾拉开始抱怨之前赶紧撬开伊斯格拉谟的棺材吧。

String.Source: Don't look at me for help, oath-brother. You don't keep me around for my mind. No one's that stupid.
String.Dest: 别看着我帮忙，誓言兄弟。别让我迷糊了。没人那么傻。

String.Source: Move aside, I think I've got this figured out. Just match the pictures right? Wait, something's different about these. Agh...forget I said anything.
String.Dest: 闪边去，我想我已经明白怎么回事了。只要和图案相符就行了对吧？等等，有什么地方不对劲…啊，当我没说。

String.Source: I smell blood. Everywhere. And it's mixed with saliva.
String.Dest: 我闻到血腥味了。这味道无处不在。而且还混合着唾液的味道。

String.Source: This place smells strange. Like burnt ash and old rust. And is that a pickaxe? Mages are so weird.
String.Dest: 这地方闻起来很奇怪，就像烧焦的灰尘和古老的金属锈迹一样。那是鹤嘴锄吗？法师真是怪异啊。

String.Source: So this Orthorn stole some books to ditch the guild for some weirdos. Sounds like a loser. What? Don't look at me like that. I'm nothing like him.
String.Dest: 那这个奥松恩有怪癖，偷一些书丢在公会里。听起来就像那些人生不得意的人一样。干嘛？别这样看着我。我跟他不一样。

String.Source: This place smells like blood, steam, and oil. Just like every Dwarven ruin. Except there's a faint smell of ash too.
String.Dest: 这地方充斥着鲜血，蒸汽，汽油混合在一起的味道。就跟所有锻模遗迹一样。不过闻起来也稍微有些灰尘味儿。

String.Source: Figures Tolfdir was a corpse lover. Why else would he want to be alone with all those bodies? The old man's a freak.
String.Dest: 鉴于托夫迪尔是个恋尸癖，为什么在有了那些尸体之后他还会想和别人在一起？这老头就是个变态。

String.Source: Who do you think this was, lying in the sun all day. Some Nord chief or something?
String.Dest: 你认为这位成天躺着晒日光浴的人是谁。一位诺德酋长还是别的谁？

String.Source: Ugh, I think that thing slimed me.
String.Dest: 呃，我觉得有什么东西黏在了身上。

String.Source: Whoa, did that just happen? I got chills from that fight. It was better than any man I've ever had.
String.Dest: 嚯啊，刚刚发生一切都是真的吗？我【这场仗】打得都发抖了。这是我【遇见过】最厉害的一个。

String.Source: You know what Orthorn, your Arch-Mage doesn't even know you exist. That's how insignificant you are. Face it, you're a test subject. Kill yourself.
String.Dest: 你听说了吗 Orthorn，你们首席大法师根本不知道有你这么个人。你就是这么的【被无视】。接受现实吧，你是一个实验品。自己了断吧。

String.Source: The shadows here are off. There's some kind of smoke too, but I can't smell it. In fact, all I smell is fur.
String.Dest: 这里的暗影已经消退。还有些烟雾，不过我闻不到了。其实，我能闻到的只有毛皮的味道。

String.Source: Hey Anska, why don't you grab that soul gem over there. Grab it before it hits you with a spell. Then maybe stand by those coffins. Idiot.
String.Dest: 嘿，安斯卡，你干嘛不把那只灵魂石给抓住呢，至少在它用魔法击中你之前抓住它们嘛，不然你就得跟这堆棺材一样直挺挺地竖在这儿一辈子了哟。蠢货。

String.Source: Why can't these alchemists stay alive for once? It's no fun pilfering from a corpse.
String.Dest: 为什么那些炼金术士们就不能活上一次呢？从死人身上偷东西一点都不好玩。

String.Source: Looks like this is one lock I can't pick. Alright, you take down the wall. There's an ugly hunk of Elven treasure inside with both our names on it.
String.Dest: 看起来这个锁我撬不开。好吧，你还是把墙给拆了吧。里面那个丑陋大个头精灵的财宝已经是我们的囊中之物啦！

String.Source: It doesn't look like they left any hostages. Didn't leave any wine either, judging by those empty racks. Wonder which one Stalleo will miss more.
String.Dest: 看来他们没留下人质。从那狼藉的架子来看，也没有下一滴酒。猜猜看斯塔莱奥会更想念他们中的哪个呢。

String.Source: Look at these bloodsuckers, thirsty for revenge. I say we open these cages and give it to them.
String.Dest: 看看这些吸血鬼，饥渴于复仇。我说，把笼子打开让他们上吧。

String.Source: I don't know about all this stuff about witches, werewolves and curses, but if you've got bad blood, it's always best to spill it.
String.Dest: 关于女巫、狼人、诅咒那些杂七杂八我不是很懂。但是如果你心怀怨恨，发泄出来总归是比较好的。

String.Source: Looks like I was wrong about Orthorn. He had a use after all.
String.Dest: 看来我错看奥松恩了。不管怎么说他还算有点用。

String.Source: Alright Orthorn, I'm officially stumped. How is it you're still alive? Because you're completely useless. This Caller must be your sister.
String.Dest: 好吧奥松恩，我真的没辙了。你怎么还活着？你已经完全没用了。Caller肯定是你的姐姐。

String.Source: Smell that? I love it when the bandits do all the cooking for us. Not much of a menu though. I hope you like salmon steak.
String.Dest: 闻到没？虽然没什么好菜，但是强盗替我们做饭真是太让我开心了。希望你爱吃鲑鱼。

String.Source: Forget the old man and his older friend. We need to loot everything we can before that cat does. He's fast, but we're faster. Well, I am anyway.
String.Dest: 忘了那个老人和他更老的朋友吧。我们需要在那只猫之前夺走一切我们能带走的东西。他很快，但我们更快。好吧，至少我更快。

String.Source: I like you Enthir. Didn't think I'd find someone like you hanging out with these bookworms.
String.Dest: 我喜欢你Enthir。没想到我会找个像你这样的书呆子与我相伴。

String.Source: Are those things in the display case worth anything? They're shiny like gems, but I can't tell the difference when it comes to mage stuff.
String.Dest: 那些摆在陈列柜里展示的东西有啥值钱的吗？他们都跟宝石似的闪闪发光，但我不看不出它们跟法师的东西有啥不同。

String.Source: Well, I'm sure Grosta will be comforted by the fact that her worthless husband died a gruesome death.
String.Dest: 嗯，我敢肯定格罗斯塔会因她那无能的丈夫的惨死而感到宽慰。

String.Source: This room smells like the College, but different. Can't really explain it, but it's giving me a headache all the same.
String.Dest: 这个房间闻起来跟学院一个味儿，但又有所不同。真是只可意会不可言传，总之它们都让我头疼的厉害。

String.Source: When I was a girl, I thought temples like these were a great place to pick pockets. Turns out half the people in here are beggars.
String.Dest: 我还是个小女孩的时候，我曾想过像这样的寺庙是一个偷东西的绝佳地方。结果在这里一般的人都是乞丐。

String.Source: My head hurts just looking at all these books. I wish I could go back in time and kill whoever invented them.
String.Dest: 我看到这些书就头疼. 真想回到过去把写这些书的人全杀掉.

String.Source: Kolskeggr Mine's just about the only one around Markarth that isn't owned by the Silver-Bloods. Of course it has problem with the Forsworn.
String.Dest: 科斯凯格矿场差不多是马卡斯城周围唯一不属于银血家族的矿场了。当然，弃誓者们也经常找它的麻烦。

String.Source: Oh good, an angry mob. I've always wanted to participate in one of these. Usually I'm the one they're chasing.
String.Dest: 哦好啊，一个愤怒的暴民。我其实一直想参与其中的，虽然一般来讲我会是那个被他们追的人。

String.Source: I love the small hours. People were meant to stay up all night, and sleep until noon.
String.Dest: 我喜欢后半夜的时间。人们晚上就应该都通宵，然后都睡到中午起床。

String.Source: You made it out of Cidhna Mine. Just so you know, I would've been willing to kill another husband to help you escape.
String.Dest: 你想把它带出希讷矿坑。如你所知，我一直愿意杀了另一个丈夫来帮助你逃跑。

String.Source: So a miner attacks a woman, and the guards waste no time killing him. Why not put him to work in Cidhna Mine? Was he overqualified?
String.Dest: 这么说是个矿工去袭击一个女人，而守卫二话没说就把他杀了 。为什么不把他扔进希讷矿坑干活去？是他资质过高了吗？

String.Source: Blood on the floor, statues with holes in them. There's no way this trap can be that obvious.
String.Dest: 染满鲜血的阶梯，布满小孔的雕像。这陷阱也不至于如此显眼吧。

String.Source: (Snicker) Look at this fool, trying to play blacksmith. I've met skeevers who had more skill with a hammer.
String.Dest: （窃笑）看看这白痴，还想玩铁匠的活儿。我见过的雪鼠都比他更会用锤子。

String.Source: Dwarves are tricky little bastards. Weight based traps. Better to leave something in each chest, so they think it's full. And no, scraps don't work.
String.Dest: 矮人都是狡猾的小混蛋。专注陷阱若干年。他们爱在每个箱子里都藏点儿东西，以为这就齐活了。嘿，报废了的东西可不会工作。

String.Source: Bugs, toads, mushrooms. Is any of the stuff in this grove worth anything? Alchemists. Forest beggars is what they are.
String.Dest: 臭虫，蟾蜍，蘑菇。难道这片树林的任何材料都有价值吗？炼金术士，还是叫他们森林乞丐好了。

String.Source: Look at this town. Like the back end of a mammoth. I don't even know what a Sybil is, but it can't be any worse than this place.
String.Dest: 看看这个小镇，就像猛犸的屁股，我都不知道【Sybil】是什么，但肯定再没有地方比这儿更糟了。

String.Source: Thane of Hjaalmarch. That's like being crowned King of the Horkers. Nothing worth celebrating.
String.Dest: 希雅陲的领主。这就好比是三牙海象的加冕之王。没什么值得庆祝的。

String.Source: I heard about this dungeon. Soldiers would throw prisoners down a pit. If you survived, you were free. The joke was, no one ever could.
String.Dest: 我听说过这个地牢。狱卒们会把囚犯丢到一个深井里。如果还活着，你就自由了。可问题是，没人能活下来。

String.Source: Movarth dead, city saved. That should be worth a home, a sack of gold, and a housecarl for the each of us. At least.
String.Dest: 莫瓦斯死了，城市也保住了。这应该值得给我们每人一套房子，一袋黄金和一个侍卫了。至少的。

String.Source: Meeko, is it? Is that a boy's name or a girl's? We should bring it along either way. Might prove handy in battle, or in our stomachs.
String.Dest: 米科，是吗？是男孩名还是女孩名？不管怎样我们都应该带它走。也许打仗时会有点用，或者在你肚子里有点用。

String.Source: The Dwarves sure know how to waste a lot of space. Look at the size of this cavern, and there's nothing inside it save Falmer.
String.Dest: 矮人肯定知道如何浪费很大的空间。看看这洞的大小吧，结果这里也没能住进几个雪精灵。

String.Source: This vampire had a boot for every day of the month. Might want to check the insides, maybe he stashed something. Just pray it's not sticky.
String.Dest: 这个吸血鬼一个月每天有只不同的鞋子。应该再到里面看看，说不定他还藏着什么，不过千万别是黏糊糊的。

String.Source: By Zenithar, look at that vault. And it's guarded by what, the help? This is the kind of house that makes me moist.
String.Dest: 泽尼萨尔在上，看那个金库。它被什么守卫着，【帮助】着呢？这种房子真是让我热泪盈眶。

String.Source: Roggi Knot-Beard? That's obviously a made up name.
String.Dest: 罗吉·结须 ?这显然是个随口胡诌的名字嘛。

String.Source: This Dunmer ranger hardly makes any shadow at all. Or rather, her body is the shadow. Not bad.
String.Dest: 这个黑暗精灵游侠几乎没有尝试融入任何的阴影之中。或者说，她的身体就是阴影。真不赖。

String.Source: Crazy witch. Didn't even try and buy you off first. First thing I would've done.
String.Dest: 疯狂的巫师。想都没想就先买下了你。我应该第一个这么做的。

String.Source: Blood everywhere, and another dead researcher. No wonder Calcelmo stays outside. It must pain him to be so far from his precious Dwarves.
String.Dest: 满地都是血，还有另外两个死去的研究者。怪不得卡赛默会呆在外面。如此远离他心爱的矮人们一定伤透了他的心。

String.Source: We'll take that claw off your hands, thank you very much.
String.Dest: 我们都忍不住想跟你握一下爪了，真是太感谢你了。

String.Source: Mages, bards, and now us. This is officially now the weirdest tavern in Skyrim. Heh, that's a good thing. Sometimes, weird is a good thing.
String.Dest: 法师们，吟遊诗人们，现在再加上我们。现在这可是公认的天际省最怪异的酒馆儿了。嘿，这可是件好事儿。有时候，怪异是件好事儿。

String.Source: The Silver-Bloods are right about one thing. You don't secure a prison with locks. You do it with gold.
String.Dest: 银血算是做对了一件事。你真不用为了安全考虑就去给一个牢笼加锁。你这么做还得花钱。

String.Source: Did you remember to loot Eltrys' body? We ought to hit his house next. Where did he live, anyway? The Warrens? Damn. Never mind.
String.Dest: 你还记得要去抢艾崔斯的尸体吗？我们接下来应该去他家碰碰运气。但是，他住哪儿啊？贫民窟吗？该死的。别放在心上。

String.Source: With Kodlak dead, the Companions will need a new Harbinger. How convenient for you.
String.Dest: 克拉科去了，于是战友团需要一名新的预言者。 (窃笑)对你而言倒是省事儿了。

String.Source: That weapon lacks finesse. You seem like the type who uses a battleaxe to cut butter. You know, the type who overcompensates.
String.Dest: 那柄武器耍起来不需要什么技巧。你看着像那种砍个什么东西都要提把战斧只求痛快的人。那种极度自慢的人，你懂的。

String.Source: Ugh. I hate watching you sneak. You have to crouch more, like your bootlaces are tied to your earlobes. Stay low. Think low.
String.Dest: 哼。你这也叫潜行吗。你得蹲的再低点，就像你的鞋带能绑上你的耳朵那么低。保持低姿态。时刻想着放低姿态。

String.Source: Her shadow was faint, but there was a shadow. I knew she wasn't a ghost. Didn't fool me for a second.
String.Dest: 她的影子很模糊，但并没有消失。于是我明白了她并不是一个幽灵，她骗不过我的眼睛。

String.Source: Yeesh. You've got guts to walk around with that mace strapped to your belt. Fashion sense? Gods no. But guts? Yeah.
String.Dest: 是~~啊。你够胆儿就把狼牙棒挂在腰带上出去溜溜。时尚感？呵呵。但勇气？是啊，你很勇敢。

String.Source: Man, everywhere we go we end up killing half a dozen people. You're a damn spider, and the flies can't help but aim for your web.
String.Dest: 哥们儿，不论走到哪儿我们都不免会干掉半小打人。你就他丫就是只蜘蛛，那些苍蝇从来都只会往你的网上撞。

String.Source: Okay, I get you want to help the Dibellan harlots find their god baby, but we're still coming back for the statue, right?
String.Dest: 好吧，我明白你想帮迪贝拉的妓女们找到他们的圣婴，但我们还是得为那雕像回来，对吗？

String.Source: I don't need to tell you who Hroggar reminds me of. (Scoffs) Men. They all need their eyes plucked out. Only way to keep them from wandering.
String.Dest: 我不需要告诉你是赫鲁加提醒的我。(嘲讽) 傻逼。他们的眼睛都需要挖出来。这是唯一让他们保持傻逼的办法。

String.Source: From what I gather, nobody sleeps here, but the owner leaves her supplies overnight. Upstairs door will make for an ideal exit too.
String.Dest: 就我所知，没人睡在这儿，但物主把她的补给品放在这儿过夜。楼上的门也很方便逃跑。

String.Source: This house has some good loot, but we'd better fence it before it starts flying around again.
String.Dest: 这个房子有些不错的战利品,但我们最好在它再次飞起来前插死他.

String.Source: The Winking Skeever. I could use a good skeever steak right about now. What? Meat's meat.
String.Dest: 眨眼雪鼠。看来我可以吃到上好的雪鼠排了。啥？肉就是肉啊。

String.Source: So is this the house that burned down? Because it should've been.
String.Dest: 这就是那座被烧毁的房子吧？因为看来它是被烧过的

String.Source: I don't like the way that bard is looking at me. I might just pluck out his eyes if he keeps staring.
String.Dest: 那个 吟遊诗人 看着别扭。要是他再盯着我们就把他眼珠子挖出来。

String.Source: Look at all this junk. Just out in the open, waiting to be stolen, and nothing worth getting into a crouch over.
String.Dest: 看看这些垃圾吧。到处散落着，根本便不值得弯腰，何况是特意去偷。

String.Source: So, are you like some kind of archer or something? Don't like to get messy, huh. But daggers are cleaner, if you have the skill to use it.
String.Dest: 那么说来，你是弓箭手还是别的什么? 不喜欢麻烦，呃…但是如果你有本事去用的话，即便匕首也可算得上割草利器。

String.Source: Why does the big ugly shadow get to boss around the other ones? He's just as dirty and poor as they are.
String.Dest: 为什么反倒是那个又丑又肥的影子能从这些人里脱颖而出当上老大的？他跟他们一样脏也一样穷啊。

String.Source: Advances in Lockpicking. I had that book read to me once. It's firewood. Everyone knows gold picks are softer than copper, and better for bent locks.
String.Dest: 开锁进阶。那本书我读过一次了。是柴火。大家都知道金质开锁器要比铜质开锁器质地要软，也更容易把锁给扭开。

String.Source: What a worthless lock. Which means it's a worthless treasure. Damn Nords are just toying with us now, building this mausoleum around nothing.
String.Dest: 这锁一钱不值。换句话说，里头的宝物也一文不名。该死的诺德人空造一座壮丽的古坟，就只是为了耍我们。

String.Source: Ugh, that spider spit on me. This is going to take weeks to get rid of the stink.
String.Dest: 唔，蜘蛛朝我吐毒液了。要消掉这股味道可要几周呢。

String.Source: There's a general goods store around here, Bits and Pieces I think. Sell the robes and take the coin. Faster that way.
String.Dest: 这附近有个杂货铺，我记得是叫“零零碎碎”。去把长袍卖掉好了，这样快一点。

String.Source: So this Laelette, she gets bitten by Alva, then she's told to kill this kid but ends up trying to adopt her? This just gets weirder and weirder.
String.Dest: 所以这个拉莱特，她被阿尔瓦咬了，还被告知要杀掉这孩子，但最终却想收养她吗？真是越来越奇怪。

String.Source: What is that awful noise? It sounds like a horker giving birth to a Sload. Is that...is that an Orc bard?
String.Dest: 这可怕的声音到底是什么？听起来就像一只三牙海象正在分娩出一只蛤蟆人。难道说……这是那个兽人吟遊诗人?

String.Source: Let's go pick some pockets, Thane of the Reach. If a guard makes a fuss, you just remind him who really feeds his family.
String.Dest: 让我们去掏些人的口袋吧，瑞驰的男爵大人。如果守卫们大惊小怪的，你只要提点他到底是谁真正养活着他的一家子就行啦。

String.Source: I don't like playing the informant, but I do like stealing. This is so confusing.
String.Dest: 你不喜欢告密，但我却爱偷听，真是纠结。

String.Source: These Nord forts always have a rear entrance. Although this one's built on the edge of a mountain, so who knows.
String.Dest: 这些诺德人的要塞通常都有一个后部入口。经管这个要塞建在了山崖边上，但是谁知道呢。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: There's blood on the ground here, and it smells sweet. Someone left a skull, a book, a staff, and...an arrow? What's the arrow for? I don't get it.
String.Dest: 这地上有血迹, 闻上去还新鲜. 这留下一个骷髅, 一本书, 一根棍子,和...一支箭? 箭干嘛用? 我搞不懂.

String.Source: Damn you!
String.Dest: 混蛋！

String.Source: I know these shadows, and I know that smell. Sleeping tree sap. We could make a small fortune bottling and selling it to the cat caravans.
String.Dest: 我认识这些阴影，也知道那种气味。沉睡之树的汁液。 我们把它用瓶子装起来卖给虎人商队能赚一笔大钱。

String.Source: Not all blind people can see. Some of them are too busy trying to open their eyes.
String.Dest: 不是所有的盲人都有视觉，他们中的一些人总是太过于忙碌以至于忘了去试着睁开眼睛。

String.Source: Stupid bandits. Whoever they were waiting for either escaped with the treasure or died chasing it.
String.Dest: 那帮白痴强盗。他们等的那些人要不就已经在寻找财宝的过程中死了，要不就已经带着财宝远走高飞了。

String.Source: This Severio guy went from a Legion warrior to a cabbage farmer. If I ever lose the taste for adventure, just slit my throat.
String.Dest: 这位Severio从帝国军战士变成了圆白菜农夫。要是我有一天没兴趣冒险，就自己抹脖子算了。

String.Source: Is that a piece of dirty cheese? People have the strangest bedtime habits.
String.Dest: 这是一块肮脏的奶酪吗？人类有着最奇怪的睡觉习惯.

String.Source: Bards are nice, but stupid. A lot of them work for free.
String.Dest: 吟遊诗人都是好人，也都够蠢的。他们有很多都是免费服务。

String.Source: An inn. Great, I could use a good nap.
String.Dest: 一家旅店。太好了。我可以睡个踏实的午觉了。

String.Source: This must be where the bandits stockpile their goods. That chest is as big as the Katariah. My mouth's watering just looking at it.
String.Dest: 這裡一定就是強盜們藏戰利品的地方。這箱子大的跟卡塔瑞亞號一樣。光是看著這些，我嘴裡的口水就流個不停。

String.Source: Candles, set up in circles like some kind of ritual. Whatever's at the end of this cave won't be pretty.
String.Dest: 把蜡烛放在圈子里就像某种仪式。但不管怎样，这个洞穴最终都不会变漂亮点儿。

String.Source: Hunters are the worst. You dip your hands in their pockets and it's either soggy meat or a bear trap.
String.Dest: 猎人是最糟糕的目标，你就算把手伸进了他们的口袋，能掏出来的也只有湿哒哒的肉或者熊皮。

String.Source: Do your worst!
String.Dest: 你还是做好最坏的打算吧！

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: The food here smells foul. But then it isn't really food, is it?
String.Dest: 这食物闻起来臭死了。但它不是我们真正的食物，对吧？

String.Source: Oh look, the Orcs turned this keep into a Stronghold. And here I thought these forts couldn't get any more droll.
String.Dest: 噢，看呐，兽人们把这些存进了要塞。这些要塞让我觉得再滑稽不过了。

String.Source: I don't say this often, but we should kill him. Trust this greedy Elf and I'll slit both your throats on principle.
String.Dest: 我一般不这样说，但我们必须得杀了他。（如果继续）相信这个贪婪的精灵那我就按照规定把你们俩的喉咙都给撕了。

String.Source: Agh! Enough! This ends now!
String.Dest: 嘿！够了！已经结束了！

String.Source: Hello secret passageway! And look at all those traps! One trap means good treasure. Three or four? Looks like meat on the table tonight.
String.Dest: 你好啊，密道！看看这些陷阱！一个陷阱意味着珍贵的宝藏。如果有三个或是更多？看起来就像是今晚摆在餐桌上的肉。

String.Source: Damn, smells good in here. One thing about pyromancers...they can roast a piece of meat.
String.Dest: 该死的，那儿闻起来真香。看来那里有烈焰术士……他们可以烤肉的。

String.Source: So as Thane, you get a "House Carl?" Well, I hope this Carl knows how to cook. Where's he hiding, anyway? You around here, Carl?
String.Dest: 身为贵族，你却请了个“侍卫”的？呃，我希望这个粗人会做饭。总之，他藏哪儿啦？你在这儿吗？ Carl?

String.Source: These Orcs didn't trust each other one bit. Everyone has their own little corner, and their own personal treasure chest.
String.Dest: 这些兽人一点儿也不信任彼此。每个人都打着自己的小九九儿，也藏着他们自己的小金库。

String.Source: You need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 你需要做得更好！

String.Source: Agh! Bastard!
String.Dest: 啊！混蛋！

String.Source: You pray at a Shrine like this, you're basically inviting the Thalmor into your pants. These people should've known better.
String.Dest: 你在这样的神社祈祷，基本上等同于邀请梭默随便强X你。这些人应该知道得更清楚。

String.Source: Two men are fighting over her? I suppose she's pretty, but so is a portrait. They both wear a lot of paint.
String.Dest: 两个男人为她而争斗? 我想她很漂亮，可惜这只不过是一幅虚幻的画像。他们两个都为此增添了不少的浓墨重彩呢。

String.Source: So, with the old man dead, the others are distracted. Now's the time to hit Jorrvaskr. Your shield-family never liked you anyway.
String.Dest: 所以，随着这个老家伙的死去，其他的人都心烦意乱。现在是个攻打月瓦斯卡的好时机。反正你的盾牌家人从来也没喜欢过你。

String.Source: By Nocturnal, this Ghunzul must've been pretty brave, if he spent every night in the shadow of that bear.
String.Dest: 诺克图娜尔在上，如果他每晚都在那只熊的阴影下过夜，这个叫Ghunzul的人一定非常勇敢。

String.Source: Dragonborn? Those Nords made it sound like you're some sort of god. I don't think we'll have a problem getting them look the other way.
String.Dest: 龙裔? 那些诺德人这样一说，搞得你听起来好像神仙一样。（窃笑）我想我们可以毫不费力地把他们装扮得谁都认不出来。

String.Source: Lucky hit!
String.Dest: 会心一击！

String.Source: Come on, is that all you've got?
String.Dest: 过来这里，这是你做到的？

String.Source: Dragon Bridge. Ever get a taste of that Dragon Breath Mead? Sounds disgusting.
String.Dest: 龙桥。你有尝过龙息酒的滋味儿吗？听起来挺恶心的。

String.Source: The Jarl of Whiterun's pretty pathetic, if he can't even hold Fort Greymoor. I can spit on Dragonsreach from here.
String.Dest: 白漫城领主真可悲,如果他不曾掌管灰色荒原堡垒。我就能向龙临堡吐口水。

String.Source: This cave is too clean. Let's make it dirty.
String.Dest: 这个洞穴太干净了，让我们给它添点儿血。

String.Source: See, this mammoth had it right. When I die, don't bury me, turn me into a battering ram. Also, coin purse up high, and one around the corner.
String.Dest: 瞧，这只 长毛象 【说得对】。我死之后，不要埋，把我做成【攻城锤】。还有，【高高挂着的钱包，角落里还有一只。】

String.Source: The planks in this cave look creaky, but the sound of the waterfalls should mask our steps.
String.Dest: 这个洞穴里的木板看起来摇摇欲坠，但瀑布的声音应该可以掩盖我们的脚步声。

String.Source: What a waste of a perfectly good pit wolf. You can't train something like that. You just have to let it kill.
String.Dest: 多完美的一只狼崽子，真是可惜了。你不应该训练它去做那样的事情。你应该让它去杀戮。

String.Source: Not only did that idiot Silus pay us already, he left his entire museum unattended. You thinking what I'm thinking?
String.Dest: 那个笨蛋Silus不仅已经付清了我们的钱，而且整个博物馆都无人看守。你觉得我是在想着什么。

String.Source: We aren't actually paying for things, are we?
String.Dest: 我们又不是真的付钱买东西，对吧？

String.Source: This is really happening, isn't it? A sodding dragon. Wow. You want my advice? We stay here and take advantage of the mayhem.
String.Dest: 所以这是真的，不是吗？一条该死的龙。哇哦。想要我的建议吗？我们待在这里，把这封闭的环境作为战略优势。

String.Source: That the best you can do?
String.Dest: 这就是你的极限了吗？

String.Source: I like small towns. Some thieves only steal from city nobles. I don't play favorites.
String.Dest: 我喜欢小镇。有的小偷只从成立的贵族那里偷东西，而我可没有什么最爱名单。

String.Source: Like the pinch of a mudcrab!
String.Dest: 就像一只跳蚤咬的!

String.Source: In the land of the poor and hungry, the cabbages are diamonds.
String.Dest: 在这贫瘠的土地，卷心菜如同钻石一样珍贵。

String.Source: Who puts their bed by a window? You're just asking to have your throat slit.
String.Dest: 谁把床放在窗边的。 等着被割喉么。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: I don't know if this qualifies as stealing. Seems everything in this marriage belongs to that woman.
String.Dest: 我不知道这是不是一种偷窃。看上去这场婚姻的一切都属于那个女人。

String.Source: Coin purse, on the support beam over the bridge. Wonder how that got there. Wonder how you're going to get it.
String.Dest: 那个装满钱的钱包在桥的承重柱上。我很奇怪它怎么跑到那去的。我也很奇怪你是怎么弄到他的。

String.Source: I'll cut right through your scales, monster!
String.Dest: 我会连你的鳞片一刀切的，怪物！

String.Source: You're nothing!
String.Dest: 你这无名小卒！

String.Source: Time to pluck that fur, werewolf!
String.Dest: 狼人，到了该拔毛的时间囉！

String.Source: You won't get away!
String.Dest: 你跑不了！

String.Source: You don't stand a chance!
String.Dest: 你一点机会也没有！

String.Source: Eyraargh!
String.Dest: 伊呀阿阿！

String.Source: Shadows swallow you whole!
String.Dest: 阴影吞没了你！

String.Source: Filthy Forsworn!
String.Dest: 肮脏的弃誓者！

String.Source: This isn't over.
String.Dest: 这事儿没完。

String.Source: Not quite good enough!
String.Dest: 还不够好！

String.Source: Give up while you still can!
String.Dest: 趁你还有反悔的机会，投降吧！

String.Source: Hyargh!
String.Dest: 嘿呀！

String.Source: Think you can take me, Orc?
String.Dest: 你还觉得你能搞定我么， 兽人？

String.Source: Take that, you fiend!
String.Dest: 接招吧，你个魔鬼！

String.Source: Come on, is that it?
String.Dest: 加油，就这样了？

String.Source: Die, damn you!
String.Dest: 去死吧，混蛋！

String.Source: You'll need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 不给力啊！！

String.Source: Go back to where you came from, dragon!
String.Dest: 巨龙，滚回你来的地方。

String.Source: Say hello to Ysmir for me, Nord!
String.Dest: 帮我向伊斯米尔问个好，诺德佬！

String.Source: Say hello to Ysmir for me, Nord!
String.Dest: 帮我向伊斯米尔问个好，诺德佬！

String.Source: Is this what you want?
String.Dest: 这就是你想要的？

String.Source: Eyaargh!
String.Dest: 哎呀！

String.Source: Yield or die!
String.Dest: 屈服或死！

String.Source: I've had enough of you!
String.Dest: 我受够你了！

String.Source: Too slow!
String.Dest: 太慢了！

String.Source: Take that!
String.Dest: 接招！

String.Source: Why won't you die already?
String.Dest: 你怎么还不去死？

String.Source: I will cut off your tail, cat!
String.Dest: 我会把你的尾巴给砍下来的，你这只死猫！

String.Source: Some legend you are!
String.Dest: 【你只不过是个传说】！

String.Source: Will you just stand still!
String.Dest: 站住别动！

String.Source: You're outmatched!
String.Dest: 你输了！

String.Source: This is too easy!
String.Dest: 这根本没挑战性!

String.Source: You thirsty, bloodsucker?! Well you aren't drinking me!
String.Dest: 你饥渴了，吸血鬼？！但你也不能喝我的血！

String.Source: Victory is yours!
String.Dest: 胜利是属于你的！

String.Source: Die witch!
String.Dest: 死巫婆！

String.Source: I can take you!
String.Dest: 你完了！

String.Source: I'll have your head!
String.Dest: 我要剁你的脑袋！

String.Source: You picked the wrong dinner, animal!
String.Dest: 你选错晚餐了，畜生！

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: What went wrong with your marriage?
String.Dest: 你的婚姻发生了什么不幸？

String.Source: What was the reason they put you in prison? What did they charge you with?
String.Dest: 他们把你关进牢里的理由是什么？他们拿什么控告你？

String.Source: What was the reason they put you in prison? What did they charge you with?
String.Dest: 他们把你关进牢里的理由是什么？他们拿什么控告你？

String.Source: Don't worry, if anybody tries to squeal to the guard, I got some fresh dagger loaf waiting for them.
String.Dest: 别担心, 如果有人向守卫哭闹, 我有些刀削面包留给他们.

String.Source: I get that he's a necromancer, but what do you mean you never saw eye to eye?
String.Dest: 我知道他是个亡灵法师啊，不过你说你们的观点从来没有一样过是什么意思？

String.Source: What is it, oath-brother?
String.Dest: 那是什么，誓言兄弟？

String.Source: I stole something for you the other day. Something called a console. Seemed worthless though, so I scrapped it.
String.Dest: 前两天我从你这儿偷了点东西。一个叫什么控制器的。可是看起来没用，所以我就扔了。

String.Source: All these Companions and they couldn't save the old man? This family only cares about themselves.
String.Dest: 战友团里就没有一个人能救这个老人吗？那帮家伙也只关心他们自己罢了。

String.Source: Yeah?
String.Dest: 啊?

String.Source: Make sure you order a round for everyone. Then I'll ask if anyone can teach me Iron Hearts. You know, to help a poor little girl pass the time.
String.Dest: 我请大家喝一杯。然后谁能教教我铁心【Iron Hearts】怎么玩，我得陪那个可怜的小女孩玩这游戏。

String.Source: The shinier something is, the more I want it.
String.Dest: 越是亮晶晶的东西，我越喜欢得不得了。

String.Source: Alright, let's keep to the shadows.
String.Dest: 好吧，让我们继续潜行于阴影之中。

String.Source: Guts trump wit every time.
String.Dest: 无论何时，勇气都胜过智慧。

String.Source: Some of the sheets in this inn have some strange shadows, and even weirder smells. This town got a stable? Might be safer to sleep there.
String.Dest: 这家酒馆儿的被单上有些奇怪的污迹，甚至有些更为古怪的气味儿。这小镇有畜舍吗？也许在那里睡更安全些。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: Now we're talking. This is a dagger. Sharp, balanced, and it sucks up the light.
String.Dest: 现在我们聊聊吧。这是把匕首，锋利，协调，同时吸收了光芒。

String.Source: We've stopped. You're not going to ask a blind woman for directions, are you?
String.Dest: 我们停下了。你不会去跟个失明的女人问路，对吗？

String.Source: Care for a game of iron hearts? I figure your coin purse could lose some weight.
String.Dest: 介意稍后来一把铁心iron hearts的游戏么？我觉得你的钱包该减减肥了。

String.Source: What is it, oath-sister?
String.Dest: 那是什么，义姐?

String.Source: Heh, turns out the romance part faded months ago. The only reason he stuck around was so I could protect him from Maven's thugs.
String.Dest: 嘿，结果浪漫的部分几个月前就褪色了。只因为他被困住后我就能从玛雯的恶棍手里保护他了。

String.Source: Shadow hide you, shadow guide you.
String.Dest: 阴影庇护你，阴影指引你。

String.Source: You got a lock, I'll pick it. You got a joke? I'm laughing. There ain't a face butcher in Tamriel that can wipe off this smile.
String.Dest: 你遇到锁，我来解决。你讲了笑话？我来捧场。找遍泰姆瑞尔都不会有人能把这笑容从我脸上除掉。

String.Source: Who knows. I mean, I never leave a trace when I steal. But there was that one time something was stolen from me.
String.Dest: 谁知道呢。我是说，我在偷东西的时候从不会留下把柄。但有一次我竟然被人摸了腰包了。

String.Source: You've stolen from the Black-Briars more than once?
String.Dest: 你已经不止一次去Black-Briars偷过东西了？

String.Source: It seems Larsdon and Falatild have been playing me for a fool.
String.Dest: 看来Larsdon和Falatild是在捉弄我。

String.Source: It seems Larsdon and Falatild have been playing me for a fool.
String.Dest: 看来Larsdon和Falatild是在捉弄我。

String.Source: It seems Larsdon and Falatild have been playing me for a fool.
String.Dest: 看来Larsdon和Falatild是在捉弄我。

String.Source: I'm not interested in introductions, girl. Who did you sell the journal to?
String.Dest: 姑娘，我对介绍什么的不感兴趣，我感兴趣的是你把日志卖给了谁。

String.Source: My name's <Alias=Player>. And I need some answers.
String.Dest: 我是 <Alias=Player>。 我需要一些解释。.

String.Source: You lying little thief. I know you sold it to someone else for more coin.
String.Dest: 说谎你这小贼！我知道你是高价卖给别人了。

String.Source: You lying little thief. I know you sold it to someone else for more coin.
String.Dest: 说谎你这小贼！我知道你是高价卖给别人了。

String.Source: You lying little thief. I know you sold it to someone else for more coin.
String.Dest: 说谎你这小贼！我知道你是高价卖给别人了。

String.Source: You lying little thief. I know you sold it to someone else for more coin.
String.Dest: 说谎你这小贼！我知道你是高价卖给别人了。

String.Source: Winterhold is a good place to lay low.
String.Dest: 冬堡是个隐居的好地方。

String.Source: If you follow me, there will be people who need to die.
String.Dest: 如果你跟着我，就会有人需要死去。

String.Source: Careful. It's a slippery slope to vampirism.
String.Dest: 小心。这是成为吸血鬼的捷径。

String.Source: Careful. It's a slippery slope to vampirism.
String.Dest: 小心。这是成为吸血鬼的捷径。

String.Source: Careful. It's a slippery slope to vampirism.
String.Dest: 小心。这是成为吸血鬼的捷径。

String.Source: Careful. It's a slippery slope to vampirism.
String.Dest: 小心。这是成为吸血鬼的捷径。

String.Source: Tell me about your fishing technique.
String.Dest: 给我说说你的钓鱼技巧。

String.Source: Tell me about your fishing technique.
String.Dest: 给我说说你的钓鱼技巧。

String.Source: Tell me about your fishing technique.
String.Dest: 给我说说你的钓鱼技巧。

String.Source: Tell me about your fishing technique.
String.Dest: 给我说说你的钓鱼技巧。

String.Source: What went wrong with your marriage?
String.Dest: 你的婚姻发生了什么不幸？

String.Source: What went wrong with your marriage?
String.Dest: 你的婚姻发生了什么不幸？

String.Source: What went wrong with your marriage?
String.Dest: 你的婚姻发生了什么不幸？

String.Source: Good. I try to avoid death whenever possible.
String.Dest: 很好。我总是尽可能地避免杀人。

String.Source: Good. I try to avoid death whenever possible.
String.Dest: 很好。我总是尽可能地避免杀人。

String.Source: What was the reason they put you in prison? What did they charge you with?
String.Dest: 他们把你关进牢里的理由是什么？他们拿什么控告你？

String.Source: What was the reason they put you in prison? What did they charge you with?
String.Dest: 他们把你关进牢里的理由是什么？他们拿什么控告你？

String.Source: What was the reason they put you in prison? What did they charge you with?
String.Dest: 他们把你关进牢里的理由是什么？他们拿什么控告你？

String.Source: You don't wear sleeves.
String.Dest: 你不要穿袖子。

String.Source: You don't wear sleeves.
String.Dest: 你不要穿袖子。

String.Source: You don't wear sleeves.
String.Dest: 你不要穿袖子。

String.Source: You don't wear sleeves.
String.Dest: 你不要穿袖子。

String.Source: Windhelm should have plenty of opportunities for an enterprising thief.
String.Dest: 对专业盗贼来讲风舵城肯定有很多发财的机会。

String.Source: Windhelm should have plenty of opportunities for an enterprising thief.
String.Dest: 对专业盗贼来讲风舵城肯定有很多发财的机会。

String.Source: Strange. I was told you double-crossed your contract.
String.Dest: 陌生人，我听说你出卖了你的合同。

String.Source: Strange. I was told you double-crossed your contract.
String.Dest: 陌生人，我听说你出卖了你的合同。

String.Source: Strange. I was told you double-crossed your contract.
String.Dest: 陌生人，我听说你出卖了你的合同。

String.Source: Strange. I was told you double-crossed your contract.
String.Dest: 陌生人，我听说你出卖了你的合同。

String.Source: Well, that isn't creepy or anything.
String.Dest: 好吧，那不是什么可怕的东西。

String.Source: Well, that isn't creepy or anything.
String.Dest: 好吧，那不是什么可怕的东西。

String.Source: Well, that isn't creepy or anything.
String.Dest: 好吧，那不是什么可怕的东西。

String.Source: We don't know if they're connected, if at all. This is a fact finding mission.
String.Dest: 我们不知道他们之间是不是有关联，或者根本是一伙。这是一个挖掘真相的任务。

String.Source: We don't know if they're connected, if at all. This is a fact finding mission.
String.Dest: 我们不知道他们之间是不是有关联，或者根本是一伙。这是一个挖掘真相的任务。

String.Source: Perhaps Riften was both the obvious choice and the best one.
String.Dest: 也许裂谷城既是权宜之策也是最佳选择。

String.Source: Perhaps Riften was both the obvious choice and the best one.
String.Dest: 也许裂谷城既是权宜之策也是最佳选择。

String.Source: Perhaps Riften was both the obvious choice and the best one.
String.Dest: 也许裂谷城既是权宜之策也是最佳选择。

String.Source: That's enough about the Black-Briar thefts.
String.Dest: 黑荆棘所做的勾当已经够多了。

String.Source: Sure. That wasn't my intent. I had nothing against the woman personally, at least, back then. Her properties just cast the longest shadows.
String.Dest: 真的. 那是我的主意. 我对那女人没有私人恩怨,至少以前沒有。 不過就在剛才我改觀了。

String.Source: And I'll kill them. Bandits, Thalmor, guards, whatever. I'll spill the blood of anyone who asks for it, but not a soul who doesn't.
String.Dest: 不管是强盗、梭默还是守卫，无论杀谁，赴汤蹈火，唯命是从。

String.Source: Needless to say, he won't be seeing anyone ever again.
String.Dest: 不用说,他不会再见到任何人了。

String.Source: Slice the neck or the gut, basically. This looks like a "neck" town. Solitude, you go for the gut.
String.Dest: 抓住咽喉，掏出脏腑，这是最基本的。这看起来像是咽喉之所在。独孤城，你去找那个”脏腑“。

String.Source: Funny, now that makes me want to go somewhere else. But first instinct is best instinct, and yours is as good as any.
String.Dest: 有意思，我现在都快熬不住想去别处了。不过第一选择往往是最好的选择，而你的选择也是这样。

String.Source: No way. That's bad for business, and a good way to get yourself killed. It's hard enough escaping the guard.
String.Dest: 没用的，这对交易无益，让你自己死亡是一个好办法。想要逃离守卫实在太难了。

String.Source: But relax. I don't like the taste of blood. I like the smell. You wouldn't eat a rose, would you?
String.Dest: 但放松点，我可不喜欢血尝起来的味道。我只喜欢用闻的，就像你不会真的去吃玫瑰花，对吧？
