String.Source: In any case, I know it wasn't me who screwed up. Their guy is supposed to wait at the docks, with 3 stones in a satchel and my gold in a purse.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我都知道搞砸的人不是我。他们的人应该在码头等着，带着装有3块儿石头的背包，还有装着我金币的钱包儿。

String.Source: You want a vampire, go open a coffin. But if you're smart, you'll keep me around to pick his pocket.
String.Dest: 你要找吸血鬼，去找个棺材打开看看。不过要是聪明的话，你就放我去扒他的口袋。

String.Source: In fact, I've seen some people carry knives no longer than a thumb. The one I carry is a little longer than that.
String.Dest: 实际上，我还见过带着比拇指还短的小刀的人。我带着的那把比拇指稍微长一点。

String.Source: You want a killer, go find a Dark Brotherhood assassin. But if you're smart, you'll keep me around to pick his pocket.
String.Dest: 你想要一个杀手？去找一名黑暗兄弟会的刺客。但如果你够聪明，你会让我去掏他的口袋。

String.Source: I had a feeling you and me would get along great. But don't worry, I'm not afraid to kill.
String.Dest: 我有种感觉，我们会相处的很好的。也别担心，我不害怕杀戮。

String.Source: Damn. Didn't know this place had a magical barrier around the college. That place looks like it's teeming with loot.
String.Dest: 妈的。没想到这学院周围有魔法屏障。这地方看起来可抢的东西可真多。

String.Source: I mean, is everything really that complicated or is Delphine just stupid? Ah, you do want you want. Just give me a shadow to stand in.
String.Dest: 我是说，到底是一切真的那么复杂，还是戴尔菲娜就那么蠢？噢，做你想做的吧。只有给我留个阴影能猫着就成。

String.Source: He tells me he wants to see other people. Two of them, in fact. Only cost him half our remaining coin to bed them both at the same time.
String.Dest: 他告诉我他想见见其他人。而且是两个。他们只花费了剩余一半的金币就和二人同床共枕。

String.Source: Nothing but empty pockets there. I think I saw some Dark Elf eat a bucket of snow for dinner.
String.Dest: 那儿除了些空口袋啥都没有。我想我看见了一些黑暗精灵吃一桶雪当做晚餐。

String.Source: Sibbi was always a cute one. His face would look great on a fence post. I'm kidding, of course, I don't kill.
String.Dest: 西比真的很可爱。如果把他那张小脸贴在篱笆上的话那就更可爱了。哦好吧我只是在开玩笑，我才不杀生。

String.Source: Then I lift the purse and put the journal in the satchel. So unless there was some other guy carrying around a bunch of rocks, I did my job.
String.Dest: 然后我拿走钱袋，把笔记放进包里。除非还有人会带着一堆石头乱逛，我就算完工了。

String.Source: Pickpocketing is all about misdirection. Brush someone's shoulder. Stumble into them. Tap them on the back and ask for directions.
String.Dest: 偷东西的诀窍就在于误导。抚一下别人的肩膀啦。假装倒向别人啦。拍他们的背问个路啦。

String.Source: About the journal? Yeah, I stole it. So what? Someone pays me to steal something, I steal it for them.
String.Dest: 我的确偷了那本日记。。那又怎样?我只不过是干这拿钱消灾的生意罢了.

String.Source: This city is too guarded. Eyes everywhere, not enough shadows. No one trusts outsiders. Although at least its better than the Cornerclub.
String.Dest: 这座城市戒备太森严了。到处都有人盯着你，让你无处藏身。没有人相信外地人。不过这里还是比街角吧要好一点儿。

String.Source: But I jest. I'm not a killer. I'm a thief. Anyone can steal from a dead man. Being a cutpurse takes skill, and guile.
String.Dest: 开个玩笑。我不是一个杀手。我是一个贼。任何人都可以偷死人。作为一个扒手需要技巧和一点诡计。

String.Source: So I did my job. But I'll tell you what. Why don't you take me to your boss? We'll sort this out, one way or the other.
String.Dest: 所以我做了我该做的。我会告诉你具体内容的。为什么不带我去见见你们老大呢？我们要把这事儿搞清楚。

String.Source: So I did my job. But I'll tell you what. Why don't you take me to your boss? We'll sort this out, one way or the other.
String.Dest: 所以我做了我该做的。我会告诉你具体内容的。为什么不带我去见见你们老大呢？我们要把这事儿搞清楚。

String.Source: So that night, I crept into the brothel house, and I took all four of them. The two girls' purses...and my husband's two eyes.
String.Dest: 所以那个夜里我就爬进了妓院，把四样东西都带走了。那两个姑娘的手提包......还有我丈夫的两只眼睛。

String.Source: That's why pickpockets usually wear long, loose sleeves. Normal daggers are no good. You want one without a hilt.
String.Dest: 那就是为什么小偷通常穿着又长又松的袖子。普通的匕首一点好处都没有，你会喜欢无柄的匕首的。

String.Source: If I sold it for a higher price, I'd admit it. Heck, I'd probably brag about it, depending on how much.
String.Dest: 如果我把它卖了个高价钱的话，我就会承认了。真见鬼，根据具体卖了多少钱我说不定还能吹个牛什么的。

String.Source: He'd have a satchel with 3 stones inside, and a coin purse with my payment. Then I lift the purse and put the journal in the satchel.
String.Dest: 他会背着一个装着三个石头的挎包，和一个装满我的报酬的钱袋，然后我会拿出钱袋，让他背着他的挎包继续他的旅程。

String.Source: He'd have a satchel with 3 stones inside, and a coin purse with my payment. Then I lift the purse and put the journal in the satchel.
String.Dest: 他会背着一个装着三个石头的挎包，和一个装满我的报酬的钱袋，然后我会拿出钱袋，让他背着他的挎包继续他的旅程。

String.Source: So...you might find nothing? What good does that do? Why don't we just do like you did at Kynesgrove? Find the dragon, kill the dragon.
String.Dest: 那么。。。。你也许什么都没找到？这样做有什么好处？为什么我们不照上次凯娜之林那样做？找到那条龙，杀掉那条龙。

String.Source: Look, I'm pretty awful with voices, for a blind girl anyway, so I have a system. I told them to have a man waiting for me at the docks.
String.Dest: 要知道，我的嗓音很差，【就算是盲人也一样】，所以我想了个办法，让他们找个男人到码头等我。

String.Source: Look, I'm pretty awful with voices, for a blind girl anyway, so I have a system. I told them to have a man waiting for me at the docks.
String.Dest: 要知道，我的嗓音很差，【就算是盲人也一样】，所以我想了个办法，让他们找个男人到码头等我。

String.Source: It's not as sharp as most knives, but it works for purse strings. Problem is, some of the more quality pouches are made from coarser rope.
String.Dest: 它并不像大多数刀具那样锋利，但它擅长于切开制作钱袋的绳子。问题是，一些较优质的袋子是用更粗的绳子制成的。

String.Source: Bandits, Thalmor, guards, whatever. I'll spill the blood of anyone who asks for it, but not a soul who doesn't.
String.Dest: 不管是强盗、梭默还是守卫，无论杀谁，赴汤蹈火，唯命是从。

String.Source: Not yours, though. You've proven more than resourceful, and if we work together, you might prove invaluable as well.
String.Dest: 虽然不是你的。你已经证明了你非常的足智多谋，如果我们一起努力的话，你也许也能证明自己的宝贵价值。

String.Source: Then the only way to make things right is to dip in their pockets. It's not even stealing. It's like...justice or something.
String.Dest: 那么将一切扳回正轨的唯一方法就是去刨他们的口袋。这可不能说是劫财，这更像是...以正义或者别的什么的名义。

String.Source: When you say that, it makes me want to try it out. And why not? Vampires are as strong as an ox and live forever.
String.Dest: 你这么一说，我反倒想试试看了。话说回来有什么理由不去试试呢？吸血鬼们都比公牛还强壮而且还都长生不老。

String.Source: In fact, I'm not a killer of any kind. I'm a thief. Anyone can steal from a dead man. Being a cutpurse takes skill, and guile.
String.Dest: 事实上，我什么杀手都不是。我是个贼。不论是谁都能从尸体身上偷走东西。作为一名小偷需要技巧，和狡诈。

String.Source: Well, you don't need sleeves when the knife fits in your hand like a middle finger. When it's time to cut the strings, I just close the fleshy ones.
String.Dest: 啊，如果小刀能像你的中指一样灵活的话你就没有必要有什么袖子了。当需要切线的时候，我只需要把原来长着的中指缩回去。.

String.Source: Although...I could chop her up first. Maybe make a nice little tableau out of her family.
String.Dest: 不过……我能先把她砍咯。也许能用她的家人搞出一个美丽的小场面。

String.Source: Except Maven Black-Briar won't let me set foot in that town unless it came in a sack.
String.Dest: 除非把我装在麻袋里，否则黑荆棘玛雯不会让我进城的。

String.Source: You won't be saying that when I line your pockets with valuables. Can't make a horse haunch without slaying the one you rode in on.
String.Dest: 在我往你包里放些值钱的东西之后你就不会这么说了。不把自己骑的马杀掉就拿不到马腿肉。

String.Source: The idea is to make some sort of contact as your free hand slices their purse strings.
String.Dest: 基本思想是在你与他交流的同时用你闲着的那只手把他们钱包的束带割掉。

String.Source: Alright.
String.Dest: 好吧。

String.Source: Who else? The person who contracted me to steal it.
String.Dest: 还能有谁？那个跟我定下契约要我偷这东西的人。

String.Source: Stupid nobles though, they'll have quality strings but use a velvet pouch instead of leather. So you cut the purse instead.
String.Dest: 贵族都是蠢蛋，他们用高质量的绳子系着钱袋，但却用绒布代替皮革制作钱袋，所以你可以直接割破它。

String.Source: I'm the Guildmaster now. If you want in, just say the word.
String.Dest: 我现在是公会首领。如果你想加入，说句话就行了。

String.Source: I'm the Guildmaster now. If you want in, just say the word.
String.Dest: 我现在是公会首领。如果你想加入，说句话就行了。

String.Source: I'm the Guildmaster now. If you want in, just say the word.
String.Dest: 我现在是公会首领。如果你想加入，说句话就行了。

String.Source: I'm the Guildmaster now. If you want in, just say the word.
String.Dest: 我现在是公会首领。如果你想加入，说句话就行了。

String.Source: You make being blind sound like a completely different experience.
String.Dest: 听起来你盲当作一种完全不同的体验。

String.Source: You make being blind sound like a completely different experience.
String.Dest: 听起来你盲当作一种完全不同的体验。

String.Source: Your eyes...How do you maneuver around if you can't see?
String.Dest: 你的眼睛...如果你看不见的话你要怎么机动呢？

String.Source: Your eyes...How do you maneuver around if you can't see?
String.Dest: 你的眼睛...如果你看不见的话你要怎么机动呢？

String.Source: Your eyes...How do you maneuver around if you can't see?
String.Dest: 你的眼睛...如果你看不见的话你要怎么机动呢？

String.Source: Your eyes...How do you maneuver around if you can't see?
String.Dest: 你的眼睛...如果你看不见的话你要怎么机动呢？

String.Source: Your eyes...How do you maneuver around if you can't see?
String.Dest: 你的眼睛...如果你看不见的话你要怎么机动呢？

String.Source: It's a dragon rookery. A place where dragons are bred and raised to fight.
String.Dest: 这里是龙的栖息地，负责繁殖和培养他们战斗。

String.Source: You look like you've got something to say.
String.Dest: 你看起来有话要说。

String.Source: You look like you've got something to say.
String.Dest: 你看起来有话要说。

String.Source: You look like you've got something to say.
String.Dest: 你看起来有话要说。

String.Source: You look like you've got something to say.
String.Dest: 你看起来有话要说。

String.Source: Ancano is no more, and the College is saved.
String.Dest: Ancano 成为过去了，学院保住了。

String.Source: Ancano is no more, and the College is saved.
String.Dest: Ancano 成为过去了，学院保住了。

String.Source: How come you never joined the Guild? Maven isn't the only mark around.
String.Dest: 怎么你没加入公会？ Maven可不是周围唯一的污点。

String.Source: Oh, that makes perfect sense. Wait, no it doesn't.
String.Dest: 哦，这很有道理。等等，它不对。

String.Source: Oh, that makes perfect sense. Wait, no it doesn't.
String.Dest: 哦，这很有道理。等等，它不对。

String.Source: It's not about living together, it's about living apart from the world.
String.Dest: 重點不是在一起生活，而是分開在世界的兩地生活。

String.Source: It's not about living together, it's about living apart from the world.
String.Dest: 重點不是在一起生活，而是分開在世界的兩地生活。

String.Source: It's not about living together, it's about living apart from the world.
String.Dest: 重點不是在一起生活，而是分開在世界的兩地生活。

String.Source: (Companions Quest) The Companions have accepted me into their family.
String.Dest: （Companions 任务）Companions 接纳了我并邀请我加入他们的大家庭。

String.Source: (Companions Quest) The Companions have accepted me into their family.
String.Dest: （Companions 任务）Companions 接纳了我并邀请我加入他们的大家庭。

String.Source: That sounds like a terrible substitute for eyes.
String.Dest: 听起来是个糟糕的眼球代用品。

String.Source: That sounds like a terrible substitute for eyes.
String.Dest: 听起来是个糟糕的眼球代用品。

String.Source: That sounds like a terrible substitute for eyes.
String.Dest: 听起来是个糟糕的眼球代用品。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) Looks like I have to challenge Alduin alone.
String.Dest: (Dragonsreach) 看来我得独自迎接Alduin的挑战了。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) Looks like I have to challenge Alduin alone.
String.Dest: (Dragonsreach) 看来我得独自迎接Alduin的挑战了。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) Looks like I have to challenge Alduin alone.
String.Dest: (Dragonsreach) 看来我得独自迎接Alduin的挑战了。

String.Source: (Whiterun) Something on your mind?
String.Dest: (白漫城)你有什么心事？

String.Source: Your lack of scruples disturbs me. I bet you would steal from your own mother.
String.Dest: 我讨厌你的无良。我打赌你连你亲妈的东西都会偷。

String.Source: Never mind.
String.Dest: 不用介意。

String.Source: You know, there are people who want you dead. I could be here to kill you.
String.Dest: 你知道的，有很多人想要你死，我很有可能是来这里杀你的。

String.Source: You know, there are people who want you dead. I could be here to kill you.
String.Dest: 你知道的，有很多人想要你死，我很有可能是来这里杀你的。

String.Source: I want your thoughts on Anum-La.
String.Dest: 我想知道你对安努姆菈的想法

String.Source: Alright, you fooled me. Now stay in your cage and serve out your sentence.
String.Dest: 好吧，你耍我。那就在你的笼子里呆到刑满释放吧。

String.Source: By the Divines you're stupid. I've met mudcrabs with more plausible theories.
String.Dest: 我的天呐你能有多笨！我见过的泥螃蟹都比你有脑子！

String.Source: By the Divines you're stupid. I've met mudcrabs with more plausible theories.
String.Dest: 我的天呐你能有多笨！我见过的泥螃蟹都比你有脑子！

String.Source: That was an impressive display of acting. You got me.
String.Dest: 真是个令人印象深刻的表演啊。你懂的。

String.Source: That was an impressive display of acting. You got me.
String.Dest: 真是个令人印象深刻的表演啊。你懂的。

String.Source: (Riften) This is a homecoming for you, isn't it?
String.Dest: (裂谷城)这对你而言是一个家，对吗？

String.Source: (Riften) This is a homecoming for you, isn't it?
String.Dest: (裂谷城)这对你而言是一个家，对吗？

String.Source: (Riften) This is a homecoming for you, isn't it?
String.Dest: (裂谷城)这对你而言是一个家，对吗？

String.Source: (Riften) This is a homecoming for you, isn't it?
String.Dest: (裂谷城)这对你而言是一个家，对吗？

String.Source: (Riften) This is a homecoming for you, isn't it?
String.Dest: (裂谷城)这对你而言是一个家，对吗？

String.Source: And what? The world's saved. What more could you ask for?
String.Dest: 还有什么想法？全世界都拯救了，你还要我怎么样？

String.Source: And what? The world's saved. What more could you ask for?
String.Dest: 还有什么想法？全世界都拯救了，你还要我怎么样？

String.Source: And what? The world's saved. What more could you ask for?
String.Dest: 还有什么想法？全世界都拯救了，你还要我怎么样？

String.Source: And what? The world's saved. What more could you ask for?
String.Dest: 还有什么想法？全世界都拯救了，你还要我怎么样？

String.Source: And what? The world's saved. What more could you ask for?
String.Dest: 还有什么想法？全世界都拯救了，你还要我怎么样？

String.Source: I thought you were a jester, as laughable as that performance was.
String.Dest: 我一直把你当小丑看，就像你的表演一样滑稽。

String.Source: But the Forsworn lost their home, and I know how that is. I know it ain't easy.
String.Dest: 但弃世者失去了他们的家园, 我也知道是怎么回事. 我知道那不简单.

String.Source: I don't need magic. When she took my eyes, Nocturnal blessed me with a keen sense for the dark. And everything in the world casts a shadow.
String.Dest: 我不需要魔法. 她夺取我眼睛的时候, 夜母赋予我黑暗中敏锐的触觉. 世间外物都产生阴影.

String.Source: You think that was something? If you waited a minute, I would've literally cried. Goes pretty well with the eyes.
String.Dest: 你不把那当一回事？如果你再等等，我几乎就真的哭出来了，我的眼睛都泛着泪花了

String.Source: Guess it does sound pretty bizarre without the rest of the whole story. My gold was stolen, but it wasn't a crime.
String.Dest: 我猜这些听起来挺诡异的吧——如果没有结局的话。偷了我的钱，却不违法。

String.Source: But no, even if you had that kind of clout, you wouldn't be doing me a favor.
String.Dest: 但是不是这样的。即使你有那种影响力，也没什么用。

String.Source: So draw your weapon or shut up. I'm getting out of here. If you aren't gonna help, then stay and keep Bjartur company.
String.Dest: 要么拿起武器，要么闭嘴。我要走了。如果你不帮忙的话，就留下来继续经营布贾特公司吧。

String.Source: It has things to steal and fences to move them. Which is why we should sell the horn.
String.Dest: 那里有的是宝物和需要移除的栅栏，这就是为什么我们要卖掉这些喇叭。

String.Source: It must be the ugliest substance in the world, the way people scream at the sight of it. But it smells absolutely perfect.
String.Dest: 这恐怕是世界上最难看的食材了，谁见到它第一眼都会惊叫出来。不过它的香味闻起来真是完美啊！

String.Source: Either way, you ain't leaving without me. I'll lick a harpy's backside before I let you go off alone.
String.Dest: 反正你不能丢下我。否则的话我绝对会在你离开之前，去舔鹰身女妖的屁股。

String.Source: But you raise a good point. You don't keep me around for my brain. Maybe it's best I don't think at all.
String.Dest: 可是你提了个好主意。我这脑筋跟不上你的节奏，所以我还是省省吧。

String.Source: You can step on us, poison us, and throw us in the oven and we'll still be in your pantry come morning.
String.Dest: 你可以践踏我们，毒害我们，把我们扔进火炉里。而到了第二天早上，我们仍会出现在你的厨房里。

String.Source: Why not? If she had the coin, it would have been the easiest pocket I ever fished. But why aim low, when Black-Briar Manor casts such a long shadow.
String.Dest: 为什么不呢？如果她有硬币，这会是我最轻松的一次扒窃了，但为什么目标定得这么低，当黑荆棘别墅投下那长长的阴影。

String.Source: All right.
String.Dest: 好吧。

String.Source: Then we're both fools. But I'd rather not be a dead one. So I'm getting out of here. If you aren't gonna help, then stay and keep Bjartur company.
String.Dest: 那我们都是傻瓜 。但我可不想死。所以我将会离开这里。如果你不打算帮忙，那就呆在那里继续跟Bjartur做伴吧。

String.Source: But this isn't the time to talk. I'm getting out of here. If you aren't gonna help, then stay and keep Bjartur company.
String.Dest: 但这不是聊天的时候。我得离开这里。如果你不打算帮忙 ，那就呆在这儿和Bjartur做伴儿吧。

String.Source: You did what you had to. Doesn't mean I have to like it. Yeah, I don't care much for politics, or who owns what. Neither do my fingers.
String.Dest: 你做了你必须做的事情，并不意味着我也要去喜欢它。是，我不怎么关心政治，也不关心谁拥有着什么。 【这些我都不会去做的。】

String.Source: Sorry, but I've been cooped up in here long enough. This little bird is about to take flight. If you're going to make to trouble, then make it.
String.Dest: 对不起，但我已经被困在这里足够久的了。而你这只小鸟想要飞走。如果你正准备闹些事儿的话，就去干吧。

String.Source: But if it makes you feel better, I agree with your choice. The Forsworn lost their home, and I know how that is. I know it ain't easy.
String.Dest: 但如果这能让你感觉好些，我同意你的选择。这些弃誓者失去了家园，我知道这是怎么回事儿，我也知道这并不容易。

String.Source: Maybe the darkness blends into a single color, and I don't see the value of one shadow over another. The eyes tell lies.
String.Dest: 有可能黑暗已经融合为一种单一的色彩，我无法发现重阴叠影的价值。有时候眼见并不为实。

String.Source: See, while you were gone, I learned all about these snowbacks that live in Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 瞧，你离开的这些天，我了解了这些生活在松加德的北方佬的一切。

String.Source: Yeah, kind of. Things change when your eyes aren't in the way. Take blood, for instance.
String.Dest: 嗯，诸如此类。当眼睛不再碍事的时候事情会改变许多。就拿血来说吧，举个例子。

String.Source: That's because you're like me. We're both a couple of cockroaches.
String.Dest: (偷笑)因为你跟我一个样。我俩就是一对儿蟑螂。

String.Source: Well that's stupid. You mean to tell me that dragon isn't big enough for the both of us?
String.Dest: 真蠢，你难道想告诉我对我们两个人来说龙还不够大么？

String.Source: What, you want a prize? Go ask a Jarl. I don't care much for politics, or who owns what. Neither do my fingers.
String.Dest: 什么？你想要赏钱？找领主要去。我根本不关心政治，也不关心谁的得失。我偷东西时也不管这么多。

String.Source: Even in the dimmest, darkest caves, there's shadows made by torchlight, and every shade has its own shape, color, and coolness.
String.Dest: 即使在最为昏暗幽黑的洞穴中，都有火炬映出的影子在闪动，而每一个影子都有它自己的形状、颜色、与温度。

String.Source: You run that by Maven? Seems to me she's the one running things. Still.
String.Dest: 你跟玛雯这么说了？在我看来她仍是那个管事儿的人。

String.Source: Not when I was married to the thief.
String.Dest: 不是我嫁给小偷的那时候.

String.Source: What we do is beyond that. I don't even feel like a thief. I feel like an adventurer.
String.Dest: 我们要做的比那更甚。我甚至不觉得像个盗贼。更像是个冒险家。

String.Source: That's what happens when I'm not around to keep you honest. In fact, if I were you, I would never leave me again.
String.Dest: 这就是我不在你身边督促你保持诚实时会发生的事。事实上，如果我是你，我永远都不会再离开我的。

String.Source: I talked to a fence I know, and he says there's even crazy people who give up their fortunes to collect stuff like that.
String.Dest: 我有跟一个认识的销赃犯聊起过，他说，真的会有疯子愿意倾家荡产来收集那种东西。

String.Source: Wow, really? Why doesn't the Empire have one of those? Probably why they lost the war. Idiots.
String.Dest: 哇噢，真的？为什么帝国没有弄到一个这玩意？活该他们被打败。笨蛋。

String.Source: Yeah. Just figured I should come clean about something I said before. It wasn't exactly a lie, but it wasn't the whole truth.
String.Dest: 是啊。不过我觉得我得先对以前叙述的那个故事做一个澄清。我那时说的并不全是谎言，但也并不全是真的。

String.Source: Just a bunch of shield-strangers is more like it. What do you even know about them? Do you even know the ugly one's favorite color? Mine's black.
String.Dest: 而他们呢，要说是一帮【盾牌陌生人】反倒更适合一些。对于他们你又知道些什么呢？难道说你还说得上来最丑的那个最喜欢的颜色？我最喜欢的颜色是黑色。

String.Source: Like I told you the day we met. We're family. And if this dragon is too lazy to carry the both of us, then find another one and I'll ride that.
String.Dest: 正如我们见面时，我告诉你的一样。我们是加入。如果这头龙懒得驮我们两个人，那我再去找一头坐。

String.Source: Oh? Works for me, sunshine. Got a better chance going through you than Ahtar's axe.
String.Dest: 哦？我没问题，sunshine。比起阿塔的斧头，你会得到一个更好的机会。

String.Source: But she's the biggest, fattest, and ugliest one. What, you're going to tell me size isn't everything?
String.Dest: 但她是最大，最胖，最丑的人。什么，你要告诉我的尺寸并不是一切？

String.Source: But they're not really family, are they? They're not like you and me. A shield-sister isn't like an oath-sister.
String.Dest: 但他们不是真正的家人，不是吗？他们不像你与我。盾牌姐妹可不像誓约姐妹那样。

String.Source: If I could see, maybe the treasure at the end of the hall is too tempting to walk a crooked line. So I walk straight into a trap.
String.Dest: 如果我看得见,或许因为那些宝藏太吸引人使我沿直线走了过去.所以我就踩中陷阱里去了.

String.Source: Who?
String.Dest: 谁？

String.Source: Look at Vex and Tonilia, spending all day in that old sewer. I don't want to end up like them.
String.Dest: 看看威克斯和托尼利亚，整天待在那老旧的下水沟里。我不想变成她们那样。

String.Source: But you've let me be your shadow since day one. You let me walk with eyes open. And well, I'm just trying to say...thanks for that.
String.Dest: 但自从第一天起，你就让我如影随同跟着你。你让我走路的时候睁大眼睛。所以，我只是想说……谢谢你。

String.Source: Maybe for some. But I'm not the kind of artist who paints. For me, the eyes see too much.
String.Dest: 也许对某些人是的。但我可不是那种画画的艺术家。对我来说，眼睛就已经看到的够多了。

String.Source: Yeah, well have you met a mudcrab that can pick a lock with a rusty nail using nothing but her teeth?
String.Dest: 河蟹，锈色的钳子，天赋异禀光用牙就能开锁？

String.Source: But you didn't get anything did you? I can tell by that stupid question of yours.
String.Dest: 但你一无所获是吧？我可以回应你那愚蠢的问题.

String.Source: It won't do us any good to let it stew in that 7000 step throat hole.
String.Dest: 把它闷到7000 step throat hole对我们没有任何好处的。

String.Source: Truth is, that was the last I ever saw of him. He disowned me. My own father. Ever since then it's been hard to trust anyone.
String.Dest: 实际上，那便是我见他的最后一眼，我的父亲，他断绝了我们的父子关系。自那以后，我便再难相信任何人了。

String.Source: I thought you said you like fast men. Did you see Wulfgar's Whirlwind Sprint?
String.Dest: 我想你说过你喜欢速度快的男人，你有没有见过Wulfgar的旋风冲刺？（阳痿早泄？）

String.Source: I thought you said you like fast men. Did you see Wulfgar's Whirlwind Sprint?
String.Dest: 我想你说过你喜欢速度快的男人，你有没有见过Wulfgar的旋风冲刺？（阳痿早泄？）

String.Source: Vex and Tonilia get out at night. We just don't notice. They're thieves.
String.Dest: Vex 和 Tonilia 趁黑出动。我们只是没注意。他们是贼。

String.Source: Vex and Tonilia get out at night. We just don't notice. They're thieves.
String.Dest: Vex 和 Tonilia 趁黑出动。我们只是没注意。他们是贼。

String.Source: Vex and Tonilia get out at night. We just don't notice. They're thieves.
String.Dest: Vex 和 Tonilia 趁黑出动。我们只是没注意。他们是贼。

String.Source: It's important to have a place to come back to. Mine's a tavern.
String.Dest: 关键得有个落脚的地方。我选择旅馆。

String.Source: It's important to have a place to come back to. Mine's a tavern.
String.Dest: 关键得有个落脚的地方。我选择旅馆。

String.Source: It's important to have a place to come back to. Mine's a tavern.
String.Dest: 关键得有个落脚的地方。我选择旅馆。

String.Source: It's important to have a place to come back to. Mine's a tavern.
String.Dest: 关键得有个落脚的地方。我选择旅馆。

String.Source: Just be sure I get my cut.
String.Dest: 我得确定我拿得到我的那一份。

String.Source: Just be sure I get my cut.
String.Dest: 我得确定我拿得到我的那一份。

String.Source: Blood has a smell that's undetectable at best.
String.Dest: 闻起来没有血腥味最好。

String.Source: Blood has a smell that's undetectable at best.
String.Dest: 闻起来没有血腥味最好。

String.Source: Blood has a smell that's undetectable at best.
String.Dest: 闻起来没有血腥味最好。

String.Source: So that's your plan? You're just going to keep following me?
String.Dest: 所以那就是你的计画？就只是继续跟着我？

String.Source: So that's your plan? You're just going to keep following me?
String.Dest: 所以那就是你的计画？就只是继续跟着我？

String.Source: So that's your plan? You're just going to keep following me?
String.Dest: 所以那就是你的计画？就只是继续跟着我？

String.Source: So that's your plan? You're just going to keep following me?
String.Dest: 所以那就是你的计画？就只是继续跟着我？

String.Source: So that's your plan? You're just going to keep following me?
String.Dest: 所以那就是你的计画？就只是继续跟着我？

String.Source: Sundas is a better name. The afternoon sun is better than any morning.
String.Dest: 桑达斯是个好名字。午后的太阳比早上的要好得多。

String.Source: I wish you would stay out of my "pantry." You eat all my food.
String.Dest: 我希望你能离我的“储藏室”远一点，你都快把我的食物吃光了。

String.Source: I wish you would stay out of my "pantry." You eat all my food.
String.Dest: 我希望你能离我的“储藏室”远一点，你都快把我的食物吃光了。

String.Source: Where will you go?
String.Dest: 你要去哪儿？

String.Source: Where will you go?
String.Dest: 你要去哪儿？

String.Source: Clairvoyance is an imprecise skill.
String.Dest: 洞察术并不是一个很精准的技能。

String.Source: Clairvoyance is an imprecise skill.
String.Dest: 洞察术并不是一个很精准的技能。

String.Source: Clairvoyance is an imprecise skill.
String.Dest: 洞察术并不是一个很精准的技能。

String.Source: Now that you're free, do you have a place to stay?
String.Dest: 既然已经自由了，你有地方可去吗？

String.Source: Now that you're free, do you have a place to stay?
String.Dest: 既然已经自由了，你有地方可去吗？

String.Source: Now that you're free, do you have a place to stay?
String.Dest: 既然已经自由了，你有地方可去吗？

String.Source: Now that you're free, do you have a place to stay?
String.Dest: 既然已经自由了，你有地方可去吗？

String.Source: Now that you're free, do you have a place to stay?
String.Dest: 既然已经自由了，你有地方可去吗？

String.Source: Now that you're free, do you have a place to stay?
String.Dest: 既然已经自由了，你有地方可去吗？

String.Source: It's simple arithmetic. A lifetime of jobs is worth more than Maven's fortune.
String.Dest: 这是个简单的算术。一辈子的工作可比玛雯的财富更值钱。

String.Source: It's simple arithmetic. A lifetime of jobs is worth more than Maven's fortune.
String.Dest: 这是个简单的算术。一辈子的工作可比玛雯的财富更值钱。

String.Source: Alright, you fooled me. Now stay in your cage and serve out your sentence.
String.Dest: 好吧，你耍我。那就在你的笼子里呆到刑满释放吧。

String.Source: You got what you deserved, criminal.
String.Dest: 你罪有应得，罪犯！

String.Source: You got what you deserved, criminal.
String.Dest: 你罪有应得，罪犯！

String.Source: You got what you deserved, criminal.
String.Dest: 你罪有应得，罪犯！

String.Source: You move well. I hardly noticed a difference.
String.Dest: 表演的不错啊，完全看不出区别嘛！

String.Source: You move well. I hardly noticed a difference.
String.Dest: 表演的不错啊，完全看不出区别嘛！

String.Source: You move well. I hardly noticed a difference.
String.Dest: 表演的不错啊，完全看不出区别嘛！

String.Source: You move well. I hardly noticed a difference.
String.Dest: 表演的不错啊，完全看不出区别嘛！

String.Source: No, because I'm not a no good dirty thief.
String.Dest: 不，因为我作为一个卑鄙的小偷还不够称职。

String.Source: Why don't you stay here and plan our next heist.
String.Dest: 要不要留下来就下次抢劫行动商量个计划。

String.Source: Why don't you stay here and plan our next heist.
String.Dest: 要不要留下来就下次抢劫行动商量个计划。

String.Source: Why don't you stay here and plan our next heist.
String.Dest: 要不要留下来就下次抢劫行动商量个计划。

String.Source: Bonds are forged in battle, not through conversation.
String.Dest: 感情是在战斗中建立的，不是在聊天里。

String.Source: Bonds are forged in battle, not through conversation.
String.Dest: 感情是在战斗中建立的，不是在聊天里。

String.Source: Bonds are forged in battle, not through conversation.
String.Dest: 感情是在战斗中建立的，不是在聊天里。

String.Source: What exactly did you steal from Maven?
String.Dest: 你到底从Maven那里偷了 什么？

String.Source: I hope this story ends with someone getting murdered. I like murder.
String.Dest: 我希望这个故事以某人被杀结尾，我就喜欢杀人。

String.Source: I hope this story ends with someone getting murdered. I like murder.
String.Dest: 我希望这个故事以某人被杀结尾，我就喜欢杀人。

String.Source: What about now? Would you categorize yourself as stubborn?
String.Dest: 现在呢？你可以把自己归入二货那一类了吗？

String.Source: What about now? Would you categorize yourself as stubborn?
String.Dest: 现在呢？你可以把自己归入二货那一类了吗？

String.Source: What about now? Would you categorize yourself as stubborn?
String.Dest: 现在呢？你可以把自己归入二货那一类了吗？

String.Source: Whatever, I didn't want to be part of their stupid guild anyway. Not when it answers to some old hag instead of a real thief.
String.Dest: 无论如何, 我都不会加入他们那蠢工会. 尤其是当下他们用一些老妖婆顶替真正盗贼的时候.

String.Source: I don't have much going on. You're the most exciting thing around here. Not to mention you're family.
String.Dest: 没有什么事能引起我的兴趣. 这里只有你最能激动人心. 更何况我们是一家人.

String.Source: We used to move from farm to farm, begging for work, praying to Zenithar we'd have enough for a roof over our heads.
String.Dest: 我们曾今从一个搬到另一个农场, 找着活儿，向泽尼萨尔祷告我们能有一个栖息之处。

String.Source: And I'll go unnoticed whenever I stalk our enemies. They won't know it isn't their own shadow until my blade sends their souls to the void.
String.Dest: 我隐蔽而诡秘的潜近我们的敌人。直到我的利刃将他们的灵魂送入虚无，他们才意识到那不是自己的影子。

String.Source: My bones are your blood, and your blood is my bones.
String.Dest: 吾骨为汝血，汝血为吾骨.

String.Source: My bones are your blood, and your blood is my bones.
String.Dest: 吾骨为汝血，汝血为吾骨.

String.Source: What? Does it have your name on it? Besides, I thought we were sharing. We're blood siblings by oath. My blood's your blood, and so is my spit.
String.Dest: 什么！？上面有你的名字？另外，我还以为我们在分享。我们是拜了把子的兄弟。我的血就是你的血，我的口水也一样！

String.Source: Maybe it's just you who can't smell it. I think there's a potion for that. Next time we're in an alchemist shop, I'll steal it for you.
String.Dest: 恐怕不光是你闻不见它。我想应该有种药治这个的。下次我们去炼金药店，我帮你搞点。

String.Source: But you're going to have a hard time convincing anyone you had nothing to do with this. Either way, I'm leaving.
String.Dest: 不过到时候你又很难向每个人解释你真的对此无能为力。不管怎么样，我得走了。

String.Source: But the eyes tell lies, my friend, the eyes tell lies.
String.Dest: 但这眼睛在说谎，我的朋友，这眼睛在说谎。

String.Source: Don't be stupid, you know that's not what I meant. We do more than just steal.
String.Dest: 别犯傻,你知道那不是我的意思。我们能做的不仅仅是偷窃。

String.Source: That second is the difference between being fast and acting rushed. The eyes tempt you into moving too quickly.
String.Dest: 其次是速度变得更快和冒进的区别。 注意力集中会让你变得更快。

String.Source: I figure some crowded city like Windhelm would be a nice place to start. Always wanted to clean out the Palace of the Kings.
String.Dest: 我觉得一些像风盔城那样拥挤的城市是个开始的好地方。我一直想清理众王之殿来着。

String.Source: We get drunk, we kill some people, maybe do a good deed, and then get drunk some more.
String.Dest: 我们喝多了，我们杀了几个人，也许干了点儿好事，然后又多喝了不少。

String.Source: But if you don't need me right now, then I guess I'll have to keep the riches to myself. And it's a great day for a heist.
String.Dest: 可你现在要是不需要我，那宝物我就只好独吞啦。今天是个打劫的好日子。

String.Source: But if you don't need me right now, then I guess I'll have to keep the riches to myself. And it's a great day for a heist.
String.Dest: 可你现在要是不需要我，那宝物我就只好独吞啦。今天是个打劫的好日子。

String.Source: Actually, they had planned on naming me after the priestess.
String.Dest: 实际上，他们本打算指定我继承祭司的位子。

String.Source: Besides, I said the vows at the Temple of Mara, and I promised Jade I'd do my best not to piss on them. Just breaking them was a good compromise.
String.Dest: 另外，我在玛拉神殿发下了誓，对洁承诺，会尽自己最大努力的不去冲他们撒尿。光是打残他们就够了。做出这个妥协的我是多么善良啊。

String.Source: That's not real family. That's just a bunch of people wearing the same clothes. So don't forget who's really got your back.
String.Dest: 那不是真正的家庭。只是一群人穿着同样的衣服罢了。所以不要忘了是谁真正把你带回来的。

String.Source: Ugh...I like fast men. Not old, wrinkly grandpas who move around by screaming.
String.Dest: 啊……我喜欢动作麻利的人，而不是那些边走边尖叫的脆弱老头。

String.Source: Whatever.
String.Dest: 无所谓。

String.Source: You practically had to yank the purse from their belt for them to notice.
String.Dest: 为了让他们注意，你可能不得不突然从他们的皮带上扯下钱包。

String.Source: I'm cautious. Not because I want to be, but because I've got no choice. It takes me a second to read the shadows around me.
String.Dest: 谨慎并非我所愿，而是因为我无路可退。谨慎让我在极短的时间内察觉到了四周潜伏的阴影。

String.Source: A girl can get used to that kind of stuff. So I rather stick with you and do it some more.
String.Dest: 一个女孩可以习惯这种事。所以我当然缠上你了，再多干几次吧。

String.Source: Yeah, I know people say that stuff all the time, but I mean it. Your blood is my blood.
String.Dest: 是，我知道人们都在说那事。但我是认真的，我们亲密无间。

String.Source: There isn't a lot of things in this world I take seriously, but blood is one of them.
String.Dest: 这世上我认真对待的东西不多，”血与火“算一个。

String.Source: Yeah, except these jesters took you in after you ran a couple errands.
String.Dest: 没错，除非这些小丑们在你跑完一些差事后拉你入伙了。

String.Source: So if you find a half-eaten piece of bread roll in your sack, that's because I'm leaving you the rest. No need to thank me, we're family.
String.Dest: 所以如果你在口袋里发现一个吃了一半儿的面包片，那是我吃剩下留给你的。别客气，我们是一家人。

String.Source: You sure about that? I was starting to like you, and now you have to go and ruin it by talking.
String.Dest: 你确定是那样？我过去开始喜欢你，而现在你却说必须要去毁了它。

String.Source: Funny you bring up taverns, because that's where I'd ply my trade. Drunks made for good practice.
String.Dest: 说起酒馆那可是很有趣的，因为那里是我一直干活的地方。醉鬼们可是很好的连手对象。

String.Source: Of course. We're accomplices, right? No, more than that. Like I said, bones and blood. You and me, we're family.
String.Dest: 当然。我们是帮凶，对不对？不，不止这些。就像我说的，骨子里和血液中。你和我，我们是一家人。

String.Source: Stubborn yes, patient, no. Being born was the first and last time I was ever late for anything.
String.Dest: 坚决地肯定，忍让地…否定。打出生以来，第一次也是最后一次为某件事迟到。

String.Source: First time you smell it, you'll know what I'm talking about. Don't drink it though. Tastes like a rusty dagger.
String.Dest: 你第一次闻到的时候，你就会知道我在说什么。但是别去喝，那玩意尝起来就像生锈的匕首。

String.Source: Can't blame the priestess. Two out of three isn't bad. Two blind eyes, one wrong date.
String.Dest: 不能怪女祭司，至少三分之二还不坏。两个是盲人，还有一个则是记错了日期。

String.Source: That depends. Which time?
String.Dest: 那要看，什么时候？

String.Source: Oh, you're not getting rid of me that easily. I owe you my life. That makes us family. Oath sisters.
String.Dest: 哦，休想轻易地摆脱我。我还欠你一条命呢。我们是家人不是吗。我们是誓约姐妹啊。

String.Source: That's right. If you say the word, I'll be your shadow. Might just follow you anyway, even if you don't say it.
String.Dest: 是的。只要你说一句话，我就会是你的影子。即使你什么也不说，我也会坚定的追随你。

String.Source: That was the last time I was late for anything. Now I'm just making up for lost time.
String.Dest: 这是最后一次我为什么事情迟到了。现在我只会弥补失去的时间。

String.Source: So if you need a little advice on how to best relieve these townsfolk of their burdens, just ask.
String.Dest: 所以，如果你需要一个关于如何减轻这些居民负担的小小忠告，那就请问吧。

String.Source: Seems to me you can just polish a few swords and pretty soon everyone's ready to call you kin.
String.Dest: 在我看来，你只需要把你的剑磨得铮亮，那马上就会一大堆人等着来跟你称兄道弟了。

String.Source: Is that your way of trying to get rid of me? (Laughs) That's pretty good. Looks like you're learning.
String.Dest: 那就是你用来摆脱我的办法么？(笑声) 棒极了。看来你还是有长进的啊。

String.Source: Or maybe now I'm making up for lost time. But I don't like waiting. I like fast jobs, fast hands and fast men.
String.Dest: 或者我现在可以化妆来节省时间. 但是我不喜欢等待. 我喜欢干脆的工作, 熟练的家伙和做事利落的人.

String.Source: I know that! I just...I just couldn't help myself. It's not my fault the stupid bitch has to flaunt her wealth in front of me.
String.Dest: 我知道！我只是……我只是情不自禁。是那个愚蠢的婊子自己在我面前显摆她的财富的，这不是我的错。

String.Source: I'll bring you to my side eventually. You'll see the truth in the darkness. But rest assured, I was the victim here.
String.Dest: 我最终会把你带回我身边的。你会看到黑暗中的真实。但请放心，我是这里的受害者。

String.Source: Although that might be the first place they look. Maybe it's best I go to the last. Winterhold. Soul gems are as valuable as any diamond.
String.Dest: 估计这里是他们第一个要查看的地方。但愿也是最后一个地方吧。冬堡，在这里，灵魂宝石的价值和任何珠宝别无二致。

String.Source: Oh, you're not getting rid of me that easily. I owe you my life. That makes us family. Oath brother and sister.
String.Dest: 噢，你没那么容易摆脱我。我欠你一条命。我们是一家人。我们是誓言兄弟姐妹。

String.Source: But look at you now. You've got guile, and you've got cunning. And you've got your oath-sister to thank.
String.Dest: 但看看现在的你吧。你变得狡诈了，变得圆滑了，而这一切你都得感谢你的誓言姐妹。

String.Source: I remember the day I tricked you into rescuing me. I had you fingered as some naive little milk-drinker.
String.Dest: 我记得曾欺骗过你去救我。我因那如同未戒奶小baby般的幼稚而受到你的谴责。

String.Source: Anyone tries to break that up, and their blood gets spilled. So, what do you say? We heading out?
String.Dest: 任何试图拆散我们的人都会血溅当场。所以，你想说什么呢？我们该出发了吗？

String.Source: I mean, are we sure those shouts are coming out of their mouths? Seems to me the other end makes more sense.
String.Dest: 我的意思是，你确定那些吼声是从他们嘴里发出的么。感觉像是从另一面出来的.

String.Source: Ever try stealing the clothes off a man's back?
String.Dest: 尝试过从后面偷一个人的衣服吗？

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) You look like you're up to something.
String.Dest: （Jurgen Windcaller的号角）看来你已做好准备了。

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) You look like you're up to something.
String.Dest: （Jurgen Windcaller的号角）看来你已做好准备了。

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) You look like you're up to something.
String.Dest: （Jurgen Windcaller的号角）看来你已做好准备了。

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) You look like you're up to something.
String.Dest: （Jurgen Windcaller的号角）看来你已做好准备了。

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) You look like you're up to something.
String.Dest: （Jurgen Windcaller的号角）看来你已做好准备了。

String.Source: A sword is much harder to lift than a purse. How did you manage to take it?
String.Dest: 一把剑可比钱包沉多了，你当初怎么带着它的？

String.Source: A sword is much harder to lift than a purse. How did you manage to take it?
String.Dest: 一把剑可比钱包沉多了，你当初怎么带着它的？

String.Source: A sword is much harder to lift than a purse. How did you manage to take it?
String.Dest: 一把剑可比钱包沉多了，你当初怎么带着它的？

String.Source: A sword is much harder to lift than a purse. How did you manage to take it?
String.Dest: 一把剑可比钱包沉多了，你当初怎么带着它的？

String.Source: I'll get the door open and lead you out.
String.Dest: 我将会把门弄开然后领你出去。

String.Source: I'll get the door open and lead you out.
String.Dest: 我将会把门弄开然后领你出去。

String.Source: I'll get the door open and lead you out.
String.Dest: 我将会把门弄开然后领你出去。

String.Source: Whatever, I don't listen to what you babble on about anyway.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，我不想听你的胡言乱语了。

String.Source: Lover's quarrel? How ridiculously petty.
String.Dest: 情侣吵架？多么荒唐而微不足道的事。

String.Source: Lover's quarrel? How ridiculously petty.
String.Dest: 情侣吵架？多么荒唐而微不足道的事。

String.Source: Lover's quarrel? How ridiculously petty.
String.Dest: 情侣吵架？多么荒唐而微不足道的事。

String.Source: I didn't come to help you escape. I just want to ask you some questions.
String.Dest: 我并不是来帮你逃跑的。我只是想问你一些问题。

String.Source: I didn't come to help you escape. I just want to ask you some questions.
String.Dest: 我并不是来帮你逃跑的。我只是想问你一些问题。

String.Source: I didn't come to help you escape. I just want to ask you some questions.
String.Dest: 我并不是来帮你逃跑的。我只是想问你一些问题。

String.Source: I didn't come to help you escape. I just want to ask you some questions.
String.Dest: 我并不是来帮你逃跑的。我只是想问你一些问题。

String.Source: I love blood myself. It's my favorite thing about murder.
String.Dest: 我很喜欢鲜血，那是关于谋杀我最喜欢的部分。

String.Source: I love blood myself. It's my favorite thing about murder.
String.Dest: 我很喜欢鲜血，那是关于谋杀我最喜欢的部分。

String.Source: I love blood myself. It's my favorite thing about murder.
String.Dest: 我很喜欢鲜血，那是关于谋杀我最喜欢的部分。

String.Source: Sundas is a better name. The afternoon sun is better than any morning.
String.Dest: 桑达斯是个好名字。午后的太阳比早上的要好得多。

String.Source: What did you steal from Black-Briar Manor?
String.Dest: 你从黑荆棘酒庄偷了什么？

String.Source: Well, as long as you learned your lesson.
String.Dest: 好吧，但是記住你學到的教訓。

String.Source: Well, as long as you learned your lesson.
String.Dest: 好吧，但是記住你學到的教訓。

String.Source: Any time, oath-sister.
String.Dest: 随时都行，我的宣誓姐妹。

String.Source: They'll put you in jail for anything these days.
String.Dest: 他们会为这几天的事情而把你扔进监狱的。

String.Source: They'll put you in jail for anything these days.
String.Dest: 他们会为这几天的事情而把你扔进监狱的。

String.Source: Fine. I'll go interrupt the guard like you asked.
String.Dest: 好。我会像你请求的那样打断守卫。

String.Source: Fine. I'll go interrupt the guard like you asked.
String.Dest: 好。我会像你请求的那样打断守卫。

String.Source: Alduin is dead. The world is safe. The next one will have to wait.
String.Dest: Alduin死了。天下和平，下一个人必将继续等待。

String.Source: How about I give you a lockpick.
String.Dest: 我给你一个开锁器怎么样。

String.Source: How about I give you a lockpick.
String.Dest: 我给你一个开锁器怎么样。

String.Source: How about I give you a lockpick.
String.Dest: 我给你一个开锁器怎么样。

String.Source: And yet the real monster survived. And no one was the wiser.
String.Dest: 结果是那个真正得怪物还存活着，所有人都犯了蠢。

String.Source: And yet the real monster survived. And no one was the wiser.
String.Dest: 结果是那个真正得怪物还存活着，所有人都犯了蠢。

String.Source: And yet the real monster survived. And no one was the wiser.
String.Dest: 结果是那个真正得怪物还存活着，所有人都犯了蠢。

String.Source: And yet the real monster survived. And no one was the wiser.
String.Dest: 结果是那个真正得怪物还存活着，所有人都犯了蠢。

String.Source: I don't think they bathe together. They probably shout the dirt off each other.
String.Dest: 我不认为他们会一起洗澡。他们可能会直接吼掉对方的污垢。

String.Source: Not my fault. I told you to go to Riften. You never listen to anyone.
String.Dest: 这事不怪我。我告訴你要去裂谷城。是你谁的话也听不进。

String.Source: Not my fault. I told you to go to Riften. You never listen to anyone.
String.Dest: 这事不怪我。我告訴你要去裂谷城。是你谁的话也听不进。

String.Source: Not my fault. I told you to go to Riften. You never listen to anyone.
String.Dest: 这事不怪我。我告訴你要去裂谷城。是你谁的话也听不进。

String.Source: Would Winterhold have been the better choice?
String.Dest: 那么冬堡不是更好的选择吗？

String.Source: Would Winterhold have been the better choice?
String.Dest: 那么冬堡不是更好的选择吗？

String.Source: Wait. I need to ask you about a journal you stole.
String.Dest: 等一下！我要问问关于你偷的一本日记的事。

String.Source: Wait. I need to ask you about a journal you stole.
String.Dest: 等一下！我要问问关于你偷的一本日记的事。

String.Source: Wait. I need to ask you about a journal you stole.
String.Dest: 等一下！我要问问关于你偷的一本日记的事。

String.Source: Wait. I need to ask you about a journal you stole.
String.Dest: 等一下！我要问问关于你偷的一本日记的事。

String.Source: Actually, we think the Thalmor are dragons in mortal form.
String.Dest: 实际上，我觉得那些梭默其实是龙化作人形的样子。

String.Source: Actually, we think the Thalmor are dragons in mortal form.
String.Dest: 实际上，我觉得那些梭默其实是龙化作人形的样子。

String.Source: There's a passageway two cells down. I can tell by the way the air comes through the wall. Probably got a Shadowmark on it too.
String.Dest: 再走过两个房间就能看见通道了。我闻着空气的味道就能分辨出来。说不定上面还有个暗影标记呢。

String.Source: You really are crazy. Like voices in your head crazy. Like talking to chickens crazy. (Snickers) Well, that's fine with me.
String.Dest: 你真的疯了。比如听到有声音脑中疯狂叫嚣，再比如着迷的和鸡说话。（嗤嗤的笑）很好，正合我意。.

String.Source: Of course, I could've been out of here days ago, but I figured I'd wait for some hero to help me distract the guards. That's where you come in.
String.Dest: 我要是能走，当然几天前就走了，可我发现必须要有个牛人帮我引开那些守卫。现在就看你啦。

String.Source: Naturally. Last I heard it wasn't infested with spiders like the Rift, or angry folks like Windhelm. Just mages.
String.Dest: 自然的，最后我听说没有像裂谷城一样上面爬满蜘蛛,，或者像风盔城那些愤怒的民众，仅仅只是法师。

String.Source: In this case though, the thief stole from me and himself. And spending your wife's coin is apparently not a crime.
String.Dest: 虽然在这种情况下，贼把我和他的都偷了一遍，但花你老婆的钱显然不是犯罪。

String.Source: I mean, the whole thing's kind of weird. A bunch of old men living together, bathing together...On second thought, it's not weird, it's gross.
String.Dest: 我是说，整个事情感觉都有些古怪。一群老男人一起住，一起洗澡……再一想，那不是古怪，是讨厌。

String.Source: Great. Now that that's settled, let's do a little fishing, shall we?
String.Dest: 太好了。现在问题都解决了，让我们做一个小渔港，好吗？

String.Source: Yeah, and?
String.Dest: 嗯，然后呢?

String.Source: That's right. In Solitude, it doesn't take any missing gold for you to be accused of being a thief.
String.Dest: 就是那样，在独孤城，你可不能拿走任何丢失的金币，否则会被指控是小偷。

String.Source: The robes, the shouting, the monastery...it's all part of the plan.
String.Dest: 长袍，吼声，僧侣……都是计划的一部分。

String.Source: It's pretty smart. They get these "pilgrims" to come up here, then they tell them to go get their hands on something valuable.
String.Dest: 真聪明。他们忽悠这些“朝圣者”来这儿，然后告诉他们要用自己的双手得到一些有价值的东西。

String.Source: Sibbi was always a cute one. His face would look great on a fence post. I'm kidding, of course.
String.Dest: Sibbi一直是个可爱的家伙。他的脸紧贴着篱笆的时候很好看。当然，我在开玩笑。

String.Source: Something about married people can't steal from each other. If what he did isn't theft, then I'm a priest.
String.Dest: 就是些关于结婚的双方不能从对方那里偷东西的事儿。如果他没偷东西，那我就是个牧师了。

String.Source: That's because I still need my gear. There's a passageway two cells down, which probably has a Shadowmark. We need to break into that one.
String.Dest: 这是因为我还想要回我的装备呢。两个牢房下面有一个通道，边上可能会有个暗影标记。我们需要进到那个通道里去。

String.Source: At some point though, the guild turned their eyes elsewhere. Things settled down, and for a moment I thought of doing the same.
String.Dest: 虽然某些时候，公会把他们的目光放向了别处，但当事情安顿下来，我一时间也想做同样的事儿。

String.Source: Mages are like bandits. Always good to have a couple around to blame things on, in case a job gets bloody.
String.Dest: 法师跟强盗一个样。【两个人双双抱怨周围的东西总归是好的，至少这些事代替了血腥的工作。】

String.Source: One night we went to the temple, woke Jade up, and asked her to marry us. Had to be her, being a fellow cutpurse. Then we ran. And kept running.
String.Dest: 那个晚上我们去了神殿，把洁叫醒，让她嫁给我们。作为小偷的同伙，她不得不同意。然后我们就跑了，不停地跑。

String.Source: Then I just had to act drunk and fall in his arms. Wasn't even theft, as far as I'm considered. I'd say he still owes me a septim or too.
String.Dest: 然后我醉醺醺的倒在他怀里了。就我来说，这不算是偷窃。但我得说他还欠我一两个金币。

String.Source: You want a killer, go find a Dark Brotherhood assassin. But if you're smart, you'll keep me around to pick his pocket.
String.Dest: 你想要一个杀手？去找一名黑暗兄弟会的刺客。但如果你够聪明，你会让我去掏他的口袋。

String.Source: And I told you Maven Black-Briar won't let me set foot in that town unless it came in a sack.
String.Dest: 我告诉你，黑荆棘玛雯是不会让我进这个镇的，除非把我装进麻袋里。

String.Source: What lesson? He stole from me, and I paid him back in kind. Only problem was his theft wasn't technically stealing.
String.Dest: 什么教训？他偷了我东西，我让他偿还，唯一的问题在于他的行为不是严格意义上的偷窃。

String.Source: But don't think you didn't blow an opportunity back there. Not every day you can come back from Sovngarde alive.
String.Dest: 但别以为你没能把握住一个回到那里的机会。不是每一天你都能从松加德活着回来的。

String.Source: I'm going to fetch my gear. There's a passageway two cells down. Might be noisy getting inside, so make sure to stamp your feet or something.
String.Dest: 我要去取我的装备。下去两个牢房有个通道。也去进去后会很吵，所以确保跺跺你的脚或者做些其他什么的。

String.Source: Of course, they wouldn't need a plan if they just came down from the mountain every now and then.
String.Dest: 当然了，如果他们不时地从山上下来的话就不需要计划了。

String.Source: Hemming's the type to carry his weapons to bed with him, so I figured the best way to lift the sword was to have him invite me to bed.
String.Dest: 我知道的，而且赫明是那种睡觉都带着武器的类型，所以我估摸着拿到那把剑的最好办法是让他邀我上床。

String.Source: You sure? A lockpick was all I really needed. Well, if you're going to open it yourself, get the key off of one of the guards.
String.Dest: 你确定？我倒是只要一个开锁器就能搞定了。好吧，如果你想自己开的话，去守卫身上把钥匙弄过来。

String.Source: Right. You know you heard every word. But yeah, I get it. Save the pillow talk and get back to doing what you do best. Well, I plan on it.
String.Dest: 得，看来你都听见了。 不过，嗯哼，我懂的。 回去该干嘛干嘛去，别想吹枕边风。。。嗯，就这么定了

String.Source: You're crazy. I like crazy. I like you. But you're making a mistake if you think I'm some cold-blooded assassin.
String.Dest: 你很疯狂，而我喜欢疯狂。所以我挺喜欢你。但如果你认为我是个冷血的刺客那你就错了。

String.Source: Well in that case, maybe I ought to sit my rear end back in this cage. You aren't with the Brotherhood, are you? I suppose they don't ask questions.
String.Dest: 好吧，如果是那样的话，或许我应该坐回牢房里去。你不是兄弟会的人对吧？我猜他们是不会问问题的。

String.Source: Well, that was easy. Cry for help and the white knights come running to the rescue.
String.Dest: 哎，很简单嘛。大声哭喊着救命然后就有白衣骑士冲过来救啦。

String.Source: No offense to Argonian names, but Swamp-Breath-Wusha puts the wrong kind of fear in your enemies.
String.Dest: 全然不是想要嘲笑亚龙人的名字，不过“有着沼泽之息的乌沙”这个名字，会让你的敌人们对你产生一种异样的恐惧。

String.Source: Want my help? It's gonna cost you. Don't want my help? It's gonna cost you more.
String.Dest: 想要我帮忙吗？那你可得大出血了。不要我帮忙？你会为此付出更多的代价。

String.Source: Want my help? It's gonna cost you. Don't want my help? It's gonna cost you more.
String.Dest: 想要我帮忙吗？那你可得大出血了。不要我帮忙？你会为此付出更多的代价。

String.Source: No. Wait, have you?
String.Dest: 不，等一下，你呢?

String.Source: The least you could've done is stolen something. It was crazy not to.
String.Dest: 你能做的事情唯有去偷些什么东西，如果不那么做的话你会疯的。

String.Source: It's as good as giving me the key. But I can't just walk out of here dressed like this. We have to get my stuff too.
String.Dest: 就像给了我钥匙一样好。可我不能穿成这样就走出去。我们还得去拿我的东西。

String.Source: That's what happens when I'm not around to keep you honest. In fact, if I were you, I would never leave me again.
String.Dest: 这就是我不在你身边督促你保持诚实时会发生的事。事实上，如果我是你，我永远都不会再离开我的。

String.Source: So you're sneaking into their nest basically to find proof. Sounds like a plan.
String.Dest: 所以你是打算潜行到他们的居所去搜集情报。听起来倒是一个不错的计划。

String.Source: You go head off the guard and just keep flapping your gums. Then follow me down the passageway.
String.Dest: 你直接朝着卫兵的方向走就好，要一直拍着头套的粘合处。然后跟着我走通道。

String.Source: This time I was after a sword, one of Hemming's.
String.Dest: 这次我是在找一把剑，是属于 Hemming 的剑之一。

String.Source: Because I'm getting out of here one way or the other, and I suggest you make it easier on the both of us.
String.Dest: 反正我总会找到条路从这儿出去的，所以我希望你能选个对你我都好的选项。

String.Source: Because I'm getting out of here one way or the other, and I suggest you make it easier on the both of us.
String.Dest: 反正我总会找到条路从这儿出去的，所以我希望你能选个对你我都好的选项。

String.Source: Who's asking? Seems to me the only thing I know will get you killed for saying it.
String.Dest: 谁在说话？我只知道你肯定会杀掉说话的那玩意儿。

String.Source: I'm not a killer. I'm a thief. Anyone can steal from a dead man. Being a cutpurse takes skill, and guile.
String.Dest: 我不是一个杀手。我是一个小偷。谁都能从死人那儿偷东西。但要做一个贼不仅需要足够的技巧，还需要足够的狡猾。

String.Source: Oh, okay. That makes sense. I think. That's how they've been hiding all this time. Changing their shadows.
String.Dest: 啊，好吧。我想那气消了。这就是他们总能够隐藏自己的原因。（通过）变换他们的影子。

String.Source: Ugh! That's even worse! Next time you get a visual like that, do me a favor and keep it to yourself. Some of us prefer being blind.
String.Dest: 啊! 没比这更糟的! 下次你搞的那么难看,就留着你自己用吧. 我们宁愿眼睛都瞎了.

String.Source: So I guess what it comes down to is this. You need me, and I sort of need you, but not really.
String.Dest: 所以我猜事情会变成这样。你会需要我，而我可能也会需要你，但并不会很需要。

String.Source: So I guess what it comes down to is this. You need me, and I sort of need you, but not really.
String.Dest: 所以我猜事情会变成这样。你会需要我，而我可能也会需要你，但并不会很需要。

String.Source: The problem was he and Maven were like a child and a fresh thumb. They call people milk-drinkers in Skyrim, but Hemming is the real deal.
String.Dest: 问题是，他和Maven就像一个孩子和一个新手。在天际他们被称为乳臭未干，但 Hemming是实打实的。

String.Source: Not me, but I think those gray-bearded mouth breathers are. I mean, you do realize what they asked you to do, right?
String.Dest: 我可不是，我只把灰胡子的话当耳边风。我是说，你知道他们要你去干嘛的，对吧？

String.Source: Well, I'm gonna need a lockpick too. These things don't open themselves. But yeah, anything to slow down the guard will help.
String.Dest: 那好，我还缺一个开锁器，那些东西可不会自个儿打开，顺便，你要是能拖住守卫那也是妥妥的。

String.Source: Oh, I see what you're saying...You think I should chop her up first? Maybe make a nice little family portrait?
String.Dest: 哦，我明白了……你的意思是说先把她剁了？也许做个漂亮的小半身像。

String.Source: Didn't seem so at the time. He was a fisherman. Not fishing pockets, but actual fish. Left it all behind when I stuck my hand in Maven's honey jar.
String.Dest: 那时候还不怎么样。他那时候是个渔民。不是掏人腰包，而是真真正正的打渔。当我的手卡在玛雯的蜂蜜罐里之后就什么都顾不得了。

String.Source: The truth is I joined them to destroy them. You're going to help me.
String.Dest: 其实我加入他们是为了消灭他们，你要帮助我。

String.Source: At least you aren't in prison. Windhelm is less kind to thieves than Solitude.
String.Dest: 至少你不在牢里。对贼来说风盔可比独孤城差远了。

String.Source: At least you aren't in prison. Windhelm is less kind to thieves than Solitude.
String.Dest: 至少你不在牢里。对贼来说风盔可比独孤城差远了。

String.Source: Tell me about the Goldenglow Estate job.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲金芒庄园任务。

String.Source: Tell me about the Goldenglow Estate job.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲金芒庄园任务。

String.Source: Tell me about the Goldenglow Estate job.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲金芒庄园任务。

String.Source: Tell me about the Goldenglow Estate job.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲金芒庄园任务。

String.Source: Tell me about the Goldenglow Estate job.
String.Dest: 给我讲讲金芒庄园任务。

String.Source: What was it?
String.Dest: 那是啥?

String.Source: What was it?
String.Dest: 那是啥?

String.Source: What was it?
String.Dest: 那是啥?

String.Source: I do, but it's not something I can just explain.
String.Dest: 我知道，但是我不知道如何去解释。

String.Source: Then there wasn't anything particularly valuable inside.
String.Dest: 那里面没有任何有价值的东西。

String.Source: Then there wasn't anything particularly valuable inside.
String.Dest: 那里面没有任何有价值的东西。

String.Source: Then there wasn't anything particularly valuable inside.
String.Dest: 那里面没有任何有价值的东西。

String.Source: Passion stokes fires of all kinds, some more dangerous than others.
String.Dest: 冲动是魔鬼。

String.Source: Passion stokes fires of all kinds, some more dangerous than others.
String.Dest: 冲动是魔鬼。

String.Source: Passion stokes fires of all kinds, some more dangerous than others.
String.Dest: 冲动是魔鬼。

String.Source: And it's good to see you? I really don't know what you're fishing for here.
String.Dest: 很高兴见到你 我真不知道你在这钓什么。（这句待议）.

String.Source: And it's good to see you? I really don't know what you're fishing for here.
String.Dest: 很高兴见到你 我真不知道你在这钓什么。（这句待议）.

String.Source: And it's good to see you? I really don't know what you're fishing for here.
String.Dest: 很高兴见到你 我真不知道你在这钓什么。（这句待议）.

String.Source: What did you steal from Black-Briar Manor?
String.Dest: 你从黑荆棘酒庄偷了什么？

String.Source: What did you steal from Black-Briar Manor?
String.Dest: 你从黑荆棘酒庄偷了什么？

String.Source: You're my oath-sister, and my friend. That's why I want you to stay.
String.Dest: 你是我宣誓的姐妹，也是我的朋友，這就是為什麼我希望你可以留下來。

String.Source: You're my oath-sister, and my friend. That's why I want you to stay.
String.Dest: 你是我宣誓的姐妹，也是我的朋友，這就是為什麼我希望你可以留下來。

String.Source: You're my oath-sister, and my friend. That's why I want you to stay.
String.Dest: 你是我宣誓的姐妹，也是我的朋友，這就是為什麼我希望你可以留下來。

String.Source: Let's just move on.
String.Dest: 算了，我们走吧。.

String.Source: So what happened exactly?
String.Dest: 到底发生了什么事？

String.Source: So what happened exactly?
String.Dest: 到底发生了什么事？

String.Source: So what happened exactly?
String.Dest: 到底发生了什么事？

String.Source: How dare you suggest we rob honest, hard-working townsfolk!
String.Dest: 你怎么敢建议我们去抢劫诚实、勤奋的市民！

String.Source: How dare you suggest we rob honest, hard-working townsfolk!
String.Dest: 你怎么敢建议我们去抢劫诚实、勤奋的市民！

String.Source: Mourning the dead, perhaps. Dragons have been spotted in the area.
String.Dest: 或许是对死者表示哀悼。龙已经侵入这个地区了。

String.Source: Mourning the dead, perhaps. Dragons have been spotted in the area.
String.Dest: 或许是对死者表示哀悼。龙已经侵入这个地区了。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) You look a bit confused about this next mission.
String.Dest: （外交豁免） 对接下来的任务你似乎有些迷惑。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) You look a bit confused about this next mission.
String.Dest: （外交豁免） 对接下来的任务你似乎有些迷惑。

String.Source: How did you break in?
String.Dest: 你是怎么闯进来的？

String.Source: How did you break in?
String.Dest: 你是怎么闯进来的？

String.Source: How did you break in?
String.Dest: 你是怎么闯进来的？

String.Source: What about the actual fishing part?
String.Dest: 关于捕鱼的那部分是什么？

String.Source: What about the actual fishing part?
String.Dest: 关于捕鱼的那部分是什么？

String.Source: What about the actual fishing part?
String.Dest: 关于捕鱼的那部分是什么？

String.Source: How do you choose your victims?
String.Dest: 你是怎么选择牺牲品的？

String.Source: How do you choose your victims?
String.Dest: 你是怎么选择牺牲品的？

String.Source: How do you choose your victims?
String.Dest: 你是怎么选择牺牲品的？

String.Source: Riften is always a home for thieves. The guild will provide you safe haven.
String.Dest: 裂谷城一直是盗贼的老家，有公会可以给你提供安全庇护。

String.Source: Riften is always a home for thieves. The guild will provide you safe haven.
String.Dest: 裂谷城一直是盗贼的老家，有公会可以给你提供安全庇护。

String.Source: The Guild didn't warn you there would be consequences?
String.Dest: 公会没有告知你会有后果？

String.Source: The Guild didn't warn you there would be consequences?
String.Dest: 公会没有告知你会有后果？

String.Source: The Guild didn't warn you there would be consequences?
String.Dest: 公会没有告知你会有后果？

String.Source: I wish I could, but I don't know how.
String.Dest: 我希望自己有办法，可是没有。

String.Source: What did your father do?
String.Dest: 你父亲做了什么？

String.Source: What did your father do?
String.Dest: 你父亲做了什么？

String.Source: What did your father do?
String.Dest: 你父亲做了什么？

String.Source: Seems like a perfectly healthy lifestyle to me.
String.Dest: 听起来简直是极品健康生活方式啊。

String.Source: Seems like a perfectly healthy lifestyle to me.
String.Dest: 听起来简直是极品健康生活方式啊。

String.Source: Did your parents ever find out you were a thief?
String.Dest: 你家人知道你在做贼了吗？

String.Source: Did your parents ever find out you were a thief?
String.Dest: 你家人知道你在做贼了吗？

String.Source: Did your parents ever find out you were a thief?
String.Dest: 你家人知道你在做贼了吗？

String.Source: It gets worse. That place was guarded better than a princess' maidenhead.
String.Dest: 这更糟。要突破这地方可比破了公主的处还要难。

String.Source: No one can resist the sound of coin. No sweeter music in all of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 没人能抗拒硬币的叮当声，这是泰姆瑞尔大陆最美妙的音乐了。

String.Source: Dad knew them his cabbage picking days were over. And I knew, that if I wanted to survive, I had to become a better thief.
String.Dest: 爸爸知道他摘卷心菜的日子到头了。而我明白,如果我想活下去,就不得不成为一个更好的小偷。

String.Source: The mead's probably sour too, and I bet everyone stinks of the dead. In fact, the whole place sounds miserable.
String.Dest: 蜜酒大概也酸了。我打赌每具尸体都烂的发臭了。事实上，所有地方都听上去很凄惨。

String.Source: I don't know what it was or where it came from, but it fetched a good price.
String.Dest: 我不知道它是什么玩意儿或者它是从哪儿来的,但它应该能卖出个好价钱。

String.Source: I snuck in from the docks, and used the long moonlight shadows to my advantage. Better when there's some light to distract the eye.
String.Dest: 我从港口哪里潜入，用月光下的长影有效隐蔽。要是附近有醒目的光源就更好

String.Source: Ivarstead. Lots of gullible pilgrims, but poor ones. Shor's Stone, on the other hand, sits on the road to Riften.
String.Dest: 紫杉镇。这儿有很多轻信的朝圣者，但他们大都很穷。舒尔之石，在另一边，座落在通往裂谷城的道路上。

String.Source: So I became the best. Nothing more important than family.
String.Dest: 所以我是最好的。没有东西比家庭更重要。

String.Source: Only there was nothing. I almost woke Aringoth up to demand where he kept his valuables. Then I noticed a shadow by the door.
String.Dest: 只是这里什么都没有。我几乎就要把Aringoth叫醒，询问他把他的财宝藏在哪儿了。然后我注意到了门旁的一个影子。

String.Source: It wasn't just that. Even the Black-Briar's have those bookcases with griffins on top. Aringoth's were understated. It didn't bode well.
String.Dest: 不只是这样。即使黑色荆棘有那些顶端刻有狮鹫的书架，阿林格斯也太低调了。这可不是个好兆头。

String.Source: Way to get my hopes up. But I doubt there's anything you know that I wouldn't.
String.Dest: 这是重新燃起我的希望的方法。但我恐怕你知道我什么都不行

String.Source: But I can tell by that stupid question of yours that you didn't manage to get anything. Worse yet, you didn't even try.
String.Dest: 但是我能区分你的问题和那个愚蠢的问题，因为你的什么都没办成【上下文？】。更糟的是，你连试都不试。

String.Source: He called the guard. Punishment for a thief was to lose your thumbs, and they would've taken both of them, if dad hadn't shown up.
String.Dest: 他喊来了守卫。他们对偷窃的惩罚是剁掉你的拇指，【如果老爹没有出现的话，就两个都要剁掉。】

String.Source: Well...I got that Delphine wants to kill dragons, but now we're messing with Thalmor? Because they what...raised them?
String.Dest: 好吧……我明戴尔菲娜想去屠龙，但为什么我们现在又要给梭默捣乱呢？因为梭莫……什么……召唤了龙？

String.Source: Little mining village. Plenty of shadows from the mountain. Perfect.
String.Dest: 一座矿业小村。山脉投下了大片的阴影。真完美。

String.Source: Stole from that bitch Maven Black-Briar. And why not? What kind of skeever's excuse for a thief doesn't steal from the fattest pockets in the city?
String.Dest: 从那个叫黑荆棘玛雯的婊子手里偷东西如何。为什么不呢？难道skeever能给出什么不让小偷们从城市里最富得流油的口袋里偷东西的理由吗？

String.Source: Ugh, now I'm making myself sick. But really, old people just should die.
String.Dest: 啊，我现在就是在自寻烦恼。但说真的，老家伙们就该去死嘛。

String.Source: Hmph, now I want to go there even less. But I like you, and the Rift is a good location...although I'm not on the best terms with the Thieves Guild.
String.Dest: 恩，我现在不怎么想去那里，但是我喜欢你，而且裂痕领是个挺好的地方的……虽然我感觉那里还不是安放盗贼工会的最好条件。

String.Source: Still haven't won you over, huh? I told you, I'm a stubborn one, and I'll bring you over to my side in due time.
String.Dest: 谁都还没争取到你，是吧？告诉你，我是个固执的家伙。在适当的时候我一定会让你改变立场站到我这边的。

String.Source: At some point though, the guild turned their eyes elsewhere. Things settled down, and for a moment I thought of doing the same.
String.Dest: 虽然某些时候，公会把他们的目光放向了别处，但当事情安顿下来，我一时间也想做同样的事儿。

String.Source: Same rules apply. If the widows and orphans here are too busy scouring the sky for flying lizards, then their eyes won't track my hands.
String.Dest: 这规则同样适用。如果这里的寡妇和孤儿忙着给那些会飞的大蜥蜴擦洗天空，那他们就不会紧盯着我的手了。

String.Source: I want you to tell me you saved the world to steal it. That you didn't come back from the Mead Hall of Nord heroes empty handed.
String.Dest: 我想要你告诉我你去拯救世界，是为了偷窃，我想你一定没有从蜜酒大厅的诺德英雄那里空手而归。

String.Source: He begged the guard to take his thumbs instead of mine. Guard was willing, so long as somebody took the blame
String.Dest: 他恳求守卫，想代替我去坐牢。守卫同意了，只要有人承担责任其他的都无所谓。

String.Source: One night we went to the temple, woke Jade up, and asked her to marry us. Had to be her, being a fellow cutpurse. Then we ran. And kept running.
String.Dest: 那个晚上我们去了神殿，把洁叫醒，让她嫁给我们。作为小偷的同伙，她不得不同意。然后我们就跑了，不停地跑。

String.Source: One night we went to the temple, woke Jade up, and asked her to marry us. Had to be her, being a fellow cutpurse. Then we ran. And kept running.
String.Dest: 那个晚上我们去了神殿，把洁叫醒，让她嫁给我们。作为小偷的同伙，她不得不同意。然后我们就跑了，不停地跑。

String.Source: We were both fishermen. I fished pockets, he fished fish. Stood by me when I stuck my hand in the Black-Briar honey jar.
String.Dest: 我们都是捞东西的。他捞河里的鱼，我捞别人兜里的财物。直到我在黑荆棘的地盘里失了手。

String.Source: All the usual telltale signs. Nobles stand out like a vampire's smile, with their clothes and jeweled pendants.
String.Dest: 就是那些贵族们最为常见的标志，他们那服装以及佩戴的珠宝让他们如微笑着的吸血鬼一样显眼。

String.Source: Yeah. Got too sloppy. I tried to lift a pendant off this old noble, lying still on a bench.
String.Dest: 是啊，我太草率了。我看那老贵族还躺在长凳上，就试着想把他脖子上的挂坠顺走。

String.Source: His eyes didn't reflect any light. So I thought he was sleeping. Turns out he was blind.
String.Dest: 他的眼中不见反光。所以我以为他在睡觉。结果发现他是个盲人。

String.Source: You go and save the world. I'll just stay here and help the Jarl clean up. I hear he's got a safe that's particularly filthy.
String.Dest: 去吧，去拯救这个世界。而我会呆在这儿帮领主扫除的。我听说他有个安全之所特别的脏。

String.Source: Healthy? Have you seen what they eat? Dried fish and salted meat. And I'm not talking about the food.
String.Dest: 健康？你到底有没有看到他们吃什么？鱼干和盐腌的肉。还有，我不是在说食物.

String.Source: Heavily guarded too, and easy to get lost. They say the first floor was built like a maze.
String.Dest: 这里戒备森严，而且容易迷路。他们说这里简直就像一个迷宫。

String.Source: Yeah, fine. Maybe you'll try to show me later then, and I'll find out what a big liar you are.
String.Dest: 是啊，好极了。也许你一会儿会想要我看看，然后我就会指出你是个多大的骗子。

String.Source: The weightier a purse, the more misdirection you'll need. Sometimes, if their pendants are bright enough, the purse is the misdirection.
String.Dest: 钱包越重, 你就需要更多的误导. 有时当坠饰足够明亮, 钱包本身就是误导物.

String.Source: I don't even know what that means. If you're saying it's my fault, all I know is it was his idea to come with me after I fished old Maven's pockets.
String.Dest: 我甚至都不知道那是什么意思。如果你的意思是错误在我的话，那么我要说，我扒了玛雯口袋以后是他自己要跟我来的。

String.Source: You mean you want to kill them? Eliminate the fabled Companions? You crazy son of a razorfish. I'm in. Just give the word.
String.Dest: 你是说你想杀了他们？把传说中的战友团给端平了？尼玛真是脑子进水了吧。行，算我一个。就等你一句话了。

String.Source: Some purses sag from the weight of their coin, others are tight but bulge.
String.Dest: 一些钱包里一个子儿都没，但其他的又紧又鼓.

String.Source: That's what happens when I'm not around to keep you honest. In fact, if I were you, I would never leave me again.
String.Dest: 这就是我不在你身边督促你保持诚实时会发生的事。事实上，如果我是你，我永远都不会再离开我的。

String.Source: Not likely. I'd probably have stolen Brunwulf's crown by now. Do Jarl's wear crowns? Well, they won't when I'm through stealing them.
String.Dest: 不可能。目前为止，我可能会去偷乌佛瑞克的王冠。你说领主佩戴的王冠？呃，就算我把它们都偷了，领主们也不会发现。

String.Source: At some point though, the guild turned their eyes elsewhere. Things settled down, and for a moment I thought we'd do the same.
String.Dest: 然而不知何时，公会把目光移向了别处。事情开始安定下来，而一瞬间我以为我们也能获得安宁。

String.Source: Not likely. I'd probably have stolen Ulfric's crown by now. Do Jarl's wear crowns? Well, they won't when I'm through stealing them.
String.Dest: 不可能。目前为止，我可能会去偷乌佛瑞克的王冠。你说领主佩戴的王冠？呃，就算我把它们都偷了，领主们也不会发现。

String.Source: You want to what, protect me or something? That's...unexpected. Well fine! It's not like there's any good loot in Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 你想要什么，保护我还是其他什么？这还真是……出乎意料。那好吧！似乎在松加德也没啥好的战利品了。

String.Source: Sure, they told me "Hands off." But when someone tells me not to do something, it just makes it all the more tempting.
String.Dest: 恩哼，他们告诉我“放手”。但当某人告诉我不要做某事的时候，只回使这一切更诱人。

String.Source: Some wealthy merchants try to wear the farmer's costume, but you know them by the size of their gut.
String.Dest: 一些富商试图穿上农民的衣着，但你知道他们肚子的大小的。

String.Source: It was shape unlike anything I had ever seen. A bizarre fish of some kind, stuffed and mounted.
String.Dest: 这种我前所未见过的模型。某种奇怪的鱼，被制成了标本。

String.Source: Alright, but if you want to hear the basics, I'm willing to share what I know.
String.Dest: 没问题，但你若想听一下基本要素，我会很乐意把我所知的告诉你。

String.Source: So what's that mean...the Thalmor have a dragon nest? But where did they get the eggs? I don't get it. My head hurts.
String.Dest: 那么，这是什么意思……梭默控制着一个龙的巢穴？但是他们是从哪儿得到龙蛋的？我不明白，头开始痛了。

String.Source: It hangs from their waist like a pair of balls, and if you nudge them, they'll reach for them out of instinct.
String.Dest: 它就像球一样挂在他们的腰间，如果你轻轻的推他们的话，出于本能，他们会伸手去拿它的。

String.Source: Funny, my favorite color is white. It's no wonder we don't get along.
String.Dest: 真可笑，我最喜欢白色。难怪我们合不来。

String.Source: Funny, my favorite color is white. It's no wonder we don't get along.
String.Dest: 真可笑，我最喜欢白色。难怪我们合不来。

String.Source: Funny, my favorite color is white. It's no wonder we don't get along.
String.Dest: 真可笑，我最喜欢白色。难怪我们合不来。

String.Source: The female Argonian knight over there. The one you've been traveling with.
String.Dest: 那边的那个Argonian女骑士。你曾一起旅行过的那位。

String.Source: The female Argonian knight over there. The one you've been traveling with.
String.Dest: 那边的那个Argonian女骑士。你曾一起旅行过的那位。

String.Source: What was it?
String.Dest: 那是啥?

String.Source: What was it?
String.Dest: 那是啥?

String.Source: Capturing this dragon was hard enough. We don't have time to lure another.
String.Dest: 捕获这条龙已经够难了，我们没时间去再引一条来。

String.Source: Capturing this dragon was hard enough. We don't have time to lure another.
String.Dest: 捕获这条龙已经够难了，我们没时间去再引一条来。

String.Source: Don't worry. I don't care for any of these people. We're in it for the boon.
String.Dest: 别担心，这些人我谁都不在乎，我们是来领福利的。

String.Source: Don't worry. I don't care for any of these people. We're in it for the boon.
String.Dest: 别担心，这些人我谁都不在乎，我们是来领福利的。

String.Source: Don't worry. I don't care for any of these people. We're in it for the boon.
String.Dest: 别担心，这些人我谁都不在乎，我们是来领福利的。

String.Source: Don't worry. I don't care for any of these people. We're in it for the boon.
String.Dest: 别担心，这些人我谁都不在乎，我们是来领福利的。

String.Source: So if a bandit's approaching and his shadow is behind him, then what?
String.Dest: 所以，若一個強盜正在接近並且身影就在他的背後，那接著是？

String.Source: So if a bandit's approaching and his shadow is behind him, then what?
String.Dest: 所以，若一個強盜正在接近並且身影就在他的背後，那接著是？

String.Source: So if a bandit's approaching and his shadow is behind him, then what?
String.Dest: 所以，若一個強盜正在接近並且身影就在他的背後，那接著是？

String.Source: Maven's not fat or ugly. She's beautiful.
String.Dest: Maven不胖也不丑，她很漂亮。

String.Source: Maven's not fat or ugly. She's beautiful.
String.Dest: Maven不胖也不丑，她很漂亮。

String.Source: So that's why I can't seem to get rid of you.
String.Dest: 这就是我为什么一直无法摆脱你的原因。

String.Source: So that's why I can't seem to get rid of you.
String.Dest: 这就是我为什么一直无法摆脱你的原因。

String.Source: So that's why I can't seem to get rid of you.
String.Dest: 这就是我为什么一直无法摆脱你的原因。

String.Source: What happened after you slipped past him?
String.Dest: 错过他之后又发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened after you slipped past him?
String.Dest: 错过他之后又发生了什么？

String.Source: What happened after you slipped past him?
String.Dest: 错过他之后又发生了什么？

String.Source: Yes, yes, you never had a home and your parents never loved you. Now let's go.
String.Dest: 是的，是的，你从来没有过一个温馨的家和一对爱你的父母。现在我们走吧。

String.Source: Yes, yes, you never had a home and your parents never loved you. Now let's go.
String.Dest: 是的，是的，你从来没有过一个温馨的家和一对爱你的父母。现在我们走吧。

String.Source: Yes, yes, you never had a home and your parents never loved you. Now let's go.
String.Dest: 是的，是的，你从来没有过一个温馨的家和一对爱你的父母。现在我们走吧。

String.Source: I'm glad to see you care.
String.Dest: 我很高兴看到你的关心。

String.Source: I'm glad to see you care.
String.Dest: 我很高兴看到你的关心。

String.Source: I'm glad to see you care.
String.Dest: 我很高兴看到你的关心。

String.Source: I'm glad to see you care.
String.Dest: 我很高兴看到你的关心。

String.Source: I'm glad to see you care.
String.Dest: 我很高兴看到你的关心。

String.Source: What happened at Black-Briar Lodge?
String.Dest: 在黑荆棘酒坊发生什么事了?

String.Source: Maven does whatever I want her too, or she will die.
String.Dest: 玛雯必须要按照我的意愿做事，否则她就会死。

String.Source: Maven does whatever I want her too, or she will die.
String.Dest: 玛雯必须要按照我的意愿做事，否则她就会死。

String.Source: Maven does whatever I want her too, or she will die.
String.Dest: 玛雯必须要按照我的意愿做事，否则她就会死。

String.Source: Maven does whatever I want her too, or she will die.
String.Dest: 玛雯必须要按照我的意愿做事，否则她就会死。

String.Source: Bravo. Your tenacity is something we all aspire to have.
String.Dest: 棒极了，我们都向往拥有你这样的毅力。

String.Source: Bravo. Your tenacity is something we all aspire to have.
String.Dest: 棒极了，我们都向往拥有你这样的毅力。

String.Source: Big deal. Go cry to someone who cares.
String.Dest: 重要的人。去别处找在乎你的人哭去。

String.Source: Big deal. Go cry to someone who cares.
String.Dest: 重要的人。去别处找在乎你的人哭去。

String.Source: Big deal. Go cry to someone who cares.
String.Dest: 重要的人。去别处找在乎你的人哭去。

String.Source: I don't think it works like that.
String.Dest: 我不认为它是那样起作用的。

String.Source: I don't think it works like that.
String.Dest: 我不认为它是那样起作用的。

String.Source: I don't think it works like that.
String.Dest: 我不认为它是那样起作用的。

String.Source: Windhelm is a fine choice. Give my best to the Jarl when you get there.
String.Dest: 风舵城是个理想选择。到了那儿替我向领主带个好儿。

String.Source: The world could end, and cockroaches like us will survive until the next one.
String.Dest: 这个世界也许会结束。而像我们这样的蟑螂们会幸存到下一个世界的到来。

String.Source: The world could end, and cockroaches like us will survive until the next one.
String.Dest: 这个世界也许会结束。而像我们这样的蟑螂们会幸存到下一个世界的到来。

String.Source: Are you mad? Do you see a lake anywhere near this forest?
String.Dest: 你疯了吧？这森林附近哪来的湖？

String.Source: Are you mad? Do you see a lake anywhere near this forest?
String.Dest: 你疯了吧？这森林附近哪来的湖？

String.Source: You really are rather dense, aren't you?
String.Dest: 你们真是相当的合群，不是吗？

String.Source: You really are rather dense, aren't you?
String.Dest: 你们真是相当的合群，不是吗？

String.Source: You really are rather dense, aren't you?
String.Dest: 你们真是相当的合群，不是吗？

String.Source: (Perfect Touch) Yes, it's like slipping their clothes into their shadow.
String.Dest: (完美之触)没错，就像把他们的衣服放到他们的影子里。

String.Source: (Perfect Touch) Yes, it's like slipping their clothes into their shadow.
String.Dest: (完美之触)没错，就像把他们的衣服放到他们的影子里。

String.Source: Yes, it's just like cutting purses. Neck or gut.
String.Dest: 是的。这就像割开钱袋、脖子或者内脏一样。

String.Source: My parents used to work the farms. Thought an honest living would give us a roof over our head. It didn't. But a dishonest living did.
String.Dest: 我父母在农场工作. 以为淳朴的生活至少能让我们有瓦遮头. 但不是这样，坑蒙拐骗才能做到。

String.Source: If the shadow's in front, I'd be tempted to fish his pockets. The hardest thing to do is wait. If I had eyes, I wouldn't be able to.
String.Dest: 如果阴影就在面前，我会立刻摸进他的口袋。等待是个最艰难的事情。如果我能被看见，就不可以那样做了。

String.Source: In any case, we wait until they're sleeping, and then we hit 'em hard and we hit 'em fast. Just the way I like it.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，我们一直等到他们睡着，然后狠狠地打了他们就跑。我就喜欢玩这个。

String.Source: We wait until they're sleeping, and then we hit 'em hard and we hit 'em fast. Just the way I like it.
String.Dest: 等他们睡着，然后来个又快又狠的突袭。就像我一直喜欢的那样。

String.Source: I was wandering about the forest for some fresh air when I noticed a cabin perched on a hill.
String.Dest: 当我漫步于森林，呼吸着新鲜的空气时，我注意到一个小屋座落在山冈上。

String.Source: And while there were plenty of thieves who can't read, only I had the gall to cross Maven.
String.Dest: 考虑到有那么多小偷连大字都不识一个，也只有我才有与玛雯对着干的胆量了。

String.Source: Okay, I get it. I think. It's not about stealth so much as speed. Shadows are like that. They come and go in an instant.
String.Dest: 好吧，我想我明白了。连速度方面都不像是在潜行。就像影子一样，来去于须臾之间。

String.Source: I could do about 30 sets a minute, no health potion. Cleaned out so many pockets they were paying me in fish.
String.Dest: 我一分钟可以做大约三十套，不用血瓶。把这些都搞定以后他们会赏我条鱼。

String.Source: Found a stash of gold and a piece of paper. Don't know what was on it, so I left it on a table.
String.Dest: 找到一个金库和一张纸条。不知道上面写的啥，所以我把它留在桌子上了。

String.Source: Ever seen me play five finger fillet? Me and some of the other thieves used to play by the docks. Sometimes even the fishmongers would join in.
String.Dest: 曾经看到我这五个指尖的艺术吗?我和别的盗贼曾在码头如此表演。有时候鱼贩也会与我们为伍。

String.Source: Sure, I'll blow him a kiss as I walk out of the palace with his favorite axe. He'll never feel it though. Just like he'll never see me.
String.Dest: 当然。当我走出宫殿，我会给他那把最爱的斧头一个吻。尽管他永远不会察觉。就像他的眼中从来没有我一样。

String.Source: You're a funny one. You know damn well what I mean. We've got five hooks per hand, and an entire ocean of fish.
String.Dest: 《你真有趣。你懂我的意思。我们每人手上都有五个钩子，还有整个海洋的鱼。》

String.Source: You don't have to be careful, you just have to slide it off quick before they know what hits them. Fast and hard. I like it.
String.Dest: 你不需要小心,你只需要在他们弄清是什么打了他们之前快点儿溜走就行了。又快又猛，我喜欢这样。

String.Source: I knew you were a damn white knight the day you saved me. I also know you can't have shadows without light.
String.Dest: 我知道你救我那天你他妈的是我的救星。但我也知道你不会无缘无故救我。

String.Source: Alright, you go on ahead. It's not like this cage has room for another dragon anyway.
String.Dest: 好啊，你先走吧。这笼子看来也没地方装另一条龙啦。

String.Source: Whatever. I wasn't crying. Just telling you how it is. Not everyone had everything handed to them like you.
String.Dest: 不管怎么样，我没有哭。告诉你是怎么回事吧。不是所有人都能像你那样把所有东西都交给他们。

String.Source: Right now, that means telling you what you don't want to hear. If you want to stay Guildmaster, don't mess with Maven.
String.Dest: 不过现在，得告诉你一些你所不愿听到的事情。如果你还想接着当会长，那就别跟玛雯凑一块。

String.Source: Yeah, right. Talk about cutting off your prick to spite your balls.
String.Dest: 是啊，对啦。就说切掉你那根刺儿气死你的蛋吧。

String.Source: You're going to have your hands full, and I don't mean dealing with Alduin.
String.Dest: 估计你得忙的不可开交。我说的可不是收拾奥杜因那档子事儿。

String.Source: Wait...you mean killing them, and then taking their clothes? Pfff, I thought you meant something else.
String.Dest: 等等...你的意思是杀死他们，然后取他们的衣服？噗，我还以为你在打别的主意呢。

String.Source: You don't have to be an oracle to see this relationship is going to grow more and more profitable.
String.Dest: 你没必要像个圣人一样去看待，这种关系将会变得越来越有利可图。

String.Source: The scaleback? I can't be expected to remember all your friends' names. It'd be easier if you listed the stuff in her pockets. That I'd know.
String.Dest: 那个亚龙人？我不可能记住你所有朋友的名字。如果你列举她口袋里的物件儿，让我回想起来还能更容易些。

String.Source: Look down, and I'm crouching by your feet with a knife in my teeth. I'm waking you up in the mornings, I'm watching you in your sleep.
String.Dest: 向下看，我就叼着匕首潜伏在你旁边。早上我会叫你，你睡觉时我会看着你的。

String.Source: So where should we start? You can try dipping in pockets but you might hook an onion. My fingers will be on the belts, trawling for heavy purses.
String.Dest: 所以我们从哪里开始？你可以试试伸进口袋，但也许你只能掏出个葱头。而我会对皮带下手，偷摸儿顺走沉甸甸的钱包。

String.Source: We don't have to like the same things. In fact, that's pretty much what being a family is. We stick together regardless.
String.Dest: 我们不必喜欢同样的东西。事实上，这正是家人的意味。无论如何，我们都团结在一起。

String.Source: Maybe its best I let a Dragonborn handle dragon business. But I'm counting on you to at least steal something on my behalf.
String.Dest: 也许最好让龙裔干跟龙有关的事，但我还指望着你至少能以我的名义偷点儿什么呢。

String.Source: If his feet are quiet, then he passes before I know it, and only then do I blend into his shadow. The more dangerous situation is the reverse.
String.Dest: 如果他的脚步静默无声，那么他会在我发现前通过，只有那时我才能混入他的影子之中。反过来就更加危险了。

String.Source: Or mess with her, I don't care. We don't need those thieves anyway. It'll be just you and me from here on out.
String.Dest: 要不你就去惹她，我是无所谓。我们并不需要那些小偷。就咱们俩安全就行。

String.Source: Although I guess that only works on the sensitive ones, or else you couldn't whisper "Alduin" without him showing up in your bedroom.
String.Dest: 我猜那只对敏感的家伙有效，否则你悄悄说“奥杜因”它就出现在你房子里了。

String.Source: The eyes tempt you with their shine. But the eyes tell lies, my friend, the eyes tell lies.
String.Dest: 眼睛用光芒诱惑你。可眼睛是会说谎的我的朋友，眼睛会说谎。

String.Source: By the Divines you're an ass. No, I never had a home. My parents were farm hands. They went wherever there was work. And yeah, they loved me.
String.Dest: 圣灵在上，你是个混蛋。不，我从没有过家。我父母都在农场做活。他们走到哪儿都有工作。是啊，他们是爱我的。

String.Source: That's what I'm talking about, oath-sister. Here I was thinking you switched your stones for snowberries. Well, if you were a man.
String.Dest: （窃笑）这就是我要说的话，我的誓约姐妹。 我在想，你怎么就怂了。好吧，假如你是个爷们。

String.Source: I thought I'd find a city full of brothers and sisters. A family of orphans. What I found is a bunch of milk-drinkers sucking on Maven's teats.
String.Dest: 我以为我会找到一个城市，那里的人都亲如手足。就像是个孤儿们的大家庭。但我真正找到的却是一群吸吮着Maven奶嘴的吃奶小儿。

String.Source: That's right. We'll just be out there floating in the void, saying stuff like, "Is that all you got?"
String.Dest: 对。我们将会漂浮在那虚空中，说着些什么，就像“这就是你的全部了？”

String.Source: But I suppose saving the world is important too. And there's plenty of coin purses down here that aren't guarded by some legendary killer.
String.Dest: 不过，我想拯救世界也很重要。并且这儿有大量的零钱包并没有被一些传说中的杀手守卫的。

String.Source: I looked for the low shadows with sharp corners, but the one that drew my attention was a helmet-shaped one sitting on a crate. A strongbox.
String.Dest: 我在找带尖锐拐角的低阴影，但吸引我注意的是一个坐在箱子上的头盔状的。一个保险柜。

String.Source: Now who's blind. But whatever, her looks aren't the point. All I'm saying is, she isn't really a thief, and those guild idiots look up to her.
String.Dest: 现在看看谁是盲目的。但无论如何，她的​​长相不是问题的关键。所有我要说的是，她不是一个真正的小偷，而且那些公会的白痴们敬仰她。

String.Source: Probably was a bad move. Must've been valuable, because the next day everyone knew. Turns out the paper was worth more than the gold.
String.Dest: 这可能是一个糟糕的举动。一定是很有价值的，因为第二天每个人都知道。结果是纸的价值要超过黄金。

String.Source: I know as family, you'll do anything for me, and I'll do anything for you.
String.Dest: 我知道作为亲人，你会为我做任何事，我也愿为你付出一切。

String.Source: I knew there was something I liked about you from the moment I tricked you into opening that cage.
String.Dest: 我知道，自从我骗你打开笼子的那一刻开始，我就不知怎的爱上你了。

String.Source: Ugh, this is so confusing. I liked it better when they were extinct.
String.Dest: 啊，那可就难办啦。如果它们毁灭的话我会更开心的。

String.Source: What's that supposed to mean? You calling me stupid? Well, as long as you aren't calling me slow.
String.Dest: 这是什么意思？你说我是个傻瓜？好吧，只要你不说我反射弧长就行。

String.Source: While mom and dad picked cabbages, I picked pockets.
String.Dest: 我的父母在地里采卷心菜，而我在别人包里采钱。

String.Source: While mom and dad picked cabbages, I picked pockets.
String.Dest: 我的父母在地里采卷心菜，而我在别人包里采钱。

String.Source: That's what I'm talking about, oath-brother. For a second there I thought someone had switched your stones with snowberries.
String.Dest: (笑) 这就是我想说的，盾牌兄弟。我想一会儿就会有人拿雪浆果换你的石头了。

String.Source: Was the deed to some horse. They said any thief who left it had to be stupid or blind.
String.Dest: 契约转让给了一匹马，他们说，任何无视那匹马的窃贼不是傻子就是瞎子。

String.Source: I'm having issues springing you on my own.
String.Dest: 【我在躲开你的时候出了点儿差错。】

String.Source: You never told me about your childhood. You lost your home?
String.Dest: 你从来没有跟我提过你的童年。你失去了家园吗?

String.Source: You never told me about your childhood. You lost your home?
String.Dest: 你从来没有跟我提过你的童年。你失去了家园吗?

String.Source: You never told me about your childhood. You lost your home?
String.Dest: 你从来没有跟我提过你的童年。你失去了家园吗?

String.Source: You never told me about your childhood. You lost your home?
String.Dest: 你从来没有跟我提过你的童年。你失去了家园吗?

String.Source: Morndas is an unusual name.
String.Dest: 摩恩达丝是个罕见的名字.

String.Source: Morndas is an unusual name.
String.Dest: 摩恩达丝是个罕见的名字.

String.Source: Morndas is an unusual name.
String.Dest: 摩恩达丝是个罕见的名字.

String.Source: Morndas is an unusual name.
String.Dest: 摩恩达丝是个罕见的名字.

String.Source: You wouldn't want to come. There isn't any treasure in Sovngarde. Just ghosts.
String.Dest: 你不会想要过来的。Sovngarde这里没有财宝，只有鬼魂。

String.Source: You wouldn't want to come. There isn't any treasure in Sovngarde. Just ghosts.
String.Dest: 你不会想要过来的。Sovngarde这里没有财宝，只有鬼魂。

String.Source: You wouldn't want to come. There isn't any treasure in Sovngarde. Just ghosts.
String.Dest: 你不会想要过来的。Sovngarde这里没有财宝，只有鬼魂。

String.Source: You wouldn't want to come. There isn't any treasure in Sovngarde. Just ghosts.
String.Dest: 你不会想要过来的。Sovngarde这里没有财宝，只有鬼魂。

String.Source: You wouldn't want to come. There isn't any treasure in Sovngarde. Just ghosts.
String.Dest: 你不会想要过来的。Sovngarde这里没有财宝，只有鬼魂。

String.Source: I think you wanted to be part of the Guild. I think you feel betrayed by them.
String.Dest: 我看你是想加入盗贼工会。我想你觉得自己被背叛了。
