String.Source: I think you wanted to be part of the Guild. I think you feel betrayed by them.
String.Dest: 我看你是想加入盗贼工会。我想你觉得自己被背叛了。

String.Source: What happened at Black-Briar Lodge?
String.Dest: 在黑荆棘酒坊发生什么事了?

String.Source: What happened at Black-Briar Lodge?
String.Dest: 在黑荆棘酒坊发生什么事了?

String.Source: What happened at Black-Briar Lodge?
String.Dest: 在黑荆棘酒坊发生什么事了?

String.Source: I'm not sure if that's an insult or a compliment. So, thank you?
String.Dest: 我听不出你是损我还是夸我。所以，谢谢吧？

String.Source: I'm not sure if that's an insult or a compliment. So, thank you?
String.Dest: 我听不出你是损我还是夸我。所以，谢谢吧？

String.Source: That depends. Which one is the ugly one?
String.Dest: 那取决于，哪一个比较丑？

String.Source: That depends. Which one is the ugly one?
String.Dest: 那取决于，哪一个比较丑？

String.Source: That depends. Which one is the ugly one?
String.Dest: 那取决于，哪一个比较丑？

String.Source: An adventurer? So are you going to trade your dagger for an axe?
String.Dest: 冒险者吗？要不要拿你的小刀换一把斧头用？

String.Source: An adventurer? So are you going to trade your dagger for an axe?
String.Dest: 冒险者吗？要不要拿你的小刀换一把斧头用？

String.Source: Real family doesn't hire the Dark Brotherhood to knife you in your sleep. So no, I don't want anything to do with the Guild. End of story.
String.Dest: 真正的家族才不会雇佣黑暗兄弟会在你熟睡的时候捅你一刀。所以说，我并不想让公会出什么事，到此为止吧。

String.Source: They're all ugly! Can't you see that? You're the one with eyes. If I were you, I wouldn't admit I was related to any of them.
String.Dest: 他们全是丑八怪！你看不见吗？你是有眼无珠啊。如果我是你的话，绝不会承认我跟他们中的任何人有任何关系。

String.Source: Me and you though, we're practically twins. I bet it's like looking in a mirror.
String.Dest: 我和你简直是一对儿双胞胎。我敢打赌我们看着彼此的时候就像是看着镜子中的自己。

String.Source: And I have you to thank. But let's not get all mushy, okay?
String.Dest: 我得感谢你。别让我们那么感伤，好吗？

String.Source: I bet Ancano thought he was one too, that's why he let you step on him. Now all his guts are all over the floor. Just like they should be.
String.Dest: 我敢打赌安卡诺觉得他也算一个，所以才会让你踩着他。现在他的肠子流了一地。本来就应该这样。

String.Source: Not exactly. Didn't have a home to lose. My parents were farmers without a farm. We moved from the Rift to the Reach, begging for work.
String.Dest: 也不准确。没有什么家可失去的。我父母也是没有农场的农民。我们从裂谷城搬到边塞领。到处找事做。

String.Source: We'd travel from place to place, praying to Zenithar we'd have enough to sleep at the inn that night.
String.Dest: 我们会到处旅行，向泽尼萨尔祈祷我们能够在小旅馆里过夜。

String.Source: Think of all the loot we can take off these Nord heroes. I'm not just talking swords and armor either.
String.Dest: 想想我们能从这些诺德英雄这儿弄到的宝贝吧。我可不光是指武器盔甲什么的。

String.Source: Ah, but you got bigger things on your mind. You go on ahead and kill that World Eater. This place should keep me busy until you get back.
String.Dest: 哦，但是在你心里有更重要的事要去做。你得继续前进，然后杀掉世界吞噬者。在你回来之前，我会一直替你照看这个位子的。

String.Source: What? Of course it's a compliment. Who wouldn't want to be a cockroach? Those things are like six-legged diamonds.
String.Dest: 什么？当然，这是恭维。谁不想做一只蟑螂？这些东西可是有是六条金刚钻似的腿呢。

String.Source: (Scoffs) That's a surprise. Are you sure you don't want to let me handle it?
String.Dest: （嘲笑）真是个惊喜。你确定不想让我来处理吗？

String.Source: You sure about that? I seem to recall killing a few wayward spirits that dropped more than their share of coin.
String.Dest: 你确定吗？我觉得杀掉那些刚愎自用的灵魂可不仅仅为了他们身上的那几文钱。

String.Source: You know how Nords always talk about Ysmir's beard? What if we actually plucked that thing off his face? Like a bushel of gold.
String.Dest: 你知道诺德人有多喜欢说伊斯谟的胡子吗？要是我们真的把胡子从他脸上拔下来会怎么样？就像是一蒲式耳的黄金吧。

String.Source: It's not like he'd miss it either, seeing as he could just grow it back.
String.Dest: 看起来他也不会不会少什么，鉴于他可以再长出来。

String.Source: Now, his face was stuck but that body yawned. Damn shoulders almost touched his toes. It would've taken an ogre to wake him. I'm not one.
String.Dest: 现在，他的脸被卡住了，但他的尸体却分家了。他的肩膀几乎能碰到他的脚趾头。叫醒他的一定是个食人族。我可不是。

String.Source: Skyrim's so cold, you get to know the seasons by the crop and the farm. Gourds from Merryfair in the fall. Berries from Hollyfrost in the spring.
String.Dest: 天际省太冷了，你需要考虑好季节对作物以及农场的影响。秋天收获Merryfair的葫芦，春天收获寒霜农场的浆果。

String.Source: What are you, blind?
String.Dest: 你瞎眼了吗？

String.Source: Sure enough, the following Sundas, my mother went into labor. But I didn't come out right away.
String.Dest: 果然，接下来的Sundas，我老母去了研究室。但是我没立马出来。

String.Source: But I always made sure we did. Dad scolded me once. Told me begging wasn't honest work. He had no idea.
String.Dest: But I always made sure we did. 我爸有一次骂了我。说讨饭不是真正的工作。他懂什么。

String.Source: That's enough!
String.Dest: 够了！

String.Source: Not likely. Especially after you put Nocturnal in a good mood again. The extra shadows are going to help. Big time.
String.Dest: （笑）我看不会。尤其是你们帮诺克图纳尔重整旗鼓之后。额外的阴影之力会帮上大忙。不得了！

String.Source: One section was darker than the rest. A guard standing by the door. His shadow had high cheek bones. A mercenary's grin.
String.Dest: 有一段比其他地方更加黑暗的路。一个守卫靠着门懒懒的站着。从影子来看，他的颧骨很高。一个雇佣兵露齿而笑。

String.Source: These idiots aren't even people. Just a bunch of shield-horkers. So don't forget who really has your back.
String.Dest: 这些蠢都不配叫做人。顶多算群是扛着盾的三牙海象。所以别忘记事实上是谁在保卫你的身后。

String.Source: You idiot!
String.Dest: 你个白痴！

String.Source: That's ridiculous. What, you think they were family? Family doesn't abandon you when you do something wrong.
String.Dest: 这太荒谬了。什么，你以为他们是家人？家人是永远不会背弃你的，无论你做错了什么。

String.Source: I was a stubborn baby. Wouldn't leave the womb. Always clung to the darkness, even then.
String.Dest: 我是一个顽固的孩子，总是舍不得离开子宫，总是向往着黑暗。
